review.reviewText: It was an overall great experience. The bed was quite comfortable and big. The free shuttle trip to the airport was very, very pleasant; the driver was very nice and helpful, and he helped moving the luggage. Therefore, it was a nice stay. The only downside was that the WiFi service was not very stable in my room. Anything else was great and beyond expectations. The breakfast staff were very nice and helpful. So, good job!

review.title: Great hotel next to bay
review.reviewText: Good view of bay. Large continental breakfast. Great variety.
review.positiveRemarks: Great location. Walking distance to restaurants. Right on SF bay. Great view of airport. Watch planes take off and land at your leisure. Still a quiet
review.locationRemarks: AT&T park is 20 minutes away

review.title: Very nice hotel close to SFO.
review.reviewText: We stayed at the hotel a total of 6 hours, so I can't be too specific. But it seemed clean and nicely appointed. We chose the hotel because of a friend's recommendation. We had an early morning flight and liked the fact that there was a shuttle and no fee for parking your car.

review.title: Great hotel for near the airport
review.reviewText:
Great location plenty of places to eat nearby, stayed here last day of vacation since to the airport
No you cannot hear the planes but you can sit out on the boardwalk to watch them take off
Vivian the clerk was absolutely wonderful
review.positiveRemarks: Location bed was very comfortable
review.negativeRemarks: Need to fix the toilet when you flushed when it refilled it made a lot of nose
review.locationRemarks: Three miles probably less from the airport right next to the 101 so can drive anywhere Plenty of restuarants nearby

review.title: Good value, decent hotel
review.reviewText: Nice not to have to suffer the add-ons of the major chains such as internet access and parking. Very clean rooms, good size and well-equipped. Pleasant people, but why didn't the check-in person not call my room to tell me he had mistakenly retained my credit card? Wasted some time and stress searching for it next morning, which could have been avoided.

review.title: Great Location & Access
review.reviewText:
For business or leisure time in the City, San Francisco, I find it very convenient to stay here, South of the masses. From here, It is an easy commute of just 10-15 minutes to get to the east side of SF for the Zoo, Beaches and Golden Gate Park. It's just 15-20 minutes to get to Downtown, Civic Center, Market Street or the Embarcadero, of course times can be impacted by traffic. If you fly in to SF International, this hotel is just minutes south with frequent shuttles. There are great eating establishments within a short walking distance and the hotel offers a good breakfast with plenty of variety that you can enjoy on their patio in the early morning sun.
We are definitely going to continue staying here.
review.positiveRemarks: The Location
review.negativeRemarks: Not much.
review.locationRemarks: Easy to get to SF, Half Moon Bay and great restaurants nearby.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: Nice clean hotel close to the airport and rental cars. Several restaurants nearby.

review.title: Great hotel close to airport/public transportation
review.reviewText: Nice room, friendly staff, great breakfast. Would stay again.
review.positiveRemarks: Helpful staff
review.negativeRemarks: Aircraft noise if you leave window open.
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport.

review.title: Good hotel for quick access to airport.
review.reviewText: Furniture and amenities need updating....box TV! I stayed one night to be near the airport. Good location, nice and clean with breakfast and free shuttle service. Internet is slow but free. Would not recommend for leisure or family travel. Works fine for airport access and business. A little far from downtown.
review.positiveRemarks: Location near airport
review.negativeRemarks: Old furniture...bed and TV
review.locationRemarks: Near airport and convenient

review.title: Very nice and larger that expected. Staff helpful.
review.reviewText: Easy parking for San Francisco. Let us in the room early with no charge very clean and a great view.
review.positiveRemarks: The view, the staff.
review.locationRemarks: Your right down town close to everything.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: The rooms were clean, quiet area, good location, and nice view.

review.title: Great hotel with a view of the bay.
review.reviewText: I completely enjoyed this hotel and we were able to get a great view of the bay. The only exception was the complimentary breakfast we had in which the sausage and eggs were served cold or frozen and we had to heat them ourselves in the microwave, they could also use a few more tables in the dining area.

review.title: Beautiful and relax stay on this hotel.
review.reviewText: Nice place to stay, beautiful view of the bay, nice to go for a walk or jogging. Very good breakfast and excellent free shuttle to airport. Like tha fact that they have coffee, tea, cold water, hot chocolate available all day. Thank you!
review.positiveRemarks: Beautiful view of the bay and breakfast was just wonderful! Also the free shuttle to the airport excellent!
review.negativeRemarks: A little far from the bart station. Ok to walk on the day time, but too cold to walk at night.
review.locationRemarks: Nice location. Just wish they could have a free shuttle to the bart station.

review.title: Wonderful stay
review.reviewText: Wonderful hotel, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Hotel is located on a beautiful piece of property.

review.title: A Great Value Near the Airport
review.reviewText: I've stayed at other nearby hotels for work related conferences but the purpose of this trip was to visit our son at SFSU. So cost was a major factor in looking for place near enough for the visit with our boy. Wow! we were very pleased with the Bay Landing and had I known about it before, I would have chosen to stay here rather than those other hotels. There are 3 nearby restaurants for good eats,shuttle service if you need it and parking is free. Rooms were very clean, the soaps,shampoo etc. seemed to be of a nicer quality. Staff was very friendly. Our room had a small fridge and microwave which made leftovers a treat the following day. Our room had a partial view of the Bay and we did NOT hear the jets landing or taking off. I'd recommend going earlier for breakfast because it can get a bit crowded later on. But, even with that, you can't beat the price (free).
review.positiveRemarks: Very clean room and quiet.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast area was a bit crowded during it's peak period.
review.locationRemarks: Near enough to the airport. The bay has a walkway that was great for exercise walks.

review.title: Nice, romantic, clean and comfortable
review.reviewText:
I have no idea why some people were saying this hotel was dated. They're completely wrong. The hotel was lovely and clean. We actually had the room in the photos. We sat outside in the evening whilst the sun went down watching planes land. We then had a bay-view and we watched the sun rising over the mountains in the morning. Beautiful and romantic. The breakfast was fine, as good as you get in the US to be honest.

I'd definitely stay here again!
review.positiveRemarks: The bay-view and closeness to the airport
review.negativeRemarks: No pool, and breakfast was limited. Pool was never advertised though and the breakfast situation is standard in the US
review.locationRemarks: Perfect

review.title: Excellent value.
review.reviewText: Got a great deal through Expedia. Had to arrive late and leave early, so we didn't want to spend a lot of money. It was terrific in nearly every way. The staff was not as warm and welcoming as we would have liked, but certainly not rude or offensive - just would have appreciated a little more enthusiasm and warmth.

review.title: It Was A Memorable Weekend
review.reviewText: We spent an anniversary/birthday weekend at the hotel, and we were absolutely spoiled! The room was fabulous, the staff was so courteous and caring...we couldn't have enjoyed our stay more! We would definitely stay here again and again!
review.positiveRemarks: The wonderful staff and comfy bed!
review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast area was a bit crowded, but my husband made me a delicious waffle.
review.locationRemarks: From our room we could see planes coming in to the SF Airport...at night it was lovely to watch them come in one after the other!

review.title: Quality Hotel
review.reviewText: Good Quality Hotel. Shuttle to Airport service is a plus.

review.title: Couple getaway
review.reviewText: My husband and I visited this hotel in April and went back in May. We really like this hotel. Very clean, employees very friendly, restaurants walking distance and a good continental breakfast. Will go back again.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport and the hotel does offer free transportation back and forth to the airport. Easy to catch Bart.

review.title: Great Hotel With a View
review.reviewText: We loved the location near the water. The room was beautifully furnished, clean and had all the amenities.
review.positiveRemarks: We liked the location and the beauty of it.
review.negativeRemarks: They could use more tables in the breakfast area.
review.locationRemarks: We loved the location and the fact that a gas station was near as well as a couple of great restaurants.

review.title: Close to the bay and airport yet quiet.
review.reviewText: It was great to be within walking distance to the bay's walking trails.
review.negativeRemarks: I just wish the hotel's wifi was a bit more reliable and didn't require that you log-in every time you got disconnected.

review.title: Nice hotel with free parking
review.reviewText: It's very close to everything, train station to downtown SF is only a few mins away. Besides, you don't want to drive into SF anyway. Traffic and parking is bad, so use Bart and the Muni as your transportation. And this hotel is at a great location if you need to visit other places yourself. Hotel is clean, staff is friendly, free breakfast, and free parking; where as if you stay inside SF, you have yo pay anywhere from $40-$60 per night for patking. Also, there is walking/biking trail right next to the hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Location
review.negativeRemarks: Hot breakfast! Heating food up with a microwave is not my kind of hot food.
review.locationRemarks: Very close to San Mateo and Milbrate, where you can find good eateries.

review.title: Charming European Style Hotel Near Airport
review.reviewText: Extremely convenient location for airport as well as San Mateo and San Francisco Counties. Newer hotel with charming French decor, great amenities and staff. I would definitely stay again next trip to the Bay Area.

review.title: Clean and convenient
review.reviewText: A great deal! Nice sized clean rooms with bath. View on SFO runway, restaurants walking distance. Nice breakfast selection offered. Best hotel we have stayed at around airport!

review.title: Our 2 nights stay at Bay Landing.
review.reviewText:
I felt some of the front desk employee were friendly and some were not. I think they need to know more detailed information about Down town San Francisco. For example: Train lines Bus lines, How to get to some tours, etc... Visitors wants more detailed info.
I can't complain about breakfast, because It's complimentary but they could do better.
The noise of showering which comes from another room wasn't pleased.
Over all It was good stay. You can see nice sun rise.
review.positiveRemarks: Closed to Airport.
review.locationRemarks: on the Bay, Closed to couple of nice restaurants.

review.title: old facility
review.reviewText: the staff (night shift, after midnight) is not friendly at all,very unpatient, did not want to say a word to us. guess this guy had a fight with his wife that day.
review.negativeRemarks: staff training
review.locationRemarks: close to the airport (SFO)

review.title: Convenient location for travelers
review.reviewText: Close to SFO. Not very impressed with breakfast. Lots of people waited in line for microwave to cook/warm sandwiches. Did not bother us because there are lots of restaurants within short driving distance.

review.title: Nice area by the bay.
review.reviewText:
If one does not have a car, there nothing close to the hotel (to my knowledge) where to buy some food items or snacks, but the hotel sells a few items. With a car, one can drive into Millbrae, there is e.g. a Trader Joe's about five minutes away by car.

There is a nice foot path along the bay and some restaurants next to hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Bathroom seemed fairly new and was spotless.

review.title: City and Airport Accessible
review.reviewText: Bay Landing was clean, and the staff were pleasant. Service was immediate and friendly, with fresh baked cookies, about 5 varieties laid out every day at 3. Room was well insulated, could not hear the planes, even though my room faced the airport. Restaurants were close by, and the hotels continental breakfast had many selections. Shuttle dropped me off right in front of the airport Bart station to ride into the city, with the shuttle arriving every 30 minutes, I did not wait long upon my arrival back to the airport. Bay Landing is right on the Bay, with a 7 mile path that follows along the bay. Parking was free, as was wireless, and the wireless was fantastic! Strong, constant signal throughout the complex. This is a great place to stay if doing business between San Jose and San Francisco, the establishment is right on the 101.
review.positiveRemarks: Easy access to Bart and freeways. Free parking. Free strong consistent wireless. Pleasant and helpful staff members Solid continental breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: Pillows smelled musty, and the sheets had a couple of small stains on them, nothing disgusting, just stains from longevity.
review.locationRemarks: Two solid restaurants across the parking lot. Airport and freeways accessible. Great seven mile walking trail around the bay area.

review.title: Near airport, fancy but inconvenient
review.reviewText: The room was very nice and extremely comfortable. The staff acted like they hated their jobs. Would have been nice to see a smile from the receptionist. I used to be one myself so I know it isn't a fun job but the most important part of the job is customer interaction.
review.positiveRemarks: The breakfast buffet was great, lots of choices. Free wifi. Parking right near the water. Bed was very nice. Clean facilities.
review.negativeRemarks: Staff attitude. Everyone looked so unhappy.
review.locationRemarks: Very close to airport but about 30 minute drive to San Fran. But close to BART station (public trains). So you can park there and ride into town.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: Very good hotel, everything was excellent, I recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay in the San Francisco area. It's not in the middle of the city but it's close enough that everything was reachable in a short time.

review.title: Nice and Clean
review.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised with the room, and the location was great (close to the SF Int Airport). My only complaint is that it was rather noisy. I would definitely stay there again - great value for the price!

review.title: Handy to airport and great find
review.reviewText: We found this hotel through Expedia. We had an early flight time and wanted a hotel close to our car rental place. We were extremely satisfied. Quiet, comfortable room, friendly staff, free wifi, parking and breakfast. Best of all, a very reasonable price. We will definitley stay at the Bay Landing next time. Oh, and did I mention the beautiful view of the bay and landing airplanes?

review.title: great stay night before early flight
review.reviewText: Great hotel! zero complaints. Close to good restaurants and SFO. shuttle was prompt.
review.positiveRemarks: everything

review.title: Well located hotel, not too big, not too small.
review.reviewText: It took a long time for the shuttle to arrive, but after that all was good, especially the breakfast. The breakfast room might have been somewhat bigger tho....

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: This is a nice clean hotel that is close to the air port and train station. The continental breakfast was great and the gym is nice. There is no pool which was a disappointment for my daughter. Other than that the hotel was great. Will defiantly stay at this hotel again.

review.title: I would recommend it!
review.reviewText:
I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. It had good access to the 101 highway making it easy to get to San Francisco. Although within sight of the airport there is very little airport noise. There is no restaurant in the hotel but there are 2 restaurants next door and both are good.
They could do with a slightly bigger breakfast counter area as it is right in the corner of the room but the seating area is good with the added advantage of being able to sit outside.
review.positiveRemarks: Location
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast serving area
review.locationRemarks: Easy access to 101

review.title: Great hotel for an early flight home
review.reviewText: We used this hotel on our last night of our trip to San Francisco, we had a early flight out. The rooms were a good size and the beds were very comfortable. Unfortunately we left too early to enjoy the breakfast but appreciated the hotel shuttle.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, cleanliness
review.locationRemarks: Perfect for a early flight home.

review.title: was there for work and the room had what i needed
review.reviewText:
was there for work and stayed in another hotel the night before which was horrible. No free internet, no fridge, no free breakfast, no shuttle service to airport, they put me right next to the elevator and ice machine which i could hear.
it was a breath of fresh air moving over to the Landing.
review.positiveRemarks: Free internet, the walk out behind the building was all along the bay, the fridge in the room, a non noisy heating//cooling system and breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: shuttle service to the airport

review.title: Wi-Fi didn't work in the room, otherwise ok
review.reviewText: The only issue was wi-fi, staff suggested to move to another room after a full day of complaints, but was a bit too late already as we were departing in 1 day and used hotel lobby network for urgent work. Otherwise, it was a great stay - breakfast was decent, staff was helpful and the location was very nice.

review.title: Nice old Hotel, close to the airport
review.reviewText: little bit crowded at the breakfast, rooms are nice and quiet
review.positiveRemarks: parking for guest, close to the airport, quiet
review.negativeRemarks: staff could be friendlier
review.locationRemarks: Mexican and a Elephant's Bar right by the Hotel

review.title: Nice
review.reviewText: Hotel was nice. We didn't get a bay view so that was kinda upsetting. Complimentary breakfast was good. The fresh stuff was great. A lot of processed things though. But there was a lot of selections of you didn't want that stuff. Room was nice. Beds comfy. Hotel even had personal taxi they used so he was able to pick us up. However it was quit expensive. Wouldn't recommend using that service.

review.title: You don't need to stay in the city ...
review.reviewText: Hotel really well positioned with great access to SFO. SF was even more expensive than usual when we stayed, so price of Bay Landing and its access to transport links and BART into the city were the two major factors in choosing to stay here. We were pleased we did. Hotel was great and all staff were really helpful. The schedule of courtesy buses to/fro SFO/BART made it easy to plan and maximise our stay. The room was lovely with big picture windows of the Bayfront immediately outside. Had a good meal at The Elephant (loads of choice and good value too) and spent a few pleasant hours on the last day before our flight wandering around downtown Burlingame after taking the complimentary shuttle bus from the next door hotel. Hotel held our bags for us after check out which made it easy to make the most of that last day. Overall the hotel gave us exactly what we wanted and I would definitely stay here again. Thank you
review.positiveRemarks: Price and access to transport links

review.title: Great hotel on the water.
review.reviewText: The hotel was beautiful and a great place to stay with a view--close to the airport too.
review.positiveRemarks: We loved the breakfast in the morning, and all the amenities (microwave, fridge, and lock box) in the room.
review.locationRemarks: Shopping, airport and car rental returns.

review.title: Comfortable place to stay.
review.reviewText:
On arrival, my check-in was done immediately. The clerk was friendly and efficient and even recommended a near-by restaurant for dinner, which was excellent. The room was clean and comfortable overlooking the bay. The bathroom was huge. The bed in particular was very comfortable and gave a good night's sleep. The complimentary breakfast in the morning was more than sufficient and the airport shuttle right on time
Overall, a very enjoyable stay that I hope to repeat in the future
review.positiveRemarks: Great bed, huge room.
review.negativeRemarks: Bathroom towels could have been softer.
review.locationRemarks: Beautiful - room overlooked the bay.

review.title: Decent Hotel for a couple of nights stay
review.reviewText:
This hotel is conveniently located near the airport and there are good places to eat around this area. The hotel looks clean and well kept. The bedding covers did look a bit outdated though and require some modernizing.

The breakfast was just ok but at least it is filling. All in all, I will stay here again if I am in transit
review.positiveRemarks: Sizable rooms, ample parking
review.negativeRemarks: breakfast
review.locationRemarks: Great for san francisco airport

review.title: A big hassle. Uncomfortable beds. buyer be ware.
review.reviewText: I have stayed at Bay Landing several times specifically because it is not a big chain and the staff are usually so helpful. However, this last time i stayed i had a terribel experience and i will not go back. The beds are hard and old, the hotel is getting dingy. But worst was the staff. I called ahead because i had purchased a park and fly package on Expedia. The hotel clerk assured me that everything was fine. I asked if we could have a second car since there were two of us staying in the room and we were coming from different places. The clerk said that would be fine (which i thought was surprising, but generous and accommodating). When i check in, i confirmed with the desk clerk again -- there will be another person coming with another car for the park and fly package. She said that would not be a problem. BUT, when my daughter arrived, the desk clerk had changed and he said that she could not have a park and fly pass, and that even the original reservation was not a park and fly. He did not want to give either of us parking passes and was insistent that despite two other employees assuring us that it was all ok, that we did not have a park and fly package. Finally, he gave us the passes, but would not give me a receipt for my credit card because he said they might charge me more for the parking. I still have to call the manager to figure this all out. What a hassle. BE CAREFUL when purchasing from Expedia -- it may NOT be the park and fly package.

review.title: Nice SFO airport.
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel. I could see the bay from my room (at an angle) and I could watch the planes. Room was very nice. Only complaint is that the room was cold and heater didn't seem to work correctly.

review.title: Very pleasant stay
review.reviewText: nice location, close to the water, easy access to airport and BART

review.title: Nice Hotel at the End of Our Vacation
review.reviewText: Very nice room for the price and staff are helpfull. Good location for airport status with free shuttle. Good restaurants within walking distance.
review.positiveRemarks: Room View
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: Great near SFO

review.title: Great hotel for a short stay
review.reviewText: We stayed at this hotel over the weekend and loved the free parking, free internet access and free breakfast!!! They also provide cookies mid-afternoon which was a nice touch. We will definitely consider staying at this hotel again when we are back in the area.

review.title: Beautiful views, large rooms.
review.reviewText: Great hotel in the Bay Area. This will be our new go to hotel when visiting the area. Staff was very pleasant and engaging. Rooms are nice and big and the beds are super comfy. Beautiful views and lovely decor. The only thing I noticed that wasn't 100% was the paint on the walls in the hallways was warn (probably from suitcases, etc.). Nothing that a little paint can't fix.

review.title: "Never Staying Here Again"
review.reviewText:
1. Shuttle service from and to the Airport was horrible. Had to wait 25 minutes and the driver was very rude. They have a shuttle schedule, but that is absolutely useless.. don't count on it.
2. No restaurant in the hotel. Arrived at 11PM and was starving.. nothing to eat in the hotel.. had to sleep hungry.
3. The bed was hard and the pillow was like a seat cushion. Comfortor was a joke.. it was a think blanket. Found some hair in my bed.. was disgusted.. but was too tired to change rooms.
4. The location isn't the best.. pretty shady area as you can see from the pictures. The pictures posted in the website aren't too great, but the hotel itself is even worse. I am not exaggerating.
5. The hotel staff were clueless and weren't helpful at all... They could barely speak English.
Please stay at a different hotel if possible.. I usually don't give bad reviews to anyone unless I had an extremely bad experience. This was one of those occasions.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to the Airport
review.negativeRemarks: Everything else.

review.title: Great stay for my family
review.reviewText: A great stay!! A good spot near the airport and not too far away from San Francisco if you are driving. I enjoy my stay, very clean and comfortable. A good breakfast. I would keep this hotel under my favorites.
review.positiveRemarks: Even though the airport was close, we did not hear much plane noise.

review.title: Great views and good value
review.reviewText: Great breakfast. Some of the front desk staff could benefit from some customer service training. Excellent location with great views and walking paths. Bedding in rooms needs to be improved. Overall great value considering breakfast service and free shuttle to the airport. We really enjoyed our stay and would stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast was great with lots of variety.
review.negativeRemarks: Bedding and some of the front desk staff wasn't that friendly.
review.locationRemarks: Excellent location, right on the water, great walking paths. Close to the airport and public bus stop is right across the street.

review.title: great hotel for everyone
review.reviewText: great hotel to stay. clean, nice staff, good breakfast. easy to airport and freeway.

review.title: Good hotel for everyone.
review.reviewText:
I stayed here with my family for two nights recently. We were very well taken care of and the hotel was both very clean and very comfortable. In an area of many huge hotels, this one is a bit smaller, thus adding to the ambiance. Both the inside and outside areas, while not too big, were very nice and the staff was very friendly and helpful.

We would definitely come back when next in this area.
review.positiveRemarks: A very quiet and comforting place to stay, and a superior breakfast included.
review.locationRemarks: Excellent location near the city and just minutes from SFO airport.

review.title: great stay
review.reviewText: Lovely hotel great location for the airport and extremely qui

review.title: Bay Landing
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel and great location off the highway, highly recommended

review.title: Great stay
review.reviewText: Excellent hotel close to the airport. Would come back
review.positiveRemarks: Clean and quiet

review.title: Nice Hotel great service.
review.reviewText: Great hotel and service with front desk made me feel calm and relaxed after a very stressful morning.The room was clean and spacious, The TV's need to be updated!

review.title: Good hotel - airport location
review.reviewText: Very nice airport hotel, beautiful room. Very good complimentary breakfast. Shuttle to airport on schedule.
review.positiveRemarks: Great room. Very good complimentary breakfast. Shuttle fro hotle on schedule 10 mind drive.
review.negativeRemarks: Did not take shuttle from airport - it comes every 35 mins;

review.title: Would stay again!

review.positiveRemarks: Beautiful View

review.title: Bay Landing SF
review.reviewText: Air conditioning came on at 4am and was very loud, kept us awake for a couple of hours, otherwise the hotel was very nice. Told the front desk of the issue, they were not interested of the problem.
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: Air conditioning noise too loud.
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient to all of peninsula.

review.title: Scratchy by the bay.
review.reviewText:
Bed linens were the worst I have ever experienced. So itchy and scratchy it was hard to sleep. Check in was off putting. I had to sign two forms advising me of a $200.00 cleaning charge for smoking in room. They also wanted my car information including license number.
I have not been asked for my car's license plate number at any hotel in years. At check out I
asked for a folio or some receipt for my stay and was told that I reserved on line and therefore nothing was available to me at the front desk.
review.positiveRemarks: Location
review.negativeRemarks: Linens and staff
review.locationRemarks: Right on the water and near a few restaurants. SFO is close.

review.title: Old and Worn Bed, Bed Linens and Furniture
review.reviewText: I'm not entirely sure what hotel some of these 4+star reviewers stayed at near SFO. The hotel's stucco exterior was nice enough. My room contained old, dented, and worn furniture. The mattress had to be a decade old. I could feel the box springs at times. The bed linens were literally on their last thread. The room itself reminded me of hotels in the mid to late nineties. I checked in around midnight and the desk agent was VERY unfriendly. I found myself apologizing profusely for checking in so late to a hotel adjacent to an airport in a major US city. I learned my lesson on this business trip. Best to stick to recognized name brand hotels that market to business travelers.

review.title: Conveniently close to the airport
review.reviewText: Convenient location close to the airport. But the cleanliness of the room leaves something to improve.

review.title: Enjoyed our stay.
review.reviewText: Excellent hotel. I was somewhat surprised because it was less expensive than other airport hotels. They have a shuttle (Classic - Bay Landing) that runs every 30 minutes. The Continental breakfast went way beyond what I have come to expect. I sought out the manger to let him know how much we enjoyed our stay. If the opportunity occurs in the future, we will definitely stay there again. Bart is nearby, although we had rented a car, so I would expect that downtown San Francisco is convenient.
review.positiveRemarks: All was good
review.negativeRemarks: None
review.locationRemarks: As I wrote, it is in a good location for the airport and downtown transportation, although we didn't use it because we had a car.

review.title: Great hotel for an airport overnight
review.reviewText: Excellent hotel for an overnight at the airport. We stay there frequently because it is very convenient and a pleasant place to stay.
review.positiveRemarks: Location on the bay.
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient

review.title: Fisherman's Wharf Keeper
review.reviewText: Pleasant staff, superb location, nicely appointed rooms of a generous size.

review.title: Great hotel but the staff could be a little nicer
review.reviewText: Hotel was great - room was clean and well kept. Lobby was clean and inviting. The only thing that was not inviting was the front desk staff...a little short and condescending with a few simple questions (both in person and over the phone). Shuttle driver to airport was awesome - prompt and friendly.

We had one problem:there were 2 times that our key didn't work and therefore we had to go back down and get a new key. It was rather inconvenient. Otherwise we would give the hotel an excellent rating.

review.title: Great place
review.reviewText:
Great hotel to overnight. Right on SF bay, quiet, clean. Two restaurants just one minute walking distance. Elephant Bar super place. Great continental breakfast and very
nice shuttle bus driver, polite and informative. Just 5 minutes from airport. Would stay
again in a hearbeat.
review.negativeRemarks: TV station choices are few.

review.title: Great for overnight stay by SFO
review.reviewText: Nice and clean and comfortable room, newly renovated. Convenient from SFO.

review.title: Great for everyone
review.reviewText: Convenient to the airport. No problems with noise from airplanes. Great continental daily breakfast. Will stay again.

review.title: Great transit hotel.
review.reviewText: Close to airport, with free shuttle service. Great breakfast included and good location for a stroll along the bay.
review.positiveRemarks: Lovely waterfront walk.
review.negativeRemarks: Not much around it.
review.locationRemarks: Location is great for a lay over or to stay prior to an early morning flight.

review.title: Excellent Hotel and Excellent Price
review.reviewText: The hotel was excellent and was excellent value. The staff, hotel, and the breakfast exceeded my expectations. Very clean and spacious rooms and bathrooms. Hotel parking was excellent and access to the Airport was also very good. Secondly, there are 3 gas stations within a few blocks of the hotel and so if you have or need a rental car this is good information, as you can easily fill the rental car's gas tank instead of being hosed by the rental car company's fill policy (they either charge you $9 a gallon or charge you for a full tank...which can add at least $60 to your rental car's bill).

review.title: Great Hotel for all travelers
review.reviewText: The Hotel was clean, comfortable and about 1/2 mile form San Francisco Airport. The front desk staff were very pleasant. The entire hotel was beautifully decorated and clean. The room was large and the bed very comfortable. The free breakfast had a large array of choices and drinks were available 24 hours. The price was exceptionally low for the quality of the hotel. I would recommend this hotel to everyone.
review.positiveRemarks: Attractive and comfortable rooms; Helpfull staff; Good choice of foods for breakfast; Close to Airport
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: Very close to SFO and easy to access Highway 101

review.title: Very nice hotel, but annoying experience.
review.reviewText: This hotel is very nice. The building and interiors are very well-kept. The room was clean and comfortable. The free wifi, however, was very slow at times and kept dropping. My only big issue was with the guests above my room. They were very loud. I called the night front desk, and the receptionist was very nice and responsive. It seemed that hotel security resolved the matter so that I could sleep through the night, although the guests made a lot of noise, once again, as soon as they woke up in the morning. Also, the maids in the hallway were loud at times, talking constantly to each other in the hallways. Besides this, I had a pleasant stay. Their free continental breakfast is nice and they have food and beverages for sale at the front desk, so you don't have to leave the hotel if you're craving a midnight snack. The location is also very nice since it's right next to restaurants. I didn't have a vehicle, so its location and amenities were very convenient. I would recommend this hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Beautiful and clean hotel. Nice view of SFO landing strip and bay.
review.negativeRemarks: Slow wifi. TV channels were lacking.
review.locationRemarks: Great location if you need to stay near SFO. Next to restaurants.

review.title: Nice stay
review.reviewText: Relatively nice place... Only complaints were that the mattress is very hard and the towels wer rough. Otherwise is was good, quite and clean.

review.title: Great for an overnight stay

review.title: Great hotel in the airport area

review.title: Bay Landiing 3 night stay
review.reviewText:
We had read many of the comments of previous guests, and were pleasantly surprised by the overall exprience we had at this hotel. It was cheaper than a nearby Marriott Fairfield by $ 40.00 a night, the room was spacious, the bathroom very clean, the internet worked, and it appeared that management cares about this hotel. Breakfast was more than good, with lots of choices.

Front desk staff could work a "little" harder on being more pleasant. They have to remember that they are in the sales business, and first impressions are what counts most. We did not experience any problems with the staff - they just need to try a "little" harder to smile and be gracious hosts.

We would definitely stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: size of room and bathroom. Cleanliness of hotel and quality of breakfast offered
review.negativeRemarks: Staff needs to smile more
review.locationRemarks: Very close to SFO airport. First night we heard planes taking off, but not the other two nights after getting adjusted to a 3 hour time change.

review.title: Good experience
review.reviewText: We chose it because it was close to the airport and provided a free shuttle service to the local BART station and to the airport. It was also close to friends who lived in Burlingame - an added bonus. Room was spacious and clean and staff were helpful. Breakfast was great.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, facilities, service

review.reviewText:
Very friendly and helpful staff, excellent upkeep and amenities. Spacious and modern room with quality linens. No problems with noise or otherwise.
The airport shuttle was precisely on time and very quick.

review.title: Would stay again!!!
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel. Great deal for the price. Great alternative to the more pricier wharf hotels.

review.title: Great Location and Facility
review.reviewText:
Very nice hotel, staff was very professional and helpful. Breakfast was very good. It is close to Dollar Rental Car so you can save money and take shuttle to hotel and pick and drop off your car much easier than doing it at the airport.

Will be back!
review.positiveRemarks: Clean and nice sized rooms
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: Good location, right on the water front walk, close to rental car services and airport

review.title: Convenient and quiet
review.reviewText:
We stayed one night as this is close to SFO. We had one not helpful desk clerk and one very helpful one. Our AC unit in our room froze up and then broke down at 5:30am, No apology from the "not helpful" clerk. In morning van run to the airport which was complimentary, Delta was the first stop on the dropoff loops which was great so it only took 10 minutes. The pickup from planes is more complicated as the van makes two stops after its final pickup at hotels not close to ours. THAT trip took almost half an hour including wait time outside the gates. The continental breakfast was very nice with plenty of food. However, many construction workers and several airport workers all "stopped in" for a free breakfast with the rest of the hotel guests, taking plenty of food for later also.
However, the hotel is quiet, clean and well kept and reasonably priced. These are minor problems overall that I listed.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenience and complimentary breakfast and van to airport
review.negativeRemarks: AC breaking down and the not so helpful clerk.
review.locationRemarks: Quiet but near SFO in a hotel district. Nearby is the Elephant Bar that has faulous food

review.title: Expensive !
review.reviewText:
The mattresses were really bad. There was no support at all. The mattresses were either worn out or cheap. My hips are still aching.
There are no restaurants in the hotel itself. We had to walk to the closest restaurant-The Elephant Bar (the Mexican one was being renovated) and there was an hour wait for a table!
The shuttle drivers were really nice and helpful. The front desk was helpful.
The room was clean, however the computer wire didn't work, so we had to go wireless.
It was expensive for what we got. The most expensive room of our CA stay for 8 days !

review.title: Crisp, clean, efficient, and pleasant.
review.reviewText: Check-in was crisp and efficient. Took about three minutes. Hotel is logically laid out with short walks to elevators and stairs. Breakfast coffee was tasty and hot. I did not sample the breakfast but it appeared ample for the number of customers. Check-out? Well, I had already paid upon check-in so it was a simple as walking out the door. My only quibble is that the name of the hotel is so anodyne that I could not remember it. Need something catchy.
review.positiveRemarks: clean and efficient

review.title: Great Hotel for a Family
review.reviewText: Fantastic Hotel. A pleasant surprise. Our family has 30 years experience in hotel management. Bay landing offers nice and clean rooms with Marble. The breakfast and parking are free and breakfast is excellent. Nice views of the Bay and you can see planes landing and taking off. We stayed 3 nights and our stay was above expectations.
review.positiveRemarks: Free Breakfast, Room, Bay Views, Free Parking
review.negativeRemarks: None

review.title: Pleasant stay.
review.reviewText: Nice airport hotel. Coffee, tea, water and apples are available at all times. There was even a day when they had free cookies. Breakfast is included every morning. I have some food allergies so all I could eat were the hard boiled eggs, but oh well. We stayed here with intentions of commuting to San Francisco everyday, which was easy because the hotel provides free shuttle service to the SFO BART station throughout the day (picks up every ~30 minutes).

review.title: A hotel should be
review.reviewText: Nice Stay,Good Location,Clean.Front desk helpfull.

review.title: a little disappointment
review.reviewText: GREETED BY A GUM CHEWING RECEPTIONIST AT THE FRONT DESK. WASN'T ASKED IF WE PREFER THE ROOM FACING THE BAY, AT LEAST NOT TO BE REALLY DISAPPOINTED THAT THE REASON why MOST PEOPLE BOOK IN THIS HOTEL IS THE EXPECTATION THAT THEY CAN HAVE THE RELAXING VIEW AT THE BAY. A LITTLE DISAPPOINTED.

review.title: Great overall experience
review.reviewText: We enjoyed our stay at Bay Landing immensely. The staff was friendly, the view was amazing. Restaurants were close by. The beds were firmer than we prefer, but not uncomfortable. The breakfast area was very crowded at 9 am. We parked at the Millbrae station and rode BART into San Francisco for the day, and it worked out perfectly for us. All in all we would highly recommend Bay Landing.
review.positiveRemarks: The view, the cleanliness
review.negativeRemarks: crowded breakfast area

review.title: Stay here is you're flying from SFO!
review.reviewText: I am very picky about hotel accommodations and don't usually give ratings of "5" unless the hotel is exceptional. We chose this hotel due to close proximity to SFO plus the great TripAdvisor ratings. It was an excellent choice. There were 3 of us in our family and we needed 3 beds. Due to fire codes they could not put a roll-away into the room I had booked but they upgraded us to a larger room which was able to accommodate a third bed. The room was VERY comfortable for the 3 of us. VERY clean and had everything we needed. It was very quiet at night and we all slept well. The hotel is on the bay and we saw many people running/walking the beautiful walkway along the bay. This hotel offers a free breakfast. The food was typical for a "free breakfast" but it was satisfactory. The women who were working that day kept the tables very clean, the coffee pots full, and the breakfast bar replenished. We ate dinner at the Elephant Bar which was right next door...it was an excellent choice!! Food was great and we watched as planes landed on the runways over the bay. 3 of us ate a full meals plus dessert for under $75.
review.positiveRemarks: proximity to SFO, clean hotel, room was large and smelled clean!
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing. this hotel was perfect for our needs.
review.locationRemarks: About half-mile south of SFO with VERY easy access to airport!

review.title: Satisfied customer
review.reviewText: This is the fifth or sixth time I have stayed at the Bay Landing Hotel. I keep returning there because it is clean, the rooms are spacious, the staff friendly and accommodating and the location very convenient to the airport and BART. I also like the fact that it is a non-smoking establishment.

review.title: Good business location
review.reviewText:
I like this hotel. Location is great, very well maintained, and a entities for this hotel level are nice. First time at this hotel, staff was friendly and upbeat. This recent visit, the staff seemed more detached. Not rude by any means, just a little more perfunctory about checking in, etc.

I would still consider staying here.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to SFO. Quiet and well maintained.
review.negativeRemarks: Staff seemed detached, overwhelmed.

review.title: Really nice, comfortable hotel. Great breakfast!
review.reviewText: I booked this hotel for a family trip to SF for a few days. The hotel exceeded our expectations. The room was extremely clean and included a small fridge, microwave, and really comfortable bed. High-quality furniture and fixtures. Even the toiletries were higher-end. Best breakfast that we've had at a hotel. Great view of the bay too. We didn't need much, but the hotel staff we interacted with were also nice and the front-desk staff were helpful. Of course the hotel is a bit of a drive to downtown, but the trade-off on the lower rate compared to other areas was well worth it for us.
review.positiveRemarks: Cleanliness, newness, and breakfast

review.title: Great hotel near SFO for late arrivals
review.reviewText: Got into the hotel at 2am just a short drive from SFO and slept soundly. Awoke to a good breakfast with healthy options for me and splurges for the kids. Clean facility, friendly front desk staff and quiet rooms despite noticing planes coming in over the bay a quarter mile away. Couldn't ask for more in a hotel near the airport.

review.title: Location, location, location....would stay again.
review.reviewText: Location was great. Stayed just one night before an early morning flight. Hotel was clean and comfortable. Despite it's lack of personality, it was about 30% cheaper than it's nearby competitors. Think of it as a non-branded Courtyard.

review.negativeRemarks: Front desk staff did not seem to appreciate my business

photos.caption: View from the back of the hotel

review.title: Nice hotel with a nice view!
review.reviewText:
It was better than my expectations. I stayed with my family. I got a room with a view to the bay. The hotel is right at the edge of the bay - a great place to walk and right next to El Torito ($3 Happy Hour Margaritas), Elephant Bar and Benihana. The continental breakfast was excellent as well with lots of fresh fruits, juices, waffles, pan cakes, boiled eggs, omelets, bacon, toasts, muffins, danish, cheese, cereals, coffee and tea. The rooms have a microwave, a small refrigerator a coffee maker, a wired and a wireless internet. I wish they had a decent LCD TV instead of the old tube TV. Also, the front desk person was a little rude - doesn't hurt to greet a guest with a smile.
* Overall we all enjoyed our stay at the hotel - worth the money spent *
review.positiveRemarks: Gorgeous view

review.title: Great stay, quiet and clean !
review.reviewText: We stayed here for two nights on a weekend getaway. Went to visit pier 39 and downtown Burlingame. Easy to get to all areas, hotel is near El Torritos and Bennihannahs we ate at both. Food was great at both places. You can see the planes landing at SFO and we could not hear them unless outside, well insulated, A/C quiet rooms. Staff was great, the free breakfast in the morning was nothing special but had coffee, juices, teas, cereals, and other items. We will stay here again when traveling to the bay area.
review.positiveRemarks: Quiet and clean
review.negativeRemarks: None

review.title: great hotel
review.reviewText: Great hotel. Top notch service and breakfast. Great view of the bay. The staff was friendly, knowledgeable, and very helpful. We would choose it over a chain any day for the price, facility, free internet access, parking, and service.

review.locationRemarks: convenient for us since it was near SFO

review.title: Top quality hotel at a reasonable price
review.reviewText: We stayed here for just one night in order to be close to the SFO airport for our morning flight. Bay Landing is a very,very clean and attractive hotel with nice furnishings and plenty of casual seating in the lobby. The staff was friendly and accommodating.There were a lot of choices not typically found in a complimentary hotel breakfast, such as Yoplait yogurt, raisin bread for toast, and waffles.I loved having real flatware and dishes for my meal: no plastic or paper goods! Our room was spacious and extremely comfortable. The room rate was super reasonable. Were this a chain hotel, it would be my top choice every time.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, spacious rooms, attractive appearance, great breakfast with real dishes, cups and flatware
review.negativeRemarks: Coffee was a little weak; fruit could have been fresher

I went with my family as my parents were traveling the following day. We arrived little earlier and they got us the room earlier.

The room was very nice and clean.

The breakfast was very good, which I think its very important, mainly if you are planing to travel and need to spend hours and hours in a domestic flight where they don't offer anything to eat.

Next to there they have El Torero and Elephant bar, so you will not find any problem for food at night. I think it was great.

review.title: exellent

It was so nice.
I would like to my friend.

review.title: Hotel Yes, Front Desk Staff, Not So Much
review.reviewText: The hotel is very convenient to SFO, and half the rooms face the bay with a view of the planes landing. Our room, which faced the bay, was very comfortable, and reasonably quiet. The only complaint is the desk staff. When we arrived, Julio and a woman were at the desk. Neither was on the phone or with a customer. Neither greeted us (no "Welcome" or "How can i help you?" or anything), and neither made eye contact. Julio checked us in, still never making eye contact or saying anything welcoming or the slightest bit friendly. He mentioned breakfast starting at 6:00, but we said we had to leave at 4:45 am. He said there would be coffee in the lobby or dining area by then, but there wasn't. I would definitely stay there again, but would hope the management, in the meantime, would understand the importance of a customer's first contact at the hotel, and staff the front desk with people more suited to the job.
review.positiveRemarks: The view of the bay and planes coming in
review.negativeRemarks: Front desk staff was unfriendly

review.title: Best stay in the area
review.reviewText: I was hesitant to book this hotel because I did not recognize the name as a national chain. After looking at the on-line reviews it appeared to be a nice location. I booked our first night of our week long trip close to the airport. After staying the first night we booked our last night at the same location. The hotel was very clean, well maintained and the bed was very comfortable. The free breakfast was well stocked with hot food items as well as cereal, oatmeal and pastries. I will definitely stay here when returning to San Francisco area.

review.title: Great location and hotel

review.title: Definitely going again
review.reviewText: The hotel is close to the SFO airport, but it's really quiet. My room window faces the bay, and the airport, and I sleep nice every night.

review.title: Great stay.
review.reviewText: Room was clean and in good condition. Very convenient to airport and Bart station with easy acces with shuttle service. Breakfast had nice variety. Bed could have been a little more comfortable.

review.title: The Place and the Price is right
review.reviewText:
I have stayed in most levels of hotels for both business and personal. I have stayed at the Hyatt Hotel which is right down the street from this one. It's twice as expensive and the quality is comparable. Other than breakfast which is more than adequate , there is no restaurant available on site, but three or four good restaurants with in waking distance.

it is a great value, the staff was friendly and competent . Close to the airport and central between SF and the Peninsula.
review.positiveRemarks: location , quality, price
review.negativeRemarks: None

review.title: Review
review.reviewText: We thought the hotel was so much prettier than it is portrayed in the photos which is saying a lot because the photos were beautiful. Staff was friendly and helpful. Continental breakfast was very good. We would stay here again and would recommend this to others as well.

review.title: Thankful for such a great place to stay!
review.reviewText: I chose this hotel for our last night in San Francisco because of it's proximity to the airport and the free shuttle to and from the airport. During our drive to the hotel; my husband realized he lost his driver's license. As we were to fly home the next day, we were VERY concerned. The hotel staff was fantastic! They worked with us and my Mom at home to get us a nice, color copy of my husband's passport so he could board the plane with me the next day. We are very indebted to the staff! The hotel was very nice. Fruit and cookies were waiting for us when we got there and there are restaurants close by - within walking distance. Breakfast the next morning was really nice as well. My only complaint is the thin walls of the hotel. We could hear the showers running in the rooms on either side of us - one at 3am!! Other than that, this is a great place to stay!

review.title: Restful stay
review.reviewText: This was a comfortable, quiet hotel. Continental breakfast was good and the service was excellent.
review.positiveRemarks: Quiet and free parking.
review.negativeRemarks: Lack of daily newspaper.
review.locationRemarks: 3rd floor

review.title: Nice Shore View
review.reviewText: Good view of the ocean, as well as the airport. Overall very nice scenery and location. However, the beds were spring beds, and weren't tooo comfortable, but they were acceptable. Very nice breakfast, and there was a great selection of foods. It was a bit crowded.
review.positiveRemarks: good view
review.negativeRemarks: beds
review.locationRemarks: very nice scenery, convenient to access restaurants.

review.title: Clean, comfortable, convenient
review.reviewText: We needed a convenient place to stay the night before we flew out of San Francisco, and this was perfect. Clean hotel with a very nice complimentary continental breakfast in the morning. Make sure to look on the counter at the reception desk for a little handout with directions to the car rental return at SFO - the route is a bit confusing and their directions were great.

review.title: Better than the big guys.
review.reviewText: This hotel was clean and comfortable, close to the airport (a little bit of airport noise). It had a lot of parking close to the room. There were many good places to eat nearby. We had just driven highway One and needed a place to spend the night before flying home. It was perfect for our needs and a good bargain as well.
review.locationRemarks: Great location, especially for the airport and lots of places to eat.

review.title: I would come here again!
review.reviewText: Checked numerous hotels for traveler's experience through tripadvisor before I chose this one. Very pleased with amenities, location, and condition of hotel.

review.title: Great choice for SFO
review.reviewText: Right on the Bay with a view of the long line of planes taking off from a runway across the water....but no sound of planes!!!!!

review.title: Would stay again
review.reviewText:
Very, very nice and clean. Big room and big bathroom. Microwave and refrigerator were nice though we only stayed a few hours before an early morning flight. Free parking.

Request a room facing the bay. We wish we would have, but it didn't matter given how long we were there. The hotel has a great view of the bay and of planes landing at the airport. We didn't hear any airplane noise in our room however.

If you will be returning a rental car, don't stop at the first gas station you see when you take the 419B exit. There is another gas station just down the road before you get to the hotel that is much cheaper.

Also, get good directions to the rental car return location. I think it's possible to take the access road but the signs were really bad. We ended up taking the interstate to the next exit down. From there the signs were easy to follow.

review.title: Good hotel for short stay
review.reviewText: Good hotel for short stay. reasonable price and good front desk service. little noisy at morning time. good breakfast and good upgrade on bathroom. highly recommended!!

review.title: Stay there
review.reviewText: Very good value for money.Good location with shuttle to airport and Burlingame.A fine breakfast and very healpfull staff

review.title: Wonderful!!!!
review.reviewText: What a beautiful hotel right on the bay!!!! The breakfast was wonderful with a wide variety of food to choose from. We drove in from Los Angeles, but this hotel is very close to the airport in San Francisco. If we ever come back to the west coast, I will for sure stay here again!!!!

review.title: It's nice here!
review.reviewText: When I arrived at the hotel, I was greeted with a smile and the staff was willing to assist me with any questions I had. The room had a view of the water which was beautiful. The breafast was fantastic. I was impresses. Iwill be staying again!

review.title: Great Hotel - Great Location
review.reviewText:
I stayed here for one night while on route to the East Coast of US and I was impressed during my stay. The previous reviews had got it right!!

The room was most comfortable and the staff were helpful. I tend to judge a hotel by the state of the bathroom. So often the bedrooms are great but the bathrooms not so. You know what I mean! Tired looking and you feel like you would like to give them a good scrub before you would even consider using them!! In this case the bathroom was spotless and the products for guest use were quite scrummy. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to others and will definitely be staying here again.

A big bonus for in transit passengers like myself was the free airport shuttle and the fact the hotel is only 5 minutes from the airport. There is also a great walking track just outside the hotel for a quick bay walk to shake off jet lag fuzzies. And once you have had a walk there are the delicious cookies available in the lobby.
review.positiveRemarks: Great location, comfortable rooms.

review.title: Great little place!
review.reviewText: I was a little shy about booking this hotel because it wasn't a chainy type hotel that I was used to. However, I am so glad that I decided to take a chance! Easy check-in, very clean room, and a wonderful breakfast. We even had a mini-fridge and a microwave in our room. Parking is free, and if you need the airport shuttle, they provide a list of times that it runs. I would recommend this hotel!
review.positiveRemarks: Shuttle and Breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: I prefer a flatter pillow, so I would say the pillows
review.locationRemarks: Close to a bar and a mexican restaurant. Quick airport access.

review.title: great hotel near SFO
review.reviewText: Wonderful receptionist. They were actually full but found us a room at the last minute. Free Parking and Internet - fabulous breakfast. - definitely will stay again

review.title: Splendid
review.reviewText: I've stayed at Bay Landing hotel twice, and both experiences were excellent. The hotel is kept very clean; the rooms are immaculate and aromatically fresh. The breakfast bar is well stocked with plenty of selections for both the health conscious and the competitive eater. The exercise room has well maintained and good quality machines, and you can look out over the bay and watch the airplanes land as you do your cardio. The staff is both professional and discreet, and they are always friendly and helpful. You have around the clock access to the airport shuttle which can also get you to the BART transit system; an efficient way to get to and from San Francisco (downtown). The best part is being near the bay; there is a walking/running path along the water that is landscaped in places with beautiful gardens. There are also good restaurants on both sides of the hotel that also look out over the bay. I could keep going on, but I think I've made my point. Great place!
review.positiveRemarks: Clean and quiet room, the gym, fresh cooked waffles with blueberry syrup for breakfast, view of the bay, and a place to get my run in!
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: The location is in a hotel and business park environment, but also shoulders the bay and has great views. I felt safe when I went for a run.

review.title: A good hotel for transiting through SFO.
review.reviewText: A comfortable stay; the hotel is in v good condition, rooms are comfortable and often with a bay view, breakfast is solid, staff worked hard to be helpful, airport shuttle was frequent. But it is a long way from anywhere: the bay is pretty enough, but you're really only going to come here as part of an airport transfer: it's too far and too awkwardly placed to realistically serve as a base for exploring San Francisco.

review.title: Bay landing hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel is in a grat location to commute to San Fran . We have been staying there for 6 year and the staff is nice and enjoy it very much
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast included
review.locationRemarks: near SFO

review.title: WONDERFUL PLACE
review.reviewText: Wonderful place, the rooms were really nice with a great view of the bay. Comfortable beds except for the pillows. Overall, we had a great experience staying at this hotel and would stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: The bath room.
review.negativeRemarks: The pillows
review.locationRemarks: Great!!!

review.title: perfect before morning flight -or really anytime
review.reviewText:
my wife and I were delighted with this hotel; it's very well run, all-business, but courteous staff; wifi, well furnished and very clean. somewhat wider rooms than most hotels of this kind (motels); excellent breakfast available, and included in rate. nice place to walk along the bay and watch planes landing if that's of interest. it's is just south of the exit for the SF airport. a very quick and reliable shuttle in the morning.

the mexican restaurant next door was very good, and reasonable.

review.title: Great Pre-Flight Stay
review.reviewText: Great hotel for a pre-flight stay...or any other time! Nice room, quiet for a good night's sleep before an early flight and friendly staff make this my #1 choice for a pre-travel stay. I would even pick this hotel for leisure, too - great location as it's right on the water.

review.title: Bay view Landing a real treat
review.reviewText: We had a wonderful time, Their continental breakfast was huge and extensive, the facilities were beautiful. the only problem was they state you get free local phone calls but that is only within a 3mile radius everything else gets charged a fee. other than that, it was awesome.
review.positiveRemarks: Continental Breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: No free local phone use
review.locationRemarks: 3miles from SFO airport, great alternative from the Hyatt where our conference was.

review.title: Wonderful stay- will return
review.reviewText: We picked the hotel based on other reviews for a late arrival into SFO. Our experience was so nice that we came back for another night before flying out of SFO. They thought of everything so that we didn't have to.
review.positiveRemarks: Large comfortable rooms, great staff, clean and quiet.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport, free parking, breakfast buffet.

review.title: A hidden gem
review.reviewText: Clean room, easy to access from US101, lovely view of the bay. Only negative was that we had an early flight from SFO and while breakfast was set up in the lobby before 6AM, the staff member said we couldn't sit down to eat until 6:30AM, which was too late (and seemed unnecessary.)

review.title: Great Value and Service
review.reviewText: A very good value with very friendly staff, clean rooms, great location. Very service oriented, and it shows. Quality of towels and paper goods less than expected but other than that, a perfect stay.
review.positiveRemarks: Location and very strong emphasis on customer service.
review.negativeRemarks: Towels a bit small.
review.locationRemarks: Easy to find and wonderfully close to SFO. Great launching point for seeing the Bay area.

review.title: BREAKFAST! Ice water! Directions!
review.reviewText: We would definitely go back. We have been in the Inn business and know what to look for in the way a hotel is taken care of. This hotel was well maintained, constantly cleaned, well run staff, and, the best, free continental breakfast we've had. Most free breakfast have us running away for breakfast somewhere else. We ate there the whole week. Do you want to hear about the breakfast? 3-4 juices daily, 4-5 cold cereals plus oatmeal packets, 4 fresh fruits daily, yogurt, cottage cheese, waffles with 3 wonderful fruit toppings, scrambled eggs, hard boiled eggs, string cheese for extra protein, selection of about 10 pastries, toast, bagels, cream cheese, peanut butter, jams, jellies, syrup, coffee, tea selection, and I'm sure I've left something out. And I know this seems small but ice water in the lobby all day. Nothing could have been better after a long day! One more final item, if you asked for directions, they had a printed sheet on file to hand you. Amazing!
review.positiveRemarks: Perfect
review.negativeRemarks: I should tell you the place was awful....This review may mean they won't have room for us next time!
review.locationRemarks: Perfect for us. Between new grand baby and San Francisco. Beautiful stroll along the bay.

review.title: Horrible check in
review.reviewText: I arrived at the Bay Landing hotel and waited and waited to check in. There was no one at the front desk. After 10 minutes passed I called the hotel asking if there was any one here to check me in and that I had been waiting 10 minutes. She then came out from a back room and argued with me about how long I had actually been waiting. I was shocked in stead of just apologizing and moving on she just gave me a dirty look. I felt the room was average they needed new bedding and curtains. I would not stay here again nor recommend it.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport

review.title: Wonderful Hotel and Staff
review.reviewText: What a fantastic hotel. We had a few issues with the hotel room key when we checked in but that was swiftly resolved. The staff are all friendly and helpful. The room was clean and spacious. The breakfast selection was good and included cereal, pancakes, make your own waffles, fruit, yogurt, toast, pastries, fresh juices - orange, graperuit, cranberry, bagels and croissants. The breakfast was always topped up and you never had to wait for things to be topped up. The breakfast staff were polite. There was always plenty of parrking. There were complimentary cookies and beverages such as tea and coffee available during the day. I would stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Excellent service
review.locationRemarks: Great location

review.title: Great Place
review.reviewText:
It is a nice place… my friends and I had 2 rooms for the Easter weekend. It was clean and sweet place… the breakfast is awesome :) lots of options.

The view is OK… one of my friends likes airplanes and used to spend few mins after we come back to the hotel just to watch airplanes landing and taking off from the airport.

review.title: Excellent Hotel Near the Airport
review.reviewText:
Enjoyed the rooms, the location, view and the service. I would definitely come back.
Excellent Breakfast - but dining room is a little cramped and its hard to maneuver to get around people.
review.positiveRemarks: View and room.
review.negativeRemarks: Cramped breakfast area
review.locationRemarks: View of Bay overlooking airport, 10 miles south of SF City.

review.title: First time in San Francisco
review.reviewText: Our first time to San Francisco and the hotel was clean, quiet, tastefully decorated and overall a very pleasant stay.Room was large but double bed a bit small for our teenage sons. But a quick delivery of a rollaway bed solved the problem and the room was plenty big to accomodate it. Breakfast was plentiful and refillled often. Overall, the hotel was clean, nicely decorated and suprisingly quiet for being close to the airport. We enjoyed our 3 night stay.We originally thought it was a bit closer to SanFrancisco but the BART/train station was just a mile away. So we left our car and took the 1/2 hour train ride in to San Fran and it worked out okay. Except, Embarcadero station is as far as you can go downtown. So, if you're trying for Fisherman's Wharf, you'll need to take a cab or be ready for a long walk after you depart the train.
review.positiveRemarks: large room, nicely decorated
review.negativeRemarks: a bit far from San Francisco

review.title: Quick one night stay near airport
review.reviewText: We liked the hotel, it was charming. My only complaint was the mattress was too hard for me. Nice area to be so close to airport.

review.title: Would stay here again...
review.reviewText: Fast check in, really nice room. Breakfast was average, they really need to add a few tables. Several families were standing over tables waiting to jump on one...
review.positiveRemarks: Fast check in, super clean, easy parking...
review.negativeRemarks: Old style TV, more seating needed for breakfast
review.locationRemarks: easy to get to,

review.title: WONDERFUL HOTEL
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing Hotel is a wonderful hotel for business travelers, families and couples getaway. The view of the bay is beautiful and there is a nice walking/jogging path along the bay. Don't get your hopes up over the free breakfast, it is passable but not anything to get excited about. We did however, enjoy the complimentary warm cookies in the afternoon. A great hotel!
review.positiveRemarks: Quiet and clean.
review.negativeRemarks: Free breakfast was mediocre.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport, wonderful view of the bay.

review.title: Wonderful surprise!
review.reviewText: We were pleasantly surprised at the wonderful location between great restaurants, right on the bay with a nice boardwalk joining them all. The hotel was wonderful, quiet and clean. Enough said!

review.title: Great find!
review.reviewText: Very comfortable stay. Very good find by Expedia!!

review.title: Dependable and great value
review.reviewText: Always comfortable. Great value. Recommend eating at Taste In Mediterrannean on Broadway.

review.title: Greeting on arrival
review.reviewText: Desk clerk was not friendly. I felt as if I was a bother.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: Beautiful hotel in a great location. I would highly recommend staying here if you are going to visit San Francisco.
review.positiveRemarks: Hotel was clean and modern but had an old world feel.
review.locationRemarks: Hotel is right on the water. Even though it is near SF airport, I couldn't hear any airplanes.

review.title: The right place to stay!
review.reviewText: We had a beautiful room with a view of the bay.The beds were comfortable with plenty of pillows. Great breakfast available each morning.

review.title: Very good hotel for SFO
review.reviewText: Good hotel, good service, good location, friendly & helpful front dest staff. Conveniently back and forth to & from SFO, Millbrae BART Station/Caltrain Station. Several good restarants close to hotel, even by walking. I could stay this good hotel again when I stop over San Francisco again.

review.title: Close to the San Fran Airport...
review.reviewText: The hotel was fine and the room was nice and clean. We arrived late and unfortunately there are only two eateries within walking distance and both had just closed. No room service available but they sold frozen dinners, pizzas, etc. at the front desk (along with drinks and ice cream treats). The price on each frozen dinner was $3 or 4 so not crazy expensive and we were glad to have something to eat. The room had a fridge and microwave so at least we were able to eat something after our long day of traveling. The room was a bit noisy due to planes taking off at the nearby SF Airport, but we were so tired once we fell asleep we never heard them again! Lol.The continental breakfast didn't start until 6:30am and we needed to leave by 5:15am to catch our flight, but they had coffee out and my wife was able to get a few bananas for us and some other guests by asking a hotel employee. Overall a positive experience.
review.positiveRemarks: Nice clean room with microwave and fridge.
review.negativeRemarks: No room service and some airport noise.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the SF Airport.

review.title: Excellent value and perfect for families!
review.reviewText: The hotel was very clean and comfortably furnished. The room was large and perfect for families. The complimentary breakfast offered so many options, far more than the usual fare. The hotel anticipated our needs and we were very happy with our stay. The value you get for the price you pay is excellent and we will definitely stay there again.
review.positiveRemarks: So many breakfast offerings!
review.negativeRemarks: Everything was great!
review.locationRemarks: Good, safe and convenient location. Just 2 doors down from the Elephant Bar (a great restaurant)!

review.title: A very good hotel for the prize
review.reviewText: A good hotel for the prize nice clean one nigth stay passing to Lake tahoe close to SFO

review.title: What a Hidden Gem!
review.reviewText:
Hotels prices at the airport were so high the night we needed to stay inorder to catch an early morning flight. I never heard of the Bay Landing Hotel let alone the city of Burlingame! I was amazed there's so much going on in this little town and was blown away by the size of this hotel from the outside.

We were met by friendly and courtous staff. I had several questions regarding returning a rental car and coming back that night. He gave me a schedule and the driver was spot on.
When we entered our room, I was amazed at the size and how clean and in good condition all the furniture and bathrooms were kept. In the morning we had an early breakfast. Although they say waffles and hard boiled eggs, they surprised us with bacon, sausage and mini omelets. The fresh fruits and all the beverages were an excellent touch. The breakfast was so good, we decided to take a latter shuttle so we could take our time and enjoy it.

The Bay Landing Hotel was such a excellent experience. It was everything an older traveller would want in a hotel. Quiet, clean, spacous rooms, cozy, excellent breakfast and awesome rates.

review.title: Perfect stay for early flight from SFO
review.reviewText: Airport shuttle prompt to and from SFO. Several nearby restaurants and a gas station. Checked in to hotel and dropped off the wife, filled rental car with gas and drove to SFO rental return, free shuttle back to hotel for night's sleep, then free shuttle back to SFO for early flight. All worked perfect.
review.positiveRemarks: Shuttle service

review.title: nice hotel
review.reviewText: Nice breakfast and gym facility. We especially enjoyed a walk along the bike trail that is across from the hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: good night's sleep.

review.title: Okay but not great
review.reviewText: Good for a close to the airport hotel. Breakfast was good also.

review.title: Nice Hotel by the Airport
review.reviewText: I stayed here one night. Nice to walk by the bay during the day. The hotel was very clean, and the staff were very friendly. Free wifi in the rooms. Good place for a short stay. It is expensive to get into the city of San Francisco by taxi approx. $50/$60, so if you are looking to go into the city but don't want to take transit, I would not stay here. Otherwise a great hotel to get to the airport. They offer a free shuttle to and from the airport.

review.title: Great location, high quality
review.reviewText: Equivalent to any major chain hotel's permium brands. On a waterfront walking path. Several chain restuarants within walking distance. Short drive to downtown Millbrae restaurants. I did not try the free breakfast (opens at 6 AM but my flight was at 7 AM).

review.title: Very satisfied
review.reviewText: The hotel was nice and the staff was friendly. I liked the fact that there were two restaurants within walking distance.

review.title: So-so
review.reviewText: This hotel has a shuttle to/from the airport, but we waited for 30 minutes for it to pick us up after we landed. Meanwhile, three cycles of shuttles from other hotels -- Hilton, Hyatt, Westin, etc. -- came and went. Something to keep in mind if you're depending on relatively prompt shuttle pickup. Otherwise the hotel is nice enough. The carpet was somewhat stained and the beds weren't very comfortable in our room, but the lobby is fine and the breakfast service looked all right. I probably won't stay there again, but it wasn't terrible.
review.locationRemarks: Fairly close to the airport. Nice view of the bay.

review.title: Great place to stay!
review.reviewText: This hotel is a gem.The decor is beautiful. The staff knowledgeable, professional and friendly. The complimentary breakfast is filling. The workout room was clean with up-to-date equipment. I recommend this hotel to anyone coming to san Francisco.

review.title: Shower pressure is lousy
review.reviewText: Everything is ok except shower pressure . Do hope it can be improved and definitely will stay there again

review.title: Great location and staff
review.reviewText:
Although I only paid for a standard king, when I checked in about 6:30 pm and explained I was a light sleeper and wanted to be in the back off the hwy., I was upgraded to a Bay view room, which was indeed very quiet.
I would have given an overall higher rating except that the bed spread and towels were old. The decor seemed a little tired and in need of updating.

review.title: Excellent Choice-Looks more expensive than it is!
