review.reviewText: I based my decision for this hotel on the other reviews, location (to the airport) & price. The hotel itself is clean, up to date and beautifully decorated. The room was cozy, with more of a modern-country decor (pine furniture) and very roomy...lots of space between the end of the bed & the TV cabinet & walls. It had a large closet, iron & safe. The bathroom was very clean & also roomy. Nice pressure on the shower head. Has a hair dryer & make-up mirror. The only criticism I have is that the lighting could be better (overhead would be good). It was a little dark with the drapes drawn or at night. The complimentary breakfast was fantastic...waffle maker, omelets, pancakes, 5 different cereals, 5 different yogurts, several types of fruit & fruit salad, bagels, raisin bread, rolls, muffins, 3 different juices...you name it! And coffee & a large selection of teas available all day and night. The ladies in the breakfast area were very nice, as were the ones at the front desk. The back of the hotel faces water and it looked like there was a nice patio out back as well, but the weather was so bad we didn't get to enjoy the view. I impressed my family with my choice...again! My (picky) mom couldn't stop talking about how nice it was..."Good job!" It was only a 2 night stay for a funeral & if I ever go back to San Francisco, I would definitely stay there. It was easy to get to downtown SF and the airport. I would highly recommend it. (The flight & car rental is another story!!)
review.positiveRemarks: The breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: Lighting
review.locationRemarks: Very close to the airport. Downtown San Francisco wasn't too far either.

review.title: Perfect for SFO overnight delays
review.reviewText: Due winter weather, my flight was cancelled and I had to stay during a business trip one night in the SFO area. I randomly found this hotel in Expedia. The hotel is nicely located at waterfront with bay view. Rooms are very clean and spacious with a desk for laptop work. Internet access was free and fast. Breakfast was good for a complementary one. The fitness room was unusual large with new equipment and several weight lifting machines. Only negative point: I waited 40 minutes at SFO for the complementary shuttle, finally gave up and paid for a cab ($12.30+tip). On the way back to SFO, the shuttle was great and in time. There are a lot of nice waterfront restaurants around, but I had no time for testing. I think this hotel is primarily developed for tourists who stay some days in this area, but it would be my favorite for any business trip around SFO or my next overnight delay at SFO.
review.positiveRemarks: Fitness room, location, room size, Internet access, view to the bay, area around
review.negativeRemarks: shuttle from SFO
review.locationRemarks: close to SFO, nice restaurants with bay view around, silent (no highway close by)

review.title: A great deal
review.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this hotel. The lobby was open with a fire in the fireplace and a spacious area for the complimentary breakfast. The hotel is on the bay, with easy access to a running trail along the water. The room was large and clean.

review.title: Excellent Value
review.reviewText: I chose this hotel because so many Expedia users rated it highly. It's as convenient at the upscale Marriott and Westin hotels near the airport--and not nearly as expensive. It's a great value and I wish there were more hotels this good at this price.
review.positiveRemarks: Location
review.negativeRemarks: None
review.locationRemarks: Superb

review.title: Terrific hotel!
review.reviewText: This is a well run, tastfully decorated, conveniently located boutique hotel that is clean, comfortable and friendly. Has a very nice "continental" breakfast that includes omelettes, bacon, sausage, hot waffles, etc. Great exercise room too.

review.title: Enjoyed our stay there.
review.reviewText: This is one of the nicest hotels to stay in the area close to the airport. The service desk was very friendly and helpful. The room was clean, comfortable and very pleasant and the daily breakfast was a welcome addition to their great rate. Will stay there again if we are in the area.

review.title: Don't Drive to this Property
review.reviewText: Hotel service and cleanliness satisfactory. Parking lot not patrolled. New Lexus was broken into. Was contacted by front desk at 9:00 the next morning.

review.title: Would stay here again
review.reviewText: Clean room, good service, free parking, free wifi, free breakfast, good coffee. A lot of hotels in the area charge for parking, which I find ridiculous. I was pleasantly surprised when I stayed here, because it's a good price for everything you need. I would definitely stay here again and the bonus is that it's right on the bay so it's quite beautiful while you sip your coffee in the morning sitting out in the outdoor patio.

review.title: excellent hotel
review.reviewText: We were only here one night on a stopover between flights but found this hotel to be really good. The check in was quick and easy, the rooms clean and comfortable and the breakfast good. Great place to stay.

review.title: Good Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: Although the price is increasing, it is still a good airport hotel.

review.title: clean. convenient, close to airport and fill up for rental car is next door
review.reviewText: It was a convenient clran and friendly spot for a short stay. The view of bay is breathtaking. Friendly staff. The breakifast is so_so.

review.title: Great Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: Overall, very satisfied with our stay at the Bay Landing San Francisco Airport Hotel.

review.title: Great hotel for a reasonable price
review.reviewText: I usually prefer to stay at Hilton on Marriott brand hotels but the prices for these brands in that area are unusually high so I did some research and found Bay Landing with great reviews at a good price point. The room is the usual, clean and ok. It has a decent gym room and is located walking distance from El Torito, Elephant Bar and a Benihana. You can also take a 5 min drive to Broadway St, (downtown?) Burlingame where there are several restaurants. They offer free breakfast, wi-fi and parking so I have no complaints at all and would stay there again for work or vacation.
review.locationRemarks: Broadway St in Burlingame - has several good restaurants and bars.

review.title: Wonderful Visit
review.reviewText: Our stay was perfect. Everything was excellent: the room, the continental breakfast, the hotel itself. Restaurants were next door. View on the bay was great. Minutes from the airport; easy to get to. It is a drive from northern San Francisco & Fisherman's Wharf or the Golden Gate Bridge.

review.title: Great Value
review.reviewText: I enjoyed my stay here. From the moment I entered the shuttle bus the driver was wonderful and informative to the last checkout...everything was perfect!

review.title: Good SFO airport hotel
review.reviewText:
This is a good, clean hotel within close proximity of San Francisco airport. It's location is right on the bay, and the views from the hotel on the east side are stunning. Free Wifi (works well), good fitness center (modern equipment) and the location make this ideal for business travellers looking for comfort on a budget. I particularly like the access to the Bay Running path which goes right through the hotel.

There is no swimming pool - stay at the CourtYard in Foster City if this is impoprtant to you.

review.title: Great Place to STay
review.reviewText: I have stayed at Bay Landing three times for multipule days, great place to stay, two good places to eat within walking distance.

review.title: Really a good one!
review.reviewText: Cozy and convenient, certainly will come again!

review.title: very satisfied
review.reviewText: very convenient to airport. Staff very friendly and helpful. room comfortable.

review.title: Nice Hotel in S F
review.reviewText: Although hotel is a little way away from San Francisco (1/2 hour drive), it is conveniently located to S F Int'l Airport. Hotel itself is great, relatively new and is right on the water. It is handy to the freeway for those who are self driving, or is on the pick up route for most tours, and had no problems getting into S F to do the tourist things. Would stay there again.

review.title: Good for airport stopover
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing Hotel is convenient for the airport and offers a very reliable shuttle service. There is very little around this hotel if you have a long stopover although can highly recommend the Japanese steakhouse next door. The hotel has a superb view of planes taking off and landing and we were lucky enough to spend a sunny day walking along the water's edge watching just this. The appearance of the Bay Landing is of a hotel but the facilities are more that of a motel. It does provide breakfast but there was no bar/lounge for drinks or snacks. It does however sell frozen meals and there are microwaves in each room. The front desk staff were all very helpful.

review.title: Great Airport Hotel
review.reviewText:
We stayed here twice as we were flying on from San Francisco. The hotel was comfortable, reasonable, close to the airport and situated on the bay. Breakfast ie self service cereals, fruit, muffins, pancakes, toast provided. Coffee etc and sometimes cookies available in reception! Clothes washing facilities if you want them. Airport bus runs regularly, go online to see the timetable - quite useful at the airport end if you don't want to wait at the bus stop.

Mexican restaurant/bar next door and open till 10pm, not much else but it was fine for us
Recommended as an airport hotel.

review.title: Excellent Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel is in an excellent location as a stop over hotel to San Francisco Airport. There is a free shuttle bus from the airport which runs regularly. The room was spacious and well equipt. There was a free continental breakfast. There is a small shop in the hotel and a computer where you can access the internet for free and print boarding cards etc. There are two restaurants just across the car park which was convenient for grabbing a bite to eat.

review.title: San Francisco Trip & Surrounding Areas
review.reviewText: Hotel was more than I expected! Easy to find, minutes from the airport. Front desk was extremely helpful. Free continental breakfast got a little old after 2 days but none the less, it was something. My daughter and husband enjoyed the comp. cookies in the evening. Def. need to rent a car IF your going to be going to other surrounding cities and sights. Hotel parking was free and that was a plus. Parking in and around SF is horrible and very expensive. Best option, take the hotel shuttle to airport and catch BART (S.F. Rail), runs 5am - 12 midnight. There are 2 establishments to eat near the hotel, unless you really want to walk a few miles, so be prepared. Some places will deliver to Bay Landing. Overall the hotel is pretty quiet, inspite of it being near the airport. Would definately stay there again.

review.title: The perfect location for the "Night Before the Flight"
review.reviewText:
This was the third time we have used the Bay Landing as the "night before an SFO flight" hotel.

It is an ideal combination of location, price and comfort. And, you get a free breakfast!

review.title: Great Hotel!
review.reviewText: This was a great hotel with ample parking, restaurants within walking distance, clean nicely appointed rooms, great complimentary breakfast selection....couldn't have been more pleased, would highly recommend.

review.title: Great family friendly hotel
review.reviewText: Great hotel for family getaways. Breakfast buffet is excellent. Free parking, highway closely and quiet.

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: I would recommend the Bay Landing hotel to anyone. The service was outstanding. The building is beautiful. The view was excellent. We were very pleased.

review.title: Great San Francisco Airport hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel, tho maybe not 5 star, was very comfortable, newer and very clean. It had a great view overlooking the bay and able to watch airplanes take off and land at the close by airport. It was not right downtown, but just off the highway, so about a 20-30 minute drive into downtown (depending on traffic), but avoids the hassle of parking downtown. The breakfast buffet was great and more than expected with a wide variety of selections.

review.title: Great hotel right by the airport
review.reviewText: We had an early flight out of SFO so we booked this hotel based on its proximity to the airport. It was very convienent because the shuttle picked us up right on time and delivered us to the terminal. The rooms were nice and they had fresh baked cookies in the lobby. There were also a few restaurants within walking distance. I would highly recommend it.

review.title: great location
review.reviewText: the location is very convenient; breakfast is fine; shuttle to airport easy (5 or 6 minutes); price is right

review.title: Satisfaction
review.reviewText:
My husband and I have stayed at Bay Landing Hotel 3 times now. We have always enjoyed staying there because it's so close to SFO airport. We were promptly greeted at the door when arriving. The hotel is always very clean and looks really nice.

The only thing I didn't like were the pillows, they seem to be too small and the shower faucet was having some issues and was not streaming water properly. Considering that we were taking showers at 2am it was kind of frustrating because we wanted to get in a nice shower before we headed out to the airport for our flight home.

I do recommend this hotel because it's always been great and there are some good restaurants around as well. Plus it looks right out onto the ocean and if you get a room with a view of the water it's wonderful!!!

review.title: Comfortable Room/Great Complimentary Breakfast
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing San Francisco is a very nice, reasonably priced hotel overlooking the bay within 2 minutes of the SF airport. Rooms were large and comfortable. Fitness room was a plus. The complimentary continental breakfast included everything that one might hope for.

review.title: Good place to stay!
review.reviewText: Bay Landing was a good place to stay. It was clean and well maintained. I enjoyed that it was very quiet in the room and also not a bunch of kids running around. Close to the airport so you can get back to the airport very easy.

review.title: Not bad!
review.reviewText:
Breakfast is a plus with many nice choices.
The DOUBLE bed was tight when sharing it with my daughter. Sheets were "stiff" and mattress not so comfy. Didn't sleep well.
The front desk staff was superior. Very helpful!
Morning shuttle driver was top-notch.
Location is fine if you have a car. If relying on the BART, it's a little inconvenient.

review.title: Didn't even leave the front desk to come and help me. I clearly have a disability. Very ANNOYED!!!!
review.reviewText: I have already said all I need to say. Plus "Don't stay there"

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Bad service with the shuttle to the airport however. We had an early flight and the shuttle driver didnt show up on the morning of our flight. Left 8 people waiting. Finally, the front desk called a cab at their expense.

review.title: Excellent choice! Would definitely recommend this hotel to others.
review.reviewText: I booked this hotel because after comparing it to others it offered more for the money. It had a free airport shuttle, free continental breakfast and free parking. The reviews were good as well so I went with it. I was VERY pleased when I arrived. The hotel was beautiful and clean and the staff was so friendly. They got on-line to give me directions to a resturaunt and were very helpful in advising me of the airport shuttle as I was there to pick my daughter up from the airport. I traveled with a friend and her daughter and they were very impressed as well. The room was large and had a great view of the planes flying in over the Bay. Although we were close to the airport, I could not hear it. The contenintal breakfast was not just a muffin or doughnut. It had many choices including Belgium waffles. Our stay was pleasant and I would not hesitate to stay there again. I highly recommend this hotel.

review.title: Fantastic Place to Stay in SF
review.reviewText: Service level was fantastic. Room decor was great and had a great San Fran feel. Loved being close to Union Square. Easy access to transportation from hotel (trolleys, cabs, train to airport, and cable cars). Great restaurants nearby and it is easy to get to Fisherman's Wharf. Spent the 4th and the fireworks were first rate. Room was spotless. Internet connection was fast! I would stay here on our next trip.

review.title: A very new and nice hotel
review.reviewText:
The hotel is very new and well maintained.
The down side... it's not in downtown SF.

review.title: Excelent Service an accomodation!
review.reviewText: Staff personnels were very helpful and friendly. It's good to see smiling faces, you know that they enjoy what they're doing. Our room was kept neat and clean all 4 days of our stay. I requested a room with view of the bay and that's exactly what I got! LOVE,LOVE, LOVE it!!!! We will definitely book our stay again when we return to San Francisco, CA or nearby city.

review.title: Exceeded expectation...
review.reviewText: I didn't know what to expect when booking. I thought we'd end up in an okay, suites-style chain motel. What a pleasant surprise we found upon our arrival. Great location, great service, and great facility. They even have a lending library in the lobby!

review.title: Nice Place
review.reviewText: The hotel was very nice. The breakfast was very good, great selection and fresh fruits. Tea and coffee service all the time and cookies in the late afternoon. Ample parking and friendly employees at the lobby desk. Very happy with the stay.

review.title: Always an excellent value
review.reviewText: This is one of the best hotels in terms of customer service. It's my go-to whenever I am in San Francisco.

review.title: Great!
review.reviewText: We were very pleasantly surprised by this hotel. We got a great deal on expedia and it turned out to be the nicest hotel of our stay. Great breakfast, great room, great deal!

review.title: Great Hotel - Would go back 100%
review.reviewText: This was our last night in San Francisco, we arrived around 9pm on a saturday night and it took me about 5 mins to check in. I had put a request in to have a bayview room in a quiet area and my request was met, had a great room at the end of the hall with a nice view of the bay. Room was very clean and comfortable. Breakfast was free and great with a wide assortment including make your own waffles (with strawberrys and whipped cream), yogurt, bacon, eggs, fruit, assortment of breads and cereals, tea, coffee.... There is a free airport shuttle and free parking onsite. Very quick ride to the airport (about 5 mins). Would definitely stay here again. Great value for the money.

review.title: Great place to stay near the airpolrt
review.reviewText: This is a great place to stay near the airport, very clean and nice hotel. The only thing was the bed was not that comfortable but that could have been just in our room.

review.title: A great hotel
review.reviewText: We booked this hotel based on the ratings and proximity to San Francisco. At the desk, I asked for a room with a view if possible, and she set us up with one. Check-in was blazing fast, everyone that worked there was professional and helpful. The room was neat and clean, the internet was speedy. Breakfast had an astounding array of choices. It was one of the biggest breakfast affairs I've seen at a hotel as part of the package. Another perk was free parking. It was close, convenient and well worth the price paid for the night. I'm sure we'll stay there again.

review.title: One of the Best Hotel
review.reviewText:
The hotel - Very clean, quiet. Lobby is nicely decorated, ample parking, friendly staff

The room - Very clean, nicely decorated, very comfortable beds. Love the make-up mirror and hair dryer. The refrigerator in the room is a bonus. The air conditioning unit has a remote control which is wonderful because you don't have to get up to change the setting.

Complimentary breakfast is a big plus. Lots of choices. The dining area is cozy, clean and simply beautiful.

review.title: close to airport and BART station
review.reviewText: very nice hotel,friendly helpful staff,excellent continental breakfast,near airport but easy to get into city.would stay again

review.title: I'll be back
review.reviewText: We've stayed here several times. Most recently we had a problem with the light in the bathroom and a microwave not worrking properly. The maintenance person was out that day so we were upgraded to a very nice suite for the balance of our stay. Great way to keep repeat guests happy!

review.title: I'd go there again.
review.reviewText: Our room was great! Large, clean, a nice view of SF bay. Nice breakfast included. I'd go back!

review.title: Very Impressed with the hotel and location to the airport
review.reviewText: The hotel was great! Very close to the Airport and very clean. Great taxi to the airport.

review.title: Great place to stay!
review.reviewText: Wonderful hotel! Everything they advertised was true.

review.title: Great Bargain!
review.reviewText:
I was able to get a good price through Expedia. I compared prices using several other sites and trying different locations in San Francisco. In the end I was very satisfied with the price and the location. I was only 15 minutes away from downtown and was able to experience most of the tourist attraction without too much trouble. I rented a car and was able to travel the surrounding area such as Napa and Muir Woods.
We arrived late on a Saturday night and there was only one room left on the ground floor however the desk clerk was very nice and asked us to come by the desk the next morning and she would move us to a better room.

review.title: Great Place
review.reviewText: Excellent staff and accommodations. Room was quite large and very clean. Prompt shuttle service to and from SFO. Room was very quiet even with a college baseball team in attendance. The best "continental" breakfast I've ever seen. Not many restaurants close to the hotel,so if you don't have a vehicle your dining choices are a little limited.( Although the restaurants that are near were pretty good.)

review.title: A little gem by SFO
review.reviewText: This little hotel was a gem. It's so close to the airport, but without the noise. Our room was spacious and clean. There was a refrigerator and a microwave. Unfortunately, we were not able to try the breakfast in the morning. We were able to enjoy fresh, hot , baked cookies at the front desk at 4 pm. We would definitely stay here again. It was so convenient and clean.

review.title: nice hotel near airport
review.reviewText: I have stayed at this hotel a few times. It has free parking, free breakfast and free internet access in my room. It is clean and is quiet.

review.title: happy stay hotel
review.reviewText: good breakfast, require to change new pillows (too flat).

review.title: Must Stay Airport Hotel! You will enjoy it
review.reviewText: I recently stayed at the Bay Landing Hotel for 2 different stays in the span of one week when I needed easy access to SFO. I chose the hotel bc of the very high reviews on Trip Advisor. The rates were incredibly low ... and I wondered about the quality of the facilities, but TA had not let me down before, and thus I booked it. What a gem! This is a must stay hotel, on any stay in San Francisco, or for easy access to SFO airport. The rooms are spacious, the views overlooking the water are beautiful, the hotel is quiet, and the staff are courteous. Complimentary breakfast and free parking are a plus, as well as proximity to nearby Broadway Burlingame or Millbrae, where there are restaurants and grocery stores. I highly recommend this place to everyone!

review.title: Good Value Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: I have stayed at the Bay Landing two times on the recommendations of previous reviewers, and agree with the high ratings they have given this hotel. An excellent choice if you need to be near the airport, and within a short walk of two decent restaurants. You may have to wait a bit for the courtesy shuttle, but it does come, and I think the wait is worthwhile. Good breakfast, including waffles, fruit, hard boiled eggs, etc.

review.title: Great "family feeling" hotel!
review.reviewText: I requested what I wanted near SFO Int'l Airport and Bay Landing's ambiance came through! When my sister and I first entered the hotel, we were impressed with the decor and the friendly front desk staff (both morning and evening) to the shuttle driver. Everything was there in my request for an exercise room, hair dryer, magnifying mirror, iron & iron board, mini refrig, coffeemaker and room safe! The little things that added to the feeling of the hotel was the extra care the housekeeping added to the folding of the facial tissues and towels and the different presentation of the bed pillows! Can't wait to bring my husband on my next trip to this hotel in the near future!

review.title: Convenient
review.reviewText: An excellent hotel ideally situated for using BART to travel into San Francisco via airport shuttle. Lovely views over bay.

review.title: So convenient, clean and comfortable
review.reviewText: From our first contact with the front desk we knew this was going to be a good stay. The room was spacious, quiet and clean. The shuttle to SFO worked out perfectly. Nothing negative to report only positive experiences.

review.title: Great hotel with awesome location and service
review.reviewText:
We travelled with an infant and loved this hotel. Everything was great as soon as we reached the hotel. Our flights were early and we reached the hotel at about 9:30 AM. The hotel receptionist said we are too early to check in but still allowed us to checkin. The room was clean, spacious and comfortable. It had big windows to allow sunshine in and to allow peep outside the hotel. The location of the hotel is excellent too right next to bay and SFO landing strip. You get that relaxed feeling as soon as you sit at the outdoor hotel lobby. The morning continental breakfast had too many varieties to choose from and had fresh ingredients. They also have a computer and printer in the lobby to browse internet and print stuff. I am a regular traveller, and I think this is the first time I came across a working printer and browsing machine in a hotel.
We loved coming back to our hotel and relaxing after going out for everyday's fun stuff.
Thumbs up for this hotel !

review.title: Great Experience
review.reviewText: Very clean, well maintained hotel in a very convenient location by SFO

review.title: If you really need an airport hotel it's just ok
review.reviewText:
We wanted to use the airport to park while we were on vacation but because we booked through expedia they would not let us. In addition, automatically charged $150 to our account (which was to be refunded later) in case of room damage -ridiculous especially given that they had a credit card on file.

Finally room is dated, and beds were horrible and lumpy. No thanks next time.

review.title: Amazing Hotel for the price!
review.reviewText: The hotel was clean, service was great, and the staff was friendly. The staff was very accommodating and the other guests I spoke to were pleased as well. I have recommended my coworkers about this hotel and they have already booked their stay here for their upcoming business trips.

review.title: Great hotel - not only for one night
review.reviewText:
I was pleasantly surprised by this hotel. The room was clean, spacious, and had a great view San Francisco Bay. It was very quiet and the bed was absolutely comfortable.

The hotel is close to the airport, it's a short drive to downtown San Francisco. Next time I come to San Francisco, I'll stay there again. I'd pick this hotel over the pricey downtown hotels any time.

review.title: Would definitely go there again
review.reviewText:
Extremely satisfied, staff friendly and helpful and accomodated additional requests, very clean and pleasant ambiance. Room had a view of the bay, though at first the aircraft landing at SFO would be noisy but was wrong could not hear them at night at all. A little far from attractions but that did not limit the enjoyment of our stay, everything was a short drive onto town and so much better value. The breakfast was free and the choices were many and varied.
Would definitely go there again.

review.title: Would gladly stay at again
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing is in a great location, close to the airport with frequent shuttle runs back and forth. Very convenient to drive to with a rental car and the process to return the car and take a shuttle ride back was quick and easy thanks to the hotel shuttle. The room was a very nice featuring plenty of room and modern decor. The bathroom was good sized with upscale fixtures and higher-end toiletries included. The bed was comfy but the pillows were a bit small for a king bed. However, we would definitely stay here again!

review.title: Excellent value for an SFO hotel
review.reviewText: A quiet, conveniently located hotel just south of SFO that provided me with less than a 5 minute drive back to the airport to return my rental car, in plenty of time to catch a breathtakingly early (6:15am) flight home. It was handy too that the hotel provided a computer with printer so that I could print out my boarding pass, thus avoiding any lines other than security check. Would happily stay here again.

review.title: Good, comfort hotel, good value to price
review.reviewText:
location a little isolated, but very good hotel, good and comfort room, excellent customer service by staff, good price.
breakfast could be better...

review.title: Best value for the money
review.reviewText: Went there twice within a week when travelling to San Francisco last week. Hotel is next to Airport but not noisy at all. Nice bayview and trails right next to the hotel. Breakfast was great. Rooms clean and spacious and scenic bay view. All works just fine. Staff friendly and helpful.

review.title: Last night gem in California
review.reviewText:
This hotel is a great bargain using the Expedia rate and is only 10 mins from SFO rental car return garage. Our room overlooked the bay which was beautiful due to the good weather at the time. The room was high standard and usual US layout. We ate next door at The Torito which was good also.
Plenty free parking available and free, good wifi signal in the room was a bonus.

review.title: Overall, a great value in a not-so congested area
review.reviewText: Clean & convenient to surrounding locations

review.title: Good price, decent location
review.reviewText: This hotel is pretty nice. Plus there is complimentary wifi, breakfast, and parking! It's right between Palo Alto and San Francisco, which was perfect for us. 10 minutes from the airport and we still didn't hear any airplane noise. We would definitely stay here again.

review.title: Good airport location
review.reviewText:
Pleasantly surprised. I had never heard of the hotel and didn't really know what to expect. It's a quality hotel with a great view of the bay and airport. I thought there might be noise issues so close to the airport but I enjoyed watching the planes take off and land without hearing them at all.

It's not convenient to downtown San Francisco but a great place to stay if you're using the airport.

review.title: very impressed
review.reviewText: The room was very nice and spacious. There was free breakfast. The price was great. Only around 15-20 minutes from San Francisco. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

review.title: A Fantastic Stay!
review.reviewText: This hotel was everything that I wanted and needed. I attended a conference at the Hyatt but didn't want to pay exorbitant prices. The Bay Landing offered a fabulous full breakfast, convenient location, clean well-appointed rooms, and great service. I will definitely stay here again when I come to the area. I recommend the hotel to anyone looking for a great value and a pleasant experience. It was also close to restaurants and a nice path along the bay. If it hadn't rained nonstop during my trip I would have strolled more along the path.

review.title: SF bargain
review.reviewText: Hotel very accomodating - continental breakfast offered a wide variety of food. Great value for thepric.

review.title: Should have better alternative around the areas
review.reviewText:
Average experience during my stay at the hotel in march 2011. I went to San Francisco with my family and kids. The hotel front desk was not very friendly at the check-in and some other instances. For example, when I need to exchange for coin for the coin-laundry machine, the front desk staff is not helpful and asked me to come back again and again. When i called for room services for more 2 more towels to the room for my kids, the front desk staff asked me to go down to the lobby counter to collect myself :(

The room , on the other hand, is clean and comfortable. .

review.title: We stay at Bay Landing Frequently
review.reviewText: Bay Landing has always been neat and tidy. It is convenient to the Burlingame area as well as San Francisco and the airport, SFO. The rates are reasonable and we like going back to it as we are familiar and comfortable with the hotel.

review.title: great location near airport
review.reviewText: very nice hotel that meet all our needs. Would definately recommend to others. Breakfast was very plentiful. Very convenient to airport. Rental car made travel into San Francisco easy.

review.title: Impressed!
review.reviewText: Excellent facility and well located close to SFO airport

review.title: Burlingame's Best Hotel
review.reviewText: Love the bay view. Always clean. Great free breakfast every morning. Next door to El Torito and Elephant Bar.

review.title: Clean, well kept, better than expected for the price
review.reviewText:
Clean, well kept, better than expected for the price. Just as good as a full Hilton/Marriott type hotel if not newer and cleaner.

Only downside is infrequent (hourly I think) and long shuttle ride that makes a stop at a not-so-close other hotel first.

Both thumbs up. Nice find.

review.title: Only place I'll go in the area!
review.reviewText: Amazed by the service and the facility. Will return!

review.title: Dependable
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing is a well maintained, conveniently located, independent, small hotel.

review.title: Highly recommendable hotel.
review.reviewText: The hotel is located at a very convenient location with free airport shuttle, easy access to highways, three rental cars within 5 minutes walking distance, several good restaurants nearby, good Bay view if you get a room facing it. It provides free wireless internet and a common user computer at lobby, around the clock coffee and tea and free breakfast. The rooms are quite spacious and clean. The only thing if the breakfast has only sweet things. It would be better if they could offer scrambled eggs and sausages, then it would be perfect.

review.title: Enjoyed our stay
review.reviewText: We enjoyed our stay at Bay Landing. The rooms were very nice, the bathroom was clean and had plenty of room. The hotel staff was very nice and answered all of our questions. The lobby was a comfortable place to sit and relax and there was a nice view from the patio off of the breakfast area. We did not have a car and used BART to travel to down-town San Francisco. There were no restaurants with-in walking distance of the hotel so we made sure to eat in town. The shuttle to the airport runs every 30-minutes so transportation to BART was easy. One very nice shuttle driver gave us information on getting around. We would definitely stay there again.

review.title: no--I would have preferred more amenities
review.reviewText:
The staff was very friendly; my other Expedia hotels have been more upscale for the price. My major disappointment was the bed as very soft--and with a newly replaced hip, it was very uncomfortable.

The shuttle service was excellent and the hotel nicely kept.

review.title: Will come to this hotel in the future.
review.reviewText: Very nice and comfortable hotel. Will come again to this hotel.

review.title: Needs better Beds
review.reviewText: Perfect location for our trip to the Bay. Right off the highway. Nice lobby. Warm reception. Room was clean. Kinda older in styling although the bath was up-to-date and beautiful. They could use some new beds. The breakfast was excellent. All is all a great experience.

review.title: Very Comfortable
review.reviewText:
The room was very comfortable. The breakfast buffet was nice. The hotel is situated on the waterfront. If it had been a bit warmer, would have gone for a walk. We would stay here again.

Many places in this area charge for parking. This hotel has free parking, which can make a significant difference.

review.title: Best Deal for an SFO Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: My wife and I stayed at this hotel for a overnight "getaway" and were very pleased with it. Its a very nice hotel, very clean, and relatively new. Its right on the bay with a nice walking trail just outside that goes along the bay for miles. Its easy to get to from the freeway. There are also multiple places to eat nearby. It has free WiFi and free parking something that is rare at airport hotels). The only downside is that it is near the airport and so one gets some airplane noise. Its also in an airport hotel zone and so there is lots of traffic and people nearby. These are minor issues though. Overall I would strong recommend it.

review.title: Bay Landing Hotel, Burlingame, CA
review.reviewText: Bay Landing is a great hotel, it turned out to be a great choice for our first visit to San Francisco. The hotel was a fairly short drive into SF. The neighboring cities had a lot of dining options. The hotel offers free parking and free breakfast. Our room had a nice view of the SF Bay and that was really nice. The room itself is pretty roomy, cozy, and clean. Overall, it was a great experience, I would definitely stay here again.

review.title: Leaving on a Jet Plane
review.reviewText: Why wasn't the noise problem associated with this hotel described in any review that I read! This hotel is right in the fight plan for SFO. I was unable to fall asleep or stay asleep in the morning due to the constant barrage of airplane noise. I got very little sleep and woke up with a horrible migraine.

review.title: Weekend near San Francisco
review.reviewText: See above. This is a fine choice and has restaurants nearby.

review.title: it's a pleasant experience of the staying.
review.reviewText: The hotel and room are both in good quality. The location and surronding are pretty. Food is goos too. Very satisfied.

review.title: Excellent for business travelers
review.reviewText: Stayed there for a week in late January. For a business trip, the location is excellent. Service was nice and the complimentary breakfast a must. Will go back for business.

review.title: Nothing Special
review.reviewText: The really only great thing about this hotel was the proximity to the Airport, but it actually wasn't as close as a lot of others.

review.title: Wonderful experience
review.reviewText:
I can not say enough positive things about this hotel. The hotel itself was very beautifully decorated and all the staff were extremely friendly & helpful. The room was very clean & beautifully decorated as well. The breakfast was great.
I would highly recommend this hotel.

review.title: Cisneros Bay Landing
review.reviewText: Awsome hotel for the right price.

review.title: Very Impressed
review.reviewText: After a long flight from the UK we were very pleased with the friendliness and efficiency of the hotel staff. The room was large and comfortable and also quiet considering we were close to the airport and road.There was a nice place to eat within walking distance.The breakfast had a good healthy choice.We were so pleased with our stay that after travelling we stayed for 2 more nights.We would definitely recommend.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: This hotel is located on the San Francisco Bay about 18 miles south of the city. Very clean. Nice and friendly excellent staff at front desk. Daily breakfast with fresh and nutritious food. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

review.title: very impressed
review.reviewText: Great find.

review.title: Really enjoyed our stay and will stay there again.
review.reviewText: Nice hotel, walking distance to some great restaurants. Clean. Great healthy breakfast. Would defiantly stay there again.

review.title: Great place to stay if you're flying.
review.reviewText: The hotel is off a bit from the freeway. The room was very quiet and there were little touches that made it nice. For example, newspapers were left outside the door, there was a chess set in the lobby, and there was always free coffee and tea available. It is away from the freeway more than the others and it is right next to the Bay, providing nice views and easy access to a waterside walk. The breakfast in the morning was good - waffles, cereal, and fruit, but was just a small step above continental. I will stay again.

review.title: Exceptional hotel at a great price
review.reviewText: We get to San Francisco to visit our son about every year. We prefer to stay south of the city because the prices are more reasonable. This hotel is the best hotel that I have stayed at in the Bay area. The facility is very clean and well maintained. The staff is very courteous and helpful. The rooms are great, very clean, comfortable bed. The temperature control is very good and quiet. Everything about the hotel was exceptional. I would reccommend this hotel to my friends.

review.title: Good New Year's Value
review.reviewText: The Complimentary Breakfast was an exceptional value... spent a great deal for our group at IHOP and was disappointed.

review.title: Better than expected!
review.reviewText: Great place, reasonable price. Convenient to airport and not too far from San Francisco proper. Good restaurants to walk to. Room larger than typical. Everything was in great shape and service was also good. Nice view of Bay and pleasant walk along the water.

review.title: Good breakfast
review.reviewText: I would visit again. Very nice hotel with a good price. The selection of breakfast bar was also satisfying.

review.title: Okay
review.reviewText: We stayed as we we had an overnght stay at SFO. Good location, close to airport. The quaility of the bed and bedding is fair at best, small pillows. With that being said, this hotel is good value for it's price.

review.title: The best place to stay outside San Francisco.
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing Hotel was a good fit for us. Just the right distance away from San Francisco, but close enough to see and do all the attractions. It is close to the airport but you don't even hear the planes. Continental breakfast was awesome. Lots of different items to chose from. We did have a problem with the hotel shuttle being late to pick us up one evening. This hotel is well worth the money. We stayed here 4 of the 7 nights of our vacation. We only wish there would have been a pool/spa to enjoy! Parking is Free, which was a huge plus! Will stay here again if we are ever back in the area.

review.title: We'll stay there next time, too
review.reviewText:
Outstanding in every respect: great location near the airport, excellent facilities, well maintained. Very competitive price. Staff courteous and helpful.
My sole regret is that the breakfast area is somewhat cramped at busy times in the morning, could do with more room for access to the food and coffee facilities.
Some good restaurants within easy walk, and great location right by the Bay.

review.title: GREAT find!
review.reviewText: This was a GREAT find! I loved my stay there. It is conveniently located near the airport and is nearby Millbrae which has everything one needs - BART, shops, food etc. Being next to the bay, it even has a nice walking strip that one can walk on or just sit to watch planes land and take off. A hit with kids who love planes! Superb breakfast spread, friendly and helpful staff, and the right price too! Will definitely stay again.

review.title: Simply, a great hotel experience
review.reviewText: From the people at the reception to the driver that took us to the airport, everybody was extremely corteous, helpful, and professional. The room was very comfortable and spotless. I would strongly recommend this moderately priced hotel which compares very favorably with much more expensive and inpersonable big chain hotels. In addition, the breakfast was very good and the ambience of the breakfast room very pleasant. I will go back to this hotel any time I fly to or from San Francisco. A little jewel next to the water.

review.title: Great place to stay! Would highly recommend!
review.reviewText: Would definitely recommend this hotel. We were pleasantly surprised when we arrived at the hotel, our room was very clean and spacious. The shuttle from the airport to the hotel was also very appreciated.

review.title: Excellent SFO stay
review.reviewText:
I am very pleased with the quality of the hotel and the staff. It was a business trip and they went out of their way to assist me with all my travel questions for the following morning. The room was very comfortable and quiet. I have already given a strong recommendation to a couple of colleagues and family members who are traveling to the S.F. Bay Area in the coming months too stay at this hotel.

I look forward to the next time I am scheduled to travel there as I will most assuredly stay here again!

review.title: Best deal in SF area
review.reviewText: Great price, convenient, clean, pleasant..what more can I say??

review.title: Beautiful stay at the Bay
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing hotel was beautiful. Beautiful room. The continental breakfast was so nice and yummy! The hotel is about 15 min from down town San Francisco which was perfect for us. The hotel has plenty of free parking which is a plus. Our room was very nice and comfortable. The only complaint we had was that the bed was not comfortable. We could feel all the springs in our backs. The hotel and room was very clean and a very convenient location to restaurant, transportation and close to pier 39 and shopping in San Francisco.

review.title: Recommended
review.reviewText: Great location, enjoyed the breakfast buffet which offered a variety of choices. Staff was friendly upon arrival. We'll go there again without hesitation.

review.title: A Good Stay
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing Hotel was a good stay. We enjoyed our brief stay there as we were in San Francisco the night. It is a close proximity to the Airport and right on the Bay. The interior was elegant and in good condition as was the room. Checkout time was okay also.

review.title: Great choice near SFO
review.reviewText: Perfect Location, we will stay again.

review.title: best value near SFO
review.reviewText: A hidden treasure near the San Francisco International Airport. Clean, comfortable, quiet and very reasonably priced, with beutiful views of the Bay. Plus several good restaurants within a 2 minute walk on a scenic walkway right along the water!

review.title: Exceeded Expectations
review.reviewText: I felt for the price, my stay at Bay Landing exceeded my expectations. The view from the dock was great. The breakfast offering was good as well. I would stay again.

review.title: Undiscovered gem
review.reviewText: When booking on line I was concerned as this hotel was much less expensive than other poperties in the area. I took a chance and was pleasantly surpirsed. Clean rooms, friendly staff, good breakfast options, fresh coffee and ice water avialable all day. Great fitness room. Local restaurant selection was somewhat limited but still proved great meals

review.title: Will go back
review.reviewText: Great Hotel. Very convenient location. Very friendly staffs.

review.title: Good Stay
review.reviewText: We were just wanting something close to the airport as we had to leave the next morning. Very pleasant hotel, two restaurants close by (maybe more) easy to walk over. Breakfast is served early which was nice, so that we could get something before heading to the airport.

review.title: Great boutique hotel by the Bay.
review.reviewText: I would recommend this hotel to singles, families. It has free parking; is close and convenient to the S.F. airport, impeccably clean and offers a free breakfast.

review.title: For an airport hotel...Fantastic !
review.reviewText: Very pleased with our stay. It was only one night (Why would you stay longer at an airport hotel?) and we were very satistied. Clean, bright room. Very good complementary hot and cold breakfast. Free parking. Helpfull staff. Very nice walking path along the bay, great for watching jets take off and land at SFO. We highly reccomend.

review.title: Awesome Hotel - Convenient
review.reviewText: Free parking, free internet and a delicious buffet breakfast. Awesome is all I can say about this very conveniently located hotel. I could not hear a thing from the nearby airport. The rooms were spacious and lovely. I will return because of the service, convenience and price.

review.title: 49er Game Get Away
review.reviewText: I am glad I read the reviews and decided to take a chance. The hotel was very clean, and provided great service. The breakfast was nice as were the small touches that made it feel comfortable. The staff is very friendly. I stayed there after a 49er game and took the train from the nearby Caltrains station to the game. My favorite part was the walking path outside of the hotel.

review.title: Much better than the average airport hotel
review.reviewText: At the reasonable price I found, my expectations were not incredibly high and it was one night only - the usual airport hotel situation. But this was a very nice hotel - new, modern, bright, large comfortable rooms and bed, pleasant lobby, good breakfast, friendly and efficient staff.

review.title: Good experience overall
review.reviewText:
Front desk was very friendly. We needed an early morning shuttle to get to the airport and everything went perfect. Shuttle was on time, got us to the airport quickly, and then returned me and my daughters to the hotel. Breakfast was very good, especially the mini waffles. Room was comfortable.

Only downside was the bathroom, very little counter space, shower seemed complicated and I kept thinking we were going to break the handle, and towels are rough and scratchy!

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: Previous reviews were right. Breakfast had a wide variety. Close to airlines with very good shuttle transportation.

review.title: Reasonable costs so close to San Francisco
review.reviewText: Very convenient in close distance to SF center

review.title: Loved sitting outside and watching the planes at breakfast
review.reviewText: This is a nice hotel on the bay. Nice breakfast. They could use more seating and help during the breakfast rush. Even though you are right across the bay from the airport you can not hear the planes. It was very convenient to return our rental car the morning we left. There is a gas station a block from the hotel. It is also very convenient to drive to a Bart Station closer to San Francisco and take the Bart into the city. Don't park at the airport and use the Bart. It is only $2.00 to park at a Bart Park and Ride for the day and it is free on weekends.

review.title: Great hotel by the bay
review.reviewText: I was worried that a hotel so close to the bay would be very noisy but it was so nice and calm to be in this hotel and totally relaxing. There is a great trail behind the hotel and that is quite nice on a sunny day. It is very close to the airport and right beside a rental car company so I can try to plan another trip. The interiors are nice and the beds were comfortable.

review.title: Nice value for a just price.
review.reviewText:
It is a nice hotel, clean and up to standards, however I dont know why people liked the breakfast so much. It was a nice breakfast but it was not "GREAT" breakfast, it was mainly juices, waffles and begels... I did not see any bacon fresh eggs or ham, and stuffs like that. But, Yes it was a nice stay in the hotel.

Ahh I can not forget the nice view behing the hotel. Plus a friendly Shuttle to the Airport.

review.title: Close to the Airport
review.reviewText:
The hotel staffs at front desk were nice, friendly and very helpful, but we were expecting a little more professional staff at breakfast area.
Breakfast was great and fresh.
Rooms clean but the mattress was so old.
Enough space to park the car.
Very close to the Airport.

review.title: Fantastic value, highly recommend this hotel, especially for those on a budget.
review.reviewText:
This was a great hotel to stay in with the best value for my money. They provided free shuttle service to and from BART, which made it easy to travel to San Francisco via BART. It saved us over $100 per day by staying near the airport vs. staying in the "city".
The beds were very comfortable, the breakfast that was included was more than we expected and was great. I would definitely stay here again and recommend this hotel.

review.title: Nice & Clean
review.reviewText: same as above

review.title: Convenient!
review.reviewText: This hotel is located close to SFO, and it has free "Jittney" service to airport. You can easily get the BART. Several great restaurants within walking dist. of hotel. Fabulous walking path along bay. Great views of bay and airport. Breakfast is very extensive, but needs to hire more staff to suppliment it. Also sh ort on seating!

review.title: My new "go to" SFO airport hotel - deserves its good reputation on Expedia
review.reviewText:
I checked in very late at night (around midnight), grabbing a couple free apples to munch on while I checked my mail before going to sleep for a few hours (I had an early flight the next morning). The bed in the hotel was a real bed with posts -- quite a change from the usual rectangle of wood nailed to the wall, to look like a headboard. Internet access worked like a charm without having to fight with an external service that required changing network settings, as I've had to do in a couple Bay Area hotels in the recent past. The hotel's hallways are wide, so if you're the sort who doesn't like long cramped hallways, you'd like these better than average, I think. I have a thing about clean air -- no smoke residue or mold/mildew -- in hotels, and the Bay Landing SFO airport hotel gets 5 stars on that. The only thing that detracted from the feel of the room was a "tube" rather than LCD/plasma TV screen, but really that's a small quibble about a room that honestly most airport hotels are not going to be able to match. Clean, new, nice overall. I put a good word in for this hotel with my SF-based colleague, in case anyone asks him for an airport hotel recommendation in the future.

In the morning, it was great to grab a cup of Chex and a couple blueberry muffins for a breakfast on the go in the shuttle van, from the complimentary continental breakfast buffet. I think there were other items, like waffles, as well, but I didn't have time to deal with them.

Will stay here again.

review.title: Satisfactory
review.reviewText: No complaints other than the fact that most of the desk help wasn't very friendly.

review.title: Extremely Satisfied
review.reviewText:
The rooms are very clear and have a nice view to SF bay and airport.
The break feast was perfect wich fruits, waffles, breads, juices, cheese...

The bad thing is: if you want to go to SF you need to drive, but its just 30 minutes to PIER 39. ok!!

The parking and wirelles internet are free.

review.title: waiting too much! but kindness!
review.reviewText:
we arrive there about 2 00 pm. we already knew we can check out after 3 00.
so we left n cameback again at 3 00pm. but we need to wait more. finally frontdesk employee gave us the key. n we brought it n go to 3rd floor.
but the key was not working. so annoying. i went to frontdesk n told her, that's not working. she changed another one, but that also not working either. i was so upset. finally she, fixerman, and we goin up together. fixermen started to fix infront of us. we wait for 5 mins in front of the.door, and just watching it!! i told here,"is there any other rooms?" i thought that time was definetely checkout time, so there r many empty rooms. she told she will. she just tell sorry n sorry to us. finally., she geve the 4th floor room. it was sea view, n it made me little better. even im not that temper person. so i just smiled to her, but my inside was really boiling. but the room n view was good. i think locetion is not bad, specially, free night parking is attractive for me, first time, i thought we gonna stay near union square, but overnite parking fee is about 50 dollars per nite.
we rented a car so it was not big deal!!
when we gonna go to SF again. i think aboutstay hotel which is mear airport!
this hotel breakfast is the best i think! that's including!

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: No movie channels and limited cable and mattresses aren't great, which surprised me given the price I paid for the room, but overall I was still satisfied.

review.title: Great place to stay.
review.reviewText: Near airport, BART, CalTrain and close to SF. Nice walking path along the bay.

review.title: Nice Hotel, Surly front desk
review.reviewText:
The hotel was fine. Either the maitre d' was quite rude or did not speak very good English. He was certainly very uninformed about the region and could offer us no help or suggestions. He was actually borderline rude in person and quite abrupt over the phone. In a strange way it was refreshing as he was the first person we met in northern California who wasn't smiling or trying to please us.

The hotel staff was competent, the room was fine for one night and the location is very convenient to SFO. If they could retrain the Front Desk staff, all would be well.

review.title: good location
review.reviewText: good value

review.title: Trip
review.reviewText: None

review.title: Best Hotel in Bay Landing Area, Nice and Comfortable with Value
review.reviewText: Overall we had a very good experience at Bay Landing San Francisco. The hotel is very clean and tidy. Morning Buffet is excellent with variety and freshness. Room setting is very good. The only thing less satisfactory is the internet service. I brought my laptop with hook-up. Somehow I wasn't able to connect to internet. So I went to the front desk at around 10:45PM for help. The night auditor (gentleman) wasn't able to do it. So I had to wait everyday for the public internet access, which is a bit of inconvenient. Staff training in this area is obviously inadequate, and in my opinion at least someone in the hotel should be able to help to hook up. The power button on the public computer access was broken and taped with scott tape. Other than that, we are very satisfied and happy with the stay. We definitely will recommend to friends and family if they are looking for value and convenience in travel. Great Job Bay Landing staff.

review.title: Clean, Comfortable, Convenient
review.reviewText: We just wanted a hotel close to the San Francisco airport for our last night of a 10 day vacation before flying home to Ottawa. Everything was so well kept and clean you would think the hotel had just opened. Our room was excellent. Very comfortable and clean. The bed was very comfortable. On our 10 day trip across California this hotel was the best value and had a surprisingly high-end feel especially considering the money we paid. This was the lowest cost we paid for a hotel. I forgot to mention the complimentary continental breakfast which was excellent. The only things you need to be aware of is there is no restaurant in the hotel so you might need to take a drive or walk to get dinner.

review.title: Will be back again
review.reviewText: From the moment we arrived everything was as expected. we were greeted promptly at the check in desk. The staff were extremely courteous. The room was just as in the pictures. The attentiveness of the staff was perfect, answered all of my little questions.

review.title: very convenient to airport a very comfortable stop before going home!!
review.reviewText: great for the price would certainly recommend it to friends going in or out of sfo.

review.title: Exceeded expectations
review.reviewText: Perfect hotel stay with close location to the SFO airport/freeway, good view, customer service, and complimentary parking. Decent sized room with basic amenities and clean bathroom. Good value compared to the neighboring hotels and even included a continental breakfast. Would stay again on my next business trip in SF area.

review.title: We'll be back!
review.reviewText: The Hotel was clean, comfortable, and perfect. Staff were helpful.

review.title: Exceeds Expectations
review.reviewText: This hotel is classy, warm and friendly, super clean and has great service. Wonderful bay views. Nice breakfast, great bed. A+++++

review.title: Simply the best.
review.reviewText:
Best hotel ever. We will use this hotel every time we use San Francisco Airport from now on.

Best continental breakfast, best room, and best view!!!

review.title: A visitor from Canada
review.reviewText: good hotel for what you pay

review.title: Good value and location
review.reviewText: This is a clean hotel with great restaurants nearby. Couldn't get in to Elephant Bar but the Beni Hana had fantastic bar with wonderful a la carte items at the bar where you could watch planes land at SF airport.

review.title: Nice hotel by the Airport
review.reviewText: Very nice Hotel that was central to everywhere we wanted to go. Nice clean rooms. A little small for 4 people in the same room with only double beds. For being close to the airport it wasn't very noisy at all. Would definitely go back.

review.title: Its ok for the money
review.reviewText: Hotel was friendly and nice decor. the breakfast had lots of food and lots of people with only one helper sometimes the food very low and we had no time to wait. I like the nice variety of food and thank you for the apples. Our room was ok, it smelled weird but I heard some other travelers had the same experience. Our moldy shower curtain was replaced as asked but still not the cleanest Ive seen. for the price it was just fine, we only noticed traffic noise as we live very isolated, normally it would be pretty quiet I think. Often the desk clerks were so busy that they could not give general question help. this made them terse and I only think it was because of low man power.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: Clean, quiet, and great breakfast buffet. Easy access to San Francisco and other highways.

review.title: A great hotel! will come again!
review.reviewText: This hotel is great! Clean, quiet, and the services are great! Free breakfast, free coffee and tea for the whole day, really saves a lot of $$$! Will definitely stay again if around the area.

review.title: Beautiful hotel on the Bay
review.reviewText: This hotel was one of the best hotels in the area in my opinion. The hotel was very clean and a very quiet neighbourhood. My husband and I stayed there for three nights. A shuttle bus comes and takes you to the airport which takes under 10 minutes and then we took the rapid transit (BART) into San Francisco which took about 30 mins. There was free parking, wifi and a great free breakfast with the greatest tasting waffles. Downtown San Francisco is so busy and loud we enjoyed coming back to our little piece of heaven. There was a walkway behind the hotel that gave you a great walk around the bay and you could see sailboats and airplanes come in. You never heard the airplanes even tho you could see the airport from the hotel. The staff seemed tired and overwhelmed as they had just booked in a family reunion. I would highly recommend this hotel. Great maid service. For restaurants in the area the Elephant bar was great, but be prepared for a wait and it is quite noicey, but great food and views to the Bay are well worth it.

review.title: Great Choice
review.reviewText:
Bay Landing was the perfect choice for me. Was just needing a location close to the airport for an early flight. The Hotel was clean and the service was great.
Access to the walkway on the Bay was nice along with three restaurants next door. The shuttle was prompt and professional. Overall value was great.

review.title: Impressive
review.reviewText:
Hotel staff very accommodating. Breakfast buffet was terrific with many selections. Airport shuttle very convenient and on time. Hotel rooms were nicely furnished, comfortable and clean. Microwave and fridge a plus.
Fitness facility was nice with new equipment.
Laundry facility was clean and convenient to use.

review.title: Great hotel near SFO Airport
review.reviewText: Our flight into SFO was arriving late and we needed a reasonably priced, clean hotel room convenient to the airport. Bay Landing San Francisco Airport Hotel was an excellent choice. The breakfast that was included in the price of the room was much better than anticipated. We would definitely choose this hotel again.

review.title: Nice Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: We stayed at Bay Landing a total of three nights at the beginning and end of a 10 day stay in the San Francisco area. When we checked in for the last two nights at the hotel, we received a free upgrade to a suite overlooking the bay. The suite was large, comfortable and much appreciated. The suite included a second sink and vanity area which was helpful when three people are trying to get ready to head out in the morning. The hotel is very close to the airport and convenient to restaurants (Elephant Bar was good). The free breakfast was satisfying and was replenished frequently (started at 6:00 AM weekdays). The BART was 1.3 miles away and not a bad walk. The shuttle to and from the airport was prompt both times we used it. The lobby area is comfortable with several sitting areas, a large TV, and a computer and printer for guests to use. I also used the guest laundry which was inexpensive compared to most hotels. This was a nice airport hotel and worked well for our very late arrival from the east coast and early morning departure to return home. I would stay again if I wanted to be close to the airport but it is too far out if you plan to go into the city often.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: We had a slight burp and one rude woman at the front desk at the beginning. However it was resolved. The cleaning staff were very accomodating and if we needed something they handled it immediately. This is a great way to see the Bay area.

review.title: Great Find!
review.reviewText:
This hotel is super clean and quiet. Lots of free parking and scenic location with restaurants within walking distance. A great free breakfast too!
I will definitely stay here again!

review.title: Lovely!!!
review.reviewText: Our room was very clean, very comfortable, and the wooden bed post reminded me of home. There was free internet, which was awesome. Breakfast in the morning was great! Make-your-own waffles, breads, cereals, boiled eggs, and tons of fruit. The place was right next to San Francisco Bay for a nice outdoor walk, and also close to an Elephant Bar restaurant for a convenient late night meal. I would definitely return!!!

review.title: Great stay! Great location, fits budget!
review.reviewText: Hotel was very comfortable and view from hotel was great. Watched the planes land and take off and a variety of restaurants to choose from in the area, some in walking distance. Rooms were very modern and comfortable. Beds were a little small for two people, but we had a room with two beds. Breakfast was great, a lot of choices and the kids were happy to fill up before our adventures in the city. Quick 20 minute drive to the wharf, pending traffic. Would come back and stay again!

review.title: Clean, Convenient, & Cozy
review.reviewText:
I enjoyed my stay at the Bay Landing San Francisco Airport Hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Checkin was a breeze and it's proximity to SFO was a major upside.

The rooms were very clean. No musty odor. The Free continental breakfast which includes a waffle making station was great.

I would stay here again and will recommend this hotel to friends and family.

review.title: Adequate, not outstanding
review.reviewText: This hotel is in a beautiful location on SF Bay, right across from the SF Airport so you can see the airplanes landing. Unfortunately the economy has taken its toll, as many local businesses (restaurants, movie theaters) are closed and the area looks a bit shabby.

review.title: San Fran's 'hidden' gem hotel
review.reviewText: Extremely clean, courteous staff, comfortable room, great amenities, wonderfull breakfast, plenty of parking, and of course a great rate. I would stay there again in a heartbeat.

review.title: will go back again.
review.reviewText: beakfast is good a lot of choice and fill up very quickly. room and bathroom very clean. clean towel everyday.

review.title: Get maximum with minimum total cost
review.reviewText: Save more than expected with free park and breakfast in a clean and silent hotel

review.title: Nice Hotel..Will Recommend to Others
review.reviewText: My husband and I loved our visit to this hotel. It was close to San Francisco but not right in the city. We liked the walking trails right outside our hotel door and the nice restaurants nearby that were right on San Francisco Bay. All people in the hotel greeted us with kindness and helpfulness. We will tell our friends about this place and I have a friend who has to travel to San Francisco on business and I will tell them about how well we were treated as well.

review.title: Very Impressed
review.reviewText: We have traveled extensively and found this hotel to be much better than most - even the more expensive ones. The rooms were spacious, the beds comfortable and the location was handy to SFO but not at all noisy. Our stay included a lovely breakfast buffet and free parking.

review.title: excellant hotel
review.reviewText: This is an excellant hotel. We used this hotel before and decided to use it again on our next trip. The service is excellant, room is clean, bed is comfortable. The pillow is flat but still ok.

review.title: Excellent Value
review.reviewText:
My boyfriend & I stayed at this hotel while on a weekend trip to San Francisco. The hotel is clean, the rooms are large, the beds comfortable, and they provide a small refrigerator and microwave in the room! We were surprised at the great value, especially in the San Francisco area!

They have a breakfast buffet available each morning with a great selection of continental-type items as well as make-your-own waffles. We went out on the patio and sat at an outdoor table, with a wonderful view of the bay and could watch the planes landing and taking off at SFO.

There's an Elephant Bar and an El Torito right next door, the hotel is in a nice, clean area, and not far away you is a big variety of fast food and authentic ethnic restaurants.

Overall, our hotel stay was outstanding. The only issue we had was that they put a $100 hold on my debit card for additional room charges and I didn't get the money put back in my account until 4 days after we got home. I had been told by the front desk clerk at check-in that it would be refunded at check-out, but when I called back later, they said that it's only immediate if it's a credit card. Debit cards take 3-7 business days to refund the money to you.

review.title: wonderful place to stay
review.reviewText: easy,affordable,clean,comfortable,friendly place to stay.great customer service,shuttle service.Breakfast was easy and adequate.Nice setting close to airport on the bay,easy walk to restaurants. Great all around experience.

review.title: Great Hotel, mediocure area.
review.reviewText: The hotel was great. Lovley view on the water when I woke up in the morning. I would definately stay there again. Airport shuttle was a little annoying. Waited for 45 mins at the airport to be picked up. They are with a smaller shuttle carrier. Pick up the next day was ok.But nothing against the hotel. I needed a store to get a new piece of luggage that broke. It took me a $45 cab ride to get to and from a Kmart. Not much in the area, business area as far as none shopping area.

review.title: Bay Landing San Francisco Great Hotel
review.reviewText:
We were very pleased with this hotel. Parking and internet usage were free of charge. The hotel was very clean, quiet, the surrounding area was really nice and located 4 miles from the airport. Great accommodations....

The only recommendation to the hotel would be to put pillow top covering on the beds to make them more comfortable.

review.title: Quiet airport hotel
review.reviewText: Close to the airport and very quiet with soundproofed windows. Comfortable, clean, newish and convenient. A compact, well equipped gym overlooks the Bay. We stayed at the beginning and the end of our holiday, which was perfect due to long haul flights from Australia. They happily minded our baggage after check out so we could go downtown before our evening flight. Would stay again.

review.title: Poor management, personnel is lacking class and un-familiar with hotel.
review.reviewText: The area is nice but would stay at another hotel down the street!!!

review.title: Definitely recommend if you need to stay close to SFO
review.reviewText: Checked in after very late arrival. Convenience to airport and a clean, comfortable room were the most important considerations for us. The Bay Landing SFO hotel delivered fantastically. Very quick check-in, professionally staffed, nice facilities, excellent breakfast (included in stay). And while we were there for all of 10 hours, I'd definitely recommend to anyone who wants to stay close to the SF airport.

review.title: Nice place to stay, if you want to be near the airport and still be close to the City!
review.reviewText:
The hotel is very nice and comfortable, the common areas and the staff is very friendly. The location is very good, close to the airport and easy to visit the City!

The only problem is that the Airport Shuttle is never on time, one time I had to wait over 45 minutes for it to appear, then it is jut 5 minutes to the airport, but if you really need ot get to the airport on time, make sure to take this into consideration.

review.title: The only place I stay
review.reviewText: Bay Landing is the only place I stay when I'm in the Bay Area on business. It is centrally located with easy access to everything and close to SFO as well. The rooms are spacious and comfortable and there are lots of services within reach (In-and-Out is right across the highway.

review.title: Great hotel!
review.reviewText:
The hotel was very clean and the staff was helpful. The beds were comfortable and the room was quiet. You would never know that the airport was right across the way. My only complaint was that there was not enough seating for breakfast. People were sitting at the couches in the check-in area and standing while eating. We ended up skipping the breakfast and eating somewhere else because it was so crowded.

I would definitely stay there again.

review.title: Great airport hotel
review.reviewText: Overall a good value, enjoyed the breakfast.

review.title: Would return again if in the Bay Area.
review.reviewText:
The second-floor room I was given was very clean and very quiet, considering that the hotel is in close proximity to the airport.

The complimentary breakfast was outstanding and much larger and contained a greater variety of items than any I have seen at other hotels. A full breakfast like this would probably cost at least $10 or $12 at a restaurant. All the food was fresh and hot, and the staff kept the containers well supplied. The dining area was spacious inside with ample seating on a lovely patio just outside the door. This was probably one of the most outstanding features of thsi hotel and very convenient for guests.

review.title: SFO airport oasis
review.reviewText: It was easy, comfortable and friendly

review.title: great place to stay
review.reviewText: Hotel was clean and updated. Plenty of parking. Breakfast was awesome--lots of choices. In the morning we enjoyed watching the planes take off and land across the bay. Nice jogging path beyond the hotel's patio and exercise rook inside the hotel. Restaurant next door. Several fast food joints, grocery stores, gas stations, drug stores just a few blocks down and across the freeway. We were there for leisure but would also be great for business travelers.

review.title: Very Impressed
review.reviewText: The hotel was more than we expected. Great service ,clean,comfortable room and the breakfast was unbelievable. It was not the usual continental breakfast of breads and beverages. There was a variety of choices - it was great. The hotel was quiet even though it is close to the airport.We would definitely recommend this hotel and when we visit San Fransico again ,Bay Landing will be our first choice for accommodations.

review.title: Very pleased with our room!
review.reviewText: Very pleased with our room. Beautiful location on the bay. Very comfortable room and very quiet. Excellent breakfast and close to downtown SF and also close to airport. Will definitly use this hotel on our next trip to San Fran.

review.title: pleasently surprised
review.reviewText: Great breakfeast, clean rooms, close to the airport, great views of the bay and the airport, friendly helpful staff, very affordable, easy acess to the airport and the expressway to downtown what more could we ask for!

review.title: Overall good
review.reviewText: Good breakfast, nice surrounding area, 24hr mini mart, free computer(internet) and printer use at the lobby. Two double beds rooms is slightly small for more than 2 adults. Other than that, good enough to recommend

review.title: Amazingly lovely location!
review.reviewText: In addition to the usual amenities, the hotel serves a delicious breakfast and is < 1 block away from 2 excellent and reasonably priced restaurants, both with direct views of the bay and the airport. Despite the proximity to the airport, it was pleasantly quiet. The planes appear not to fly directly over the hotel area, so noise is not an issue at all.

review.title: Great value for the money
review.reviewText: If you're looking for a hotel out of the city, away from the hustle and right on the water, this is the hotel for you. Close to airport, BART to take into the city, easy access to everything. Buffet breakfast was great, waffles with all the fixings, fruit, cereal, pastries, etc. Service was friendly and helpful with restaurants nearby. This hotel is business, leisure, and kid friendly. We didn't take the kids on this trip, but can't wait to go back.
