review.title: A little gem of a hotel!
review.reviewText: This hotel will be placed on my list for favorite hotel, and if I return to the San Francisco area, I would stay here again. The staff was courteous, the room was very clean, nicely decorated and comfortable and we had a bay view! Internet, airport shuttle service and parking were free as was an amazing buffet style breakfast. The location was perfect for getting to the airport and to major highways, as well as to the city. My daughter and I had a delightful stay.

review.title: Quite posh for an airport hotel
review.reviewText: The entry is elegant marble, the rooms are very well appointed, the bathroom i quite luxurious and breakfast on the terrace overlooking the bay the next morning made the stay perfect. You're very close to the airport - probably five minutes to drop off at the departure gate, but I never heard noise and I was on the side of the hotel nearest the airport. The flight path comes in over the bay, so noise is not an issue. The continental breakfast is definitely above the standard fare, including fresh fruit. The nearby restaurants are within walking distance and are reasonably good quality. We didn't use the airport shuttle, but the schedule appeared to be quite frequent. The staff at the front desk were helpful in recommending places to eat.

review.title: extremely satisfied with the whole experience
review.reviewText: very good experience and i would recommend it to anyone.

review.title: Very Impressive.
review.reviewText: This is a very nice hotel. Very clean and quiet. The continental breakfast is one of the best we've seen. Within walking distance of some nice and reasonably priced restaurants. We really enjoyed our stay here.

review.title: ok nothing exceptional
review.reviewText: the hotel policy should initiate welcoming the guest since we travel so far to reach that place which we found missing rooms were good lobby was neat and the breakfast was ok but the initial experince when we checked in was not good since we were so tired after our long journey there was no water in our room to drink which looked so small for the hotel to offer but they said its the policy matter

review.title: Good value
review.reviewText: Chose the hotel as I had a flight from SFO late the next day, based on proximity to airport and the room price was good. Staff very friendly and helpful, need a late chack out which was no problem. Room fine, plenty of space, nice to have separate shower and bath. Shuttle bus to airport very convenient

review.title: I'LL BE BACK!!!
review.reviewText: The hotel is right across the SF airport and BART, which means easy access to to the City in 45 min. BTW I'm from NYC. I did not want to take taxi and since the hotel has courtesy airport/hotel shuttle so I took advantage. The hotel was great and it was my second visit to San Francisco. This hotel was and still is the greatest. They have make your own waffles in the morning (complimentary breakfast), housekeeping is great and I have no complaints about any noise what-so-ever (I was there for 5 days). During my tour of the City, other tourists were complaining about their hotel and how much they were paying for parking. Well, I bragged about MY HOTEL and the fact that parking is FREE w/ WIFI. AWESOME!!! This hotel may be rated 3 stars, to me it's a 5. I WILL STAY AGAIN!

review.title: Good Bay area travel hotel
review.reviewText:
Free parking, continental breakfast and clean rooms. We had the easiest check-in ever.
There was a small issue with the front desk around 8pm: there was only one person working the entire hotel. So if there is a critical need for something, you will be waiting with other guests.
The room was clean. The service was good and the free parking, shuttle and breakfast for this price were outstanding.
Would definitely recommend for a layover or local conventions!

review.title: A good choice if you need to be near the airport
review.reviewText: close to the airport which is the main attraction. Quiet, room was fine, clean with frige and microwave. there's not m,uch around the hotel - a local pub and a gas station where you can buy milk, chips and pop but not much else. Great for those early flights or late arrivals. the shuttle left 5 minutes early at 6am - so get there with a few minutes to spare.

review.title: Very Comfortable
review.reviewText: It is a very comfortable / clean hotel, especially the traditional bed design. Also very closed to airport and easy to find.

review.title: One of the nicer hotels near SFO.
review.reviewText:
This is the third hotel I have stayed at near SFO and the nicest one of all.
I would recommend this over other hotels in the vicinity going for similar rates.

review.title: Pleasant place to stop on your way home.
review.reviewText: We checked in around 3pm and checked out at 4am. Our flight was at 6am. They forgot our wake up call. Luckily my husband is a light sleeper. Liked the Elephant Bar restaurant in walking distance!

review.title: Very comfortable---and free cookies!!!
review.reviewText: Lovely hotel, great people, good breakfast, and FREE COOKIES in the evenings! A good value, very satisfying.

review.title: Very nice hotel
review.reviewText: Check in and check out was friendly & professional. A recommendation to eat at the Elephant Bar was given to us and wow, we loved it. The continental breakfast was very nice. The only service that we think could improve is the timeliness of the airport pick up shuttle the hotel provides. We waited for almost an hour.

review.title: Very satisfied! A great choice!
review.reviewText:
Very nice room, much better breakfast than most , great view of the bay, paved walking trail along the water. genuinely friendly staff.
Refrigerator in the room, good Mexican restaurant nearby, shuttle service to the airport.
I will stay here again!

review.title: Quiet and comfy
review.reviewText: We come to the Bay area every year, as we have relatives. Great location with quiet and comfortable rooms. Definitely will look at staying here again!

review.title: Quality for a good price
review.reviewText: Chose this hotel because of its outstanding reviews. From our experience, they are deserved. Check-in was efficient and friendly. Room was clean and quiet with every amenity one might need. We did not have a bay view but did enjoy walking along the bayshore path. Breakfast provided variety and quality. Van service was on time. The Elephant Bar Restaurant is a short walk across two parking lots and was very busy the night we went there. Waited 25 minutes for a table and enjoyed our choices from the extensive menu. Prices were reasonable. Other than a Mexican restaurant next door, there didn't seem to be must other commercial activity (drug store, market, etc.) in the area, which may be a liability for some, especially those without their own transportation. Since we were there just overnight between flights, this was no problem.

review.title: Much more than expected
review.reviewText: First off, for the money this hotel cannot be beat. Location to SFO is great with a shuttle to take you back and forth to the airport and to BART. The hotel sits right on the bay with a beautiful view if you sit outside and enjoy complimentary breakfast. Hotel was well above the standards of your typical airport hotel. We work for the airline industry so we travel quite often on weekend trips. Rooms were very clean and the service was prompt. Breakfast at this hotel was above the norm as well. While no hot items such as scrambled eggs or bacon, the make yourself waffle bar and a wide variety of other items more than made up for this. I got a great price on this hotel through Expedia Special rates and it was one of my best hotel deals of late. Great airport hotel... would definitely recommmend.

review.title: we will be back
review.reviewText: Beautiful. Loved the decor. Clean. Nice breakfast. Plan on staying there on our next trip to San Francisco.

review.title: Great quality and value Hotel...
review.reviewText: Great Hotel in this price range. I was in town for a short conference and location was very convenient. Shuttle arrived quickly to deliver me to the hotel. Check in was a snap. Room spacious and clean. Free internet access was a plus. Staff was always friendly. The breakfast that was provided each morning exceeded my expectation and was quite nice. Definitely would go stay again if the need arises.

review.title: Great feedback
review.reviewText: I make the travel arrangements for my company and everyone I have sent to this hotel says that it is absolutely perfect for the purpose. Our office is not very far away and it makes it easier when you have a great, clean hotel to stay at a reasonable rate.

review.title: Pro and Con
review.reviewText:
I had to wait 10 minutes before someone showed up in the reception. Later, a women showed up.

Anyways,apart from this incident, the hotel was clean, room nice and spacious, bathroom clean, bed comfortable.

Breakfast, included, good. The breakfast room is quite little and it cant get easily crowded. Waiters should be faster in clean used tables for new customers.

I would say that staff is not 100% good but the hotel is good. I'll reccomend this hotel.

review.title: Nice place
review.reviewText: Hotel is situated next to the Bay and has a nice patio area to enjoy the complimentary breakfast or just hang out and watch the planes land. The food is no great shakes but what we've all come to expect from these breakfast buffets. There is a walking trail that goes to a nice little park and nearby restaurants. Super easy access to SFO, BART and CalTrain. Can't beat this place for the price we paid.

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText:
The hotel exceeded all expectations I had. We arrived with a two hour delay so the shuttle service to the airport was no longer available. We took a taxi and arrived in about 10 minutes. The front desk was extremely polite and friendly and had us checked-in in no time , the room was great, very confortable and nicely decorated.
Breakfast Buffet was excellent with a very nice spread, here again it exceeded what we had expected as usually Breakfast at hotels near the airport is nothing more than bagles and cereal.
I will definetely go back to this hotel, in fact my two travel companions returned home before I did and both of them stayed at the same hotel

review.title: Very good hotel
review.reviewText: The room is large and clean. The continental breakfast was great, there were many different choices.

review.title: A little too close to airport
review.reviewText: Hotel was nice, breakfast great and staff friendly. Hotel is a little close to airport so planes are noisy. We weren't flying in or out so airport didn't matter.

review.title: This was my home away from home!
review.reviewText: The location of the hotel is perfect and close to everything. The front desk was courteous and informative. The rooms were very clean and comfortable, especially the beds! Breakfast area was very clean and the food was healthy and tasty.

review.title: Pleasant, quiet, exactly what I needed
review.reviewText:
I stayed at the Bay Landing for 3 nights attending a wedding. Other family members were here in their own rooms. We were (pleasantly) surprised not to be disturbed by aircraft or traffic noise; there is some but not enough to wake a person up.

Every room has a refrigerator and microwave. The fridge is turned off when you check in so you don't need to turn it on unless you've got something you want kept cool. There's a self service area where you can get snacks and frozen food, so even if you're jetlagged you can get some sort of meal at any hour.

The bed was comfortable. Foam pillows were available on request. The towels were thick and nice, with good toiletries in the bathroom. They have that curved shower curtain that makes showers so pleasant. Water temperature was good and pressure was fine, though I think my shower head needed to be cleaned since the pulse setting wasn't all that pulsating anymore.

Breakfast was included. There were choices for pretty much every dietary need. Nothing cooked to order, but you could make your own waffles if you wanted to.

There are at least two nice restaurants just on the other side of the parking lot, within EASY walking distance. The neighborhood is all hotels and airport services, so if you're looking for a fun location this isn't it. But it's close to the highway and airport.

A clean, comfortable, and pleasant place to stay. VERY good value; you get everything you really need without fancy services that have high overhead.

review.title: Everything I had hoped for..........and more!
review.reviewText:
This small hotel is in an excellent location, right on the San Francisco Bay and a short drive from San Francisco. The property is well maintained inside and out. The rooms are immaculate and very tastefully decorated. Lovely bathrooms......marble and tile.
Free parking. Free breakfast....including waffle machines. Complimentary hot coffee and tea in the lobby 24 hours per day. Complimentary newspaper.
I cannot think of one negative thing to say. I will most definitely be staying at the Bay Landing Hotel again.

review.title: Not quite what it was promoted as
review.reviewText:
We were early yet allowed to check in. Tried to wash hands in bathroom sink, no hot water, no water at all in the shower. Called front desk with concern and was told I should have gotten a voicemail that it would be fixed in a couple of
hours. They left message on everyones voicemail the day before, replied I had just checked in and someone neglected to inform us of this. Room was ok but not the view we were promised. Pillows sucked got major neck ache and backache. 2nd day maids didn't leave towels or complimentary water had to chase them down for towels. Walls paper thin and lots of kids running up and down halls. Restaurant had great view, food was good, however the day we left there was no manager or person in charge leaving the poor girl who busses tables to wait on us. She did a wonderful job but didn't have a clue how to put the check in the computer. Kept apologizing although it was not her fault someone else fell down on the job. We believe they both deserve a promotion. Apparently the managers and servers thought the two bussers could handle things themselves. They did a wonderful job but this left us with a bad last impression of service. Hotel needs some updating and cleaning up inside and outside. We more than likely would not stay here again.

review.title: love it
review.reviewText: This hotel has a very friendly staff, it is very clean and I love that it is in a good area around different places to dine. I was given a very nice room facing the bay and the airport so I could see the planes landing which was a very nice view.

review.title: Great place to stay...
review.reviewText:
The hotel is great and the location is beautiful. It is very convenient to the SFO airport and only 15-20 minutes to San Francisco downtown and all the attractions. The walk behind the hotel at the waterfront is a beautiful. The hotel also offers free complimentary breakfast with lots of choices.

The staff was very helpful and very professional.

We really enjoyed our stay at Bay Landing hotel with our 18 month old son. He especially enjoyed the walk behind the hotel where he was free to run around and we could just sit and relax enjoying a nice breeze from the Bay.....

review.title: Outstanding hotel!
review.reviewText: Excellent physical facilities; beautifully maintained; outstanding service. All that anyone could want in a hotel.

review.title: Great view, great stay.
review.reviewText: Clean room, great view of planes coming in for landing over the bay, nice amenities & wonderful breakfast service.

review.title: Baseball season
review.reviewText: Trip to see baseball game in San Francisco

review.title: Beautiful view of the SF Bay and area.
review.reviewText: Good location and FREE parking!

review.title: Looking forward to our next trip there!
review.reviewText: This was our second visit to the Bay Landing Hotel. Our last stay was 4 years ago. So, we were a little concerned about room conditions after 4 years of normal wear. Well, we had nothing to worry about. The hotel was in excellent condition. The staff, room, and continental breakfast were wonderful. We were very pleased with our stay and definately would return.

review.title: Convenient airport and BART access
review.reviewText:
If you want to visit San Francisco without staying there, this is the perfect spot. You can see the bay from some of the rooms, there is an Elephant Bar and an El Torito right next door but beware these places were packed with hour long waits during the weekend. BART station not withing walking distance but park and ride service is excellent, 1 buck for parking during the week and free during the weekends. From the BART station u can goto downtown San Fran for 8.50 round trip per person.

I just saw a giant paragraph about the breakfast there and I will just say yes it is very good. Front desk was professional and helpful and rooms were pretty darn nice as well. If I am anywhere near San Fran I would stay here again for sure.

review.title: Good Choice
review.reviewText:
We chose this hotel as a layover after a trip to China and it was perfect for us. The check-in was easy and we were upgraded to a bay view room. The room was very comfortable and clean and the view was lovely.
Breakfast was included in our rate and although only continental there was lots of choice including various cereals, pastries, waffles, pancakes and fresh fruit.
We would definitely use this hotel again and would also recommend it to others.

review.title: Great hotel at a great price
review.reviewText: Great hotel with wonderful breakfast and airport shuttle. Comfortable room with all the amenities at a great price - I highly recommend it!

review.title: WOW!! 5 STAR ACCOMODATIONS!!!
review.reviewText: From the minute we walked in i knew i made a good choice selecting this hotel. The front desk staff were super nice. I got my room 4 hours early before check in time. The room was big, clean, comfortable and had double pane windows for airplane noise. I never heard a plane go by. The room also had a mini microwave, mini coffee maker and a mini refrigerator. The room looked like one of the rooms from ceasars palace or Treasure Island Las vegas very luxurious. The hotel sits right next to the bay with a walking path. At night you can see the water tides coming in. Romantic views for a couple. I was there with my husband and 2 young children, they loved it. We travel alot and were very impressed with this hotel. It was better than some well known hotels. They even offer free internet in your room and a free computer to use in the lobby with a printer. It was perfect because I was able to purchase and print tickets to Alcatraz there. I was so impressed with there FREE fresh delicious breakfast. Fresh waffles, cereal, fruit juice and yogurts were offlered. Different types of pastries were also offered. I enjoyed their free coffee and tea they offered all day. Parking was free and secured. I was able to see my car from my room. I recommend you ask for the 4th floor with a bay or lagoon view. Housekeeping was great. they found my earing and placed it on my night stand. I will definitely stay here again.

review.title: Looking forward to coming back.
review.reviewText:
This was our 2nd time at this hotel and we loved it both times. I don't know if they always do it but both times we were there they had fresh cookies at the counter and they were good. We will be staying there again for a week in May and I am looking forward to it. The breakfast BUFFET they have is the best of all the locations I have stayed at.
I love this hotel and definately would recommend it to others.

review.title: Great San Francisco airport hotel
review.reviewText: My wife and I really enjoyed the hotel. The breakfast is included and features a nice assortment of items (cereal, fruit, waffles, bagels, yogurt, etc.). There is free wireless internet, which is handy. Also, there's a great walking path in the back that runs along the bay and affords a beautiful view of the SF airport. The free shuttle takes you back and forth to the airport, and the Millbrae BART station is just about a 30-minute walk away if you don't have a car.

review.title: So-so service acceptable for the price!
review.reviewText: The breakfast was good and the accomodations rivaled that of other hotels. We first checked our bags early and received good service from the front desk. The receptionist was very helpful in giving us direction and assistance in getting into the city. When we returned a different receptionist was not as helpful and not as friendly. The only other problem were the paper thin walls and children running across the room upstairs creating excessive amounts of noise. The shuttle was late many times but learned that the shuttle company often only had one driver on the route.

review.title: Great SF airport hotel
review.reviewText: The only heads up I would have for guests is a warning that the airport shuttle leaves about 2-3 minutes early. I missed my shuttle by about 1 minute even though I was there on time. Because of this I had to pay for a $12 cab which was annoying. Just be a few minutes early for the hotel's free airport shuttle and you'll be fine.

review.title: Will Definitely Return
review.reviewText: This hotel was very nice and appreciated the free parking and the rate paid. Wished we could have stayed more than 1 night.

review.title: Good Hotel. Can't wait to go back.
review.reviewText: Nice hotel. The breakfast was great. Very close to the airport. Would definitely stay again.

review.title: Great Value!
review.reviewText: We visited during Spring in late March of 2010. Breakfast was great - make your own waffles, toast, muffins, bagels, microwave pancakes and french toast strips, 4-5 types of cereal, apples, bananas, canned fruit, yogurt, jello, four types of juice, coffee, decaf, tea...served from 6am-10am. Hotel is next to the Bay; nice view. Close to airport, though didn't really notice the noise from inside the room. Room was clean, though my son complained about the Moen showerhead's spray being weird, and the bed was a little too soft (I have a firm bed at home). Within walking distance to a Benihana, El Torito and Elephant Bar.

review.title: Great location and very nice
review.reviewText: My wife and I loved this hotel. If we had known how nice this place is, we would have arranged for more of our stay in the SF area, to be at this hotel. After a long day of site seeing, it was nice to walk along the waterfront to dinner at great restaurants near the hotel.

review.title: Pretty Good Stay at Bay Landing
review.reviewText:
Great service and location for the price. Also loved that they had a small pantry area with food stuffs that you could purchase, especially microwaveable items. Totally thought these were going to be marked up, but they were actually regularly priced. This was good as we got in late and wanted something to eat--anything to eat, but didn't have a car to travel.

Breakfast in the morning is pretty decent too.

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: Elephant Bar just a few steps away is a great place to eat. Will stay here again

review.title: Keep coming back
review.reviewText: Have stayed at Bay Landing 4 times now and have been very happy each time. Convenient to SFO, the lovely town of Burlingame, and good restaurants close by. Great option if you are having a stopover / international flight connections.

review.title: impressive
review.reviewText: Good Value for Money. Very convenient to Airport. Clean and friendly staff. Parking free. Will go back again.

review.title: Can't wait to go back
review.reviewText: Great hotel usually stay at the Hampton Inn but discovered Bay Landing by chance - On business trips the Hampton has great breakfasts but this I must say out did the Hampton, I only have one suggestion, kind of missed the sauage & eggs - not to thrilled with "Hard-boiled" for Breakfast, other than that they have an awesome selection. Looks like I would have to toss a coin next time - where the Bay Landing has a great walk-way in back of hotel, the Hampton has great beds.

review.title: Great again
review.reviewText: Have stayed at the Bay Landing 3 times now and again it was great. Nice, clean room, great rate and good breakfast.

review.title: Can't wait to go back
review.reviewText: Nice comfort & enviroment, great breakfast, convenient location,

review.title: excelent
review.reviewText: escellent

review.title: SFO Hotel
review.reviewText: Very nice room with excellent breakfast included.

review.title: will be back
review.reviewText: Have stayed here on several occasions, and have always been happy

review.title: Great place to stay
review.reviewText: This is a nice hotel. Has a nice view of the bay. Can see airplanes land and take off although you can not hear them (yay). The continental breakfast is very good. You can make your own belgian waffles, very good! They also have a computer in the lobby for general use.

review.title: Convenient and comfortable for airport travelers
review.reviewText: The room was clean and comfortable. The breakfast contains hot and cold items to choose from. Besides room access there is a computer that connects to the internet in the lobby area. There is a microwave, which makes it nice should you arrive late and just want to heat a frozen meal that can be purchased in the little snack/sundry shop next to the main lobby. The shuttle service is a real plus for travelers who arrive at or depart from the SFO airport.

review.title: VERY NICE JUST AS EXPECTED
review.reviewText: A VERY NICE HOTEL , WITH A GOOD BREAKFAST AT A REASONABLE PRICE.

review.title: Best in the Bay area!
review.reviewText: Stop your search right here! This is the place for you! This will always be our first choice whenever we're in the Bay area. Don't even need a car. Shuttle to airport, then BART (etc) to anywhere! Lovely spotless rooms, nice staff, decent breakfast. A-1 in every way. Beautiful and safe Bay-side location.

review.title: I shall return!
review.reviewText: A great place to stay!

review.title: Excellent value airport hotel
review.reviewText: Excellent value, all non-smoking / no pets (hooray) hotel. Clean, well maintained (better than many 5* hotels), good friendly service, and a nice buffet / continental breakfast. Free shuttle to SFO. Free internet. Exactly what I wanted, exectly what they delivered.

review.title: Great value - will stay again
review.reviewText:
Being right near SFO was very convenient for my business travel. I have stayed at the Bay Landing twice now, and was more than satisfied on both occasions.

The building is fairly new so everything is in great shape. The rooms are spacious (with high ceilings) and the decor is a touch above most mid-level hotels. The fitness center is great, as is the morning breakfast spread - which is quite ample. You don't hear the airport at all unless you're outside, and even then it is minimal. Free parking and high speed internet is always appreciated, as is the public use computer near reception - printing off boarding passes and such makes getting through any airport that much smoother.

All in all, if you don't have to be in a specific area of San Francisco / Bay Area, I would recommend this as a great value for any airport area hotel.

review.title: Excellent value
review.reviewText:
Handy to SFO with an excellent breakfast. A car is needed to get to the restaurants other than a Mexican next door. The rooms are a good size and quite comfortable.

I will stay here again.

review.title: The hotel couldn't be better.
review.reviewText:
This is a wonderful place to stay. We were planning to spend time in San Francisco. In reviewing the hotels in S.F.there were often expensive parking fees. The rooms sounded small. Our past experience in our budget range, there is a lot of noise from the city coming in and sometimes not so safe seeming surroundings.

Our room at Bay Landing was large, immaculate, and quiet. There is a lovely walking path along the bay right outside the door. The staff were exceptionally nice. Having free parking was nice. It was about a 15 minute drive into the city. Perfict in every way for us.

review.title: PERFECT FOR ME
review.reviewText:
I will always stay here, the Embassy Suites is like a giant slumber party for
children whenever I am there---I was always a fan until so fed up with the children playing tag thru cocktail hour and jamming up the limited elevators all the time. I found the Bay Landing after watching the construction during my seldom visits. Love location to Bart, the Bay Trail and walking distance to several restaruants. It has a great outdoor patio tucked out of the Bay wind - however has no food or beverage until the all included free continental breakfast. I am ok with that because all rooms have a table, microwave and fridge if you must have any food or beverage available.

review.title: Nice
review.reviewText: I was pleased overall with this hotel. It was quiet, clean and convenient.

review.title: Bay Landing
review.reviewText: Adorable, cozy, cute hotel - perfect for a quick overnight stay. The free breakfast was amazing and so was the view during it!

review.title: One of the nicest business hotels I have ever stayed in
review.reviewText: The hotel was clean and nicely furnished. Warm pleasant colors with understated elegance. The hotel room was very spacious and comfortable, once again with warm tones and classy. The only thing missing was a pool and spa.

review.title: Will return again!
review.reviewText: The bay view is beautiful and the hotel location is very convenient for restaurants and airport.

review.title: Great, yet again...5th (or 6th?) time
review.reviewText: Very convenient for the airport and highway 101, great service, really clean and lovely staff

review.title: great place to stay
review.reviewText: everything was clean and accomodations were good. I would stay here again for sure.

review.title: Worth the try...nice!
review.reviewText: Above ave room decor. Hotel is on the bay south of SFO and far enuff off 101 to actually be quiet. Decent shuttle and trans to sf-city is poss to avoid renting a car to visit there. The two neighboring restaurants are v. good and on the Bay. B'fast are in hotel large and decent offerings for self serve affair. Would stay again.

review.title: Great room & free breakfast & price
review.reviewText: Shuttle from airport was timely and so convenient. Hotel was close but no airplane noise. Room was large and tasteful decorated and the free breakfast buffet had an amazing large selection; waffles, pancakes, pastry, hard boiled eggs, fruit, certal, yogart, toast , bagels, cheese, and very popular. Two restaurants in walking distance too. Definitely would stay again.

review.title: Very Impressed
review.reviewText: Really liked the walkway right on the bay. The breakfast was good and the fresh baked cookies in the afternoon was a nice touch.

review.title: Extremely Impressed
review.reviewText: My husband and I stayed at this hotel with our two small children and were extremely impressed. The hotel is beautiful inside and outside, with a nice view of the bay. Staff was very friendly and competent; the location is conveniently close to a highway entrance; the room was clean and spacious, and breakfast was varied and abundant (warm waffles were my favorite). We definitely received a lot for the value we paid and will stay there a lot whenever we get the chance to visit the bay area again.

review.title: Good value in a great location!
review.reviewText: This is a small hotel in a great location ... close to SFO and right on the bay with a walking/running path right outside.

review.title: Very nice hotel, well worth the low price.
review.reviewText:
Free Parking - clean rooms - generous breakfast - new facilities.
Hotel is set in an industrial area but it doesn't matter at all for the type of hotel.
Short drive to down town San Francisco. I enjoyed my stay here.

review.title: My new regular hotel when using SFO
review.reviewText: Arrived late in evening and left eary a.m. so not able to take advantage of all the amenities. The FREE parking was a real plus, compared to all the other hotels in area that gouge you. Pleasant staff. Clean, comfortable room, excellent free breakfast, convenient location.

review.title: Nice European /American combo feeling
review.reviewText: It's location is perfect being right down on the water with a quiet, scenic and safe place to walk just outside the hotel on a path by the water. Also good cheap place to eat nearby called Elephant Bar.

review.title: European-style hotel in California
review.reviewText: This really is an "European-style hotel" -- only four floors, windows that can be opened to the outside (about 8 inches) for fresh air, traditional decor, tea/coffee urns available in afternoon/evening on 1st floor, frequently replenished buffet breakfast, no noisy bar/lounge. Staff professional and helpful. Near airport, but good soundproofing. Grreat public jogging/walking path wraps around the bay right outside the dining room entrance. We've stayed here several times a year since 2006 when visiting family in nearby Burlingame -- the grandkids think it's our home! We are big fans of the Bay Landing Hotel -- oh yes, and its fun to watch the planes landing across the bay from the hotel.

review.title: SFO Int' Airport Best hotel
review.reviewText:
Very clean, excellent staff, excellent location. better than any other hotels I have stayed & More expensive.

Bay Landing is Superb Value

review.title: Good stay
review.reviewText: Nice hotel. Limited facilities, but OK.

review.title: Wonderful hotel.
review.reviewText: There is nothing better than having only good comments about a hotel that you have stayed in, and this is completely the case with the Bay Landing Hotel. My whole experience was terrific. Great room, superb breakfast, and awesome staff!

review.title: Good Value for Money Near SFO
review.reviewText: This hotel is clean, well run, and offers a great breakfast.

review.title: Amazing Value, great breakfast, great staff, great service. Would not hesitate to return Thank You
review.reviewText: Would highly recommend this hotel

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel is only 5 mins from SFO. There's van service every 5 mins. They put out a nice breakfest every morning. Room was clean.

review.title: Great Hotel close to San Francisco
review.reviewText: This hotel was great. Good rooms and close to several eateries. No noise from airport which it is very close to. Breakfast was great. Only 30 mins drive into San Francisco. Would definitely stay again. Staff friendly and helpful.

review.title: Great Stay
review.reviewText: We spend three nights here while visiting San Francisco, and the Napa Valley. Our room faced the water and the airport, but there was minimum noise from the planes landing and taking off. We rented a car so being 20 minutes or so from Fisherman's Wharf was not a problem. The hotel rate was excellent for the location, and we did a better rate using Expedia than we could get my calling the hotel.

review.title: Best yet.
review.reviewText: Have stayed in a few hotels in the States in various locations but this one was the best yet. Good continental breakfast and free use of internet linked computer including printer were a definite bonus for travellers without the ubiquitous laptop. If you had one of these a free hard wired internet connection was available in your room.

review.title: Excellent value
review.reviewText: This hotel is near to the airport. The rooms were lovely, complete with refrigerator, microwave and coffee pot. Great for a warm evening snack or preparing lunch for a days outing. There was NO noise from the airport. It was a quick 15-20 minute drive into the city. Great value, nice accommodations.

review.title: loved the breakfast
review.reviewText: I was amazed at the variety of food they had for the free breakfast. The hotel room was also cozy and very nice. I would definitely stay here again.

review.title: Bay Landing ,Best for money
review.reviewText: Cant wait to use the hotel again.reception are friendly and helpful. Very accomodating for elderly and dis-abled.the Shuttle bus are on time and you can always call them as time allocated.The breakfast are reasonable. we do not have any problem . Having an elderly company who is so fragile,the hotel have given us reasonable room and very helpful to us .I like the gym which has a good view of the hotel. Hotel is well cleaned and the price is reasonable .always book through expedia as if you excess the date you will be paying more as the price for booking is different when you get there. we are exremelly satisfied

review.title: Very Impressed with this hotel for the price
review.reviewText: Overall, I am very satisified my experience with hotel. However, the attitude of customer representative in Payless Rental car was horrible and ignores my questions regarding the rental cars has lot of dents

review.title: Would visit again
review.reviewText: Hotel is very nice and one of the best continental breakfasts I have seen in a hotel. My only complaint is they provide only 3 small pillows for a king size bed. Hotel staff was friendly.

review.title: Nice and Comforatble Hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel is close by the water and the airport. With the room's triple glazed windows, there is no noise from the planes taking off. Lots of parking and free internet. Breakfast is limited on cereal, waffles and toast. Cold food such as yogourt, jello and fruit is available. Don't expect hot food like scrambled eggs. (At least not while I was there) Overall a pleasant stay. Customer service is sloppy as they look like they are there to work 8 hours and go home. Did not feel welcomed to their hotel. Close to restaurants and grocery stores. 2 minutes away from the freeway and 20 minutes to Fisherman's Wharf. Will consider this hotel again in the future.

review.title: "Excellent Choice!"
review.reviewText: We thoroughly enjoyed the Bay Landing San Francisco hotel and ended up staying for five days. It is beautiful and their accommodations were fantastic. We were able to enjoy our lavish breakfast out on their terrace overlooking the bay. It is in a wonderful location for San Francisco and has four restaurants within walking distance. We personally loved the Elephant Bar. We will definitely recommend and go back to this hotel when we are in California.

review.title: A comfortable Landing in San Francisco
review.reviewText: Our accommodations at Bay Landing were perfect for our trip to San Francisco. It sits right on the bay and has a great view of planes arriving and departing across the bay. The complimentary breakfast was great; the rooms comfortable; and the location provided easy access to San Francisco and surrounding areas in CA which we visited.

review.title: Excellent choice and price near airport
review.reviewText:
Best breakfast we had on our California hotel- great choice of cereals, breads, pastries,fruits , together withmake your own waffles, rice pudding and jelly! Free cookies in the afternoon as well.
Short $8 taxi ride to Millbrae bart station, where it was $8.50 return per person into the city.
Although it is possible to get the free shuttle to airport, the bart from there to city is $17 return per person, so if there are 2 or more of you it is cheaper and quicker to take first option.

review.title: No regret to stay at this hotel again
review.reviewText: I first stayed at this hotel in May 2009 and then the second time in Oct 2009. I didn't have a car for my second visit so I frequently used the hotel shuttle service to and from the airport which is very convenient. Lots of selection for the breakfast and the free wired and wireless internet connection in the room are some of the things that I like about this hotel. Even though the hotel is facing the SFO runway, the room is very quiet and you would not know you are so close to the airport. As an aviation enthusiast, I really enjoy my time taking pictures of the landing airplanes from the park next to the hotel.

review.title: Nice place
review.reviewText: We visited wine country, and wanted our last night to be near the airport for an early flight. Selected this one based on stars and price, and was very impressed. Only sorry we had to leave so quickly.

review.title: What a find!
review.reviewText: Would definitely recomend this hotel. Searched for hotels on the internet and chose it because of the reviews and the price. Was a little worried about what it would be like when we got there, coming from SD, but it was everything they advertised and more. The breakfast buffet was unbelievable and staff were very friendly. Would love to come back.

review.title: Great place to stay !!
review.reviewText: I have stayed in this hotel twice, it is super clean the staff is friendly and it is in a great location, about 15 minutes from San Francisco and minutes from the airport.

review.title: No ordinary airport hotel
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing is an outstanding hotel and puts paid to the notion that airport hotels have to mediocre and expensive. Excellent, spacious, well-equipped rooms (with WiFi included, as well as a refrigerator, microwave, etc.). The breakfast included in the price would shame many 5* hotels.

review.title: Good idea if the price is right (changes by day)
review.reviewText: We stayed for 4 days prior to returning to UK after a super California car touring holiday. The room rates were especially good and breakfast was included. It takes 20-30 minutes to drive to downtown San Francisco so this could be a good base as parking is free.Burlingame is a lively town with European feel, many bistros and good shops in Highstreet. Play tennis for free at local school.

review.title: Clean, Comfortable, Good Value
review.reviewText: I recently spent 3 nights at the Bay Landing and found it to be an excellent place to stay. The room was clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and helpful. Complimentary breakfast and nice restaurants next door are a real plus. Book through Expedia for the best rate.

review.title: Great place...
review.reviewText: It was clean, comfortable and nicely located to all the things we wanted to do while visiting San Francisco. The free breakfast was awesome, do take advantage of it!

review.title: Becoming a Regular
review.reviewText: This hotel is conveniently located near our San Francisco office and it has become my favorite place to book a hotel for our company travelers.

review.title: Very Nice
review.reviewText: Excellent location next to the water. We really enjoyed our stay and will be staying there again when in the area. Walking distance to nice resturants.

review.title: A good choice
review.reviewText: Great hotel for the rate. The room is spacious. We had a baby with a playpen and stroller etc. and we still had lots of room left. It's clean and well-maintained. The free breakfast is pretty good. Love the hotel surroundings. Nice for a walk in the morning. Just one thing, the blankets are not as comfy as I hope. I wish they would provide nice comforters.

review.title: i would stay there again
review.reviewText: i was suppose to get a double bed but the front desk send us to a bed with a queen. we were exhausted and had to go back down and the clerk didn't even apologize. She was very mean. other than that the hotel was nice, breakfast was great everyday.

review.title: Convenient place to stay
review.reviewText: Bay Landing is a convenient place to stay for both leisure and business activities when in Burlingame. The hotel is clean and comfortable and we are able to rest well there.

review.title: I will stay at The Bay Landing again and again when I go back.
review.reviewText: This was our first time that we chose to stay at this hotel and I could say we were very much pleased with every thing. I do like to add a minor comment regarding the not so pleasant approach of the front desk ladies at the registration desk. I would expect from any person at that position to be always smiling and at least eager to be more hospitable and making the guests feel at home. It makes a big difference for the hotels business and for it's good reputation. I would recommend all my family, friends, and visitors to stay at the Bay Landing anytime.

review.title: Great Hotel close to the Airport
review.reviewText: We have now stayed in this hotel 3 times and we have never been disappointed. It is situated right on the bay & has a walking trail along the water. Rooms are very spacious & nicely decorated. It is amazing value for the price. There is a free shuttle that takes you to the S.F. Airport and picks you up. At the airport you can catch the BART (subway system) so it is easy for getting downtown & to many of the tourist attractions. If you have a car, parking is free. Breakfast is included & very nice. If the weather is nice, the patio is a great place to sit & relax. There are also 2 cool restaurants right beside the hotel. Can't wait to go back.

review.title: Fantastic
review.reviewText: Had a wonderful 5 night stay here. Had booked based on reviews and expedia special rate. Was not disappointed. Beautiful big room, clean, quiet, great breakfast. I was driving back and forth to the coast (Half Moon Bay) everyday and chose to stay here because of the price and great reviews. Worked perfectly and would do again.

review.title: Simple and easy
review.reviewText: Good location and very clean for a reasonable amount.

review.title: EXCELLENT ROOM
review.reviewText: The HOTEL has a big room , with comfortable beds and a big bathroom . Also has a FREE BUFFET BREAKFAST SELF-SERVE with inside and outside tables with bay view .

review.title: Pretty good for a brief stay
review.reviewText: The Hotel is clean and the service is good. Friendly people and willing to help.Please note that one cannot check in before 3 PM on the day of arrival.That can be an inconvenience if one reaches SFO earlier in the Day and wishes to get a hotel room.Overall a good experience staying there.

review.title: Best value for the money
review.reviewText: The hotel provides the best choice for travelers on a budget and don't want to give up the comfort. It's only about 10 min shuttle bus ride from SFO hotel, and quick 20 mins car ride to downtown SFO (on a Saturday afternoon). Free parking, breakfast, coffee and tea, and internet saves you at least 40 -50 bucks. The rooms are sufficiently spacious, clean and decent ameneties. The walkpath behind the hotel is great for a morning or afternoon walk with good view to the water and airport. Restaurants around the hotel proivdes some good choices for food. Overall, it was a pleasant stay.

review.title: Good breakfast & close to the airport
review.reviewText: We stayed at this hotel because we needed to fly out of SF super early at the end of our stay and because we like hotels with good complementary breakfasts. The place was peaceful and we slept well. Of course it would be nicer to be closer to the city but we don't regret staying here because it was a peaceful place to get to after a long day of travel. We did all our travel by public transportation and on foot so that took a considerable amount of time of our trip but we already knew exactly what we wanted to do every day so it was a relief not to have to deal with parking issues and fees and gas even though parking is free at this hotel. If you can afford a good hotel closer to the city, then go for it but if you want a great hotel for a reasonable price then this is a good option specially if you are flying to SF.

review.title: had a wonderful stay.
review.reviewText: do take advantage of breakfast. We loved it.

review.title: Outstanding
review.reviewText: Bay Landing turned out to be more than we anticipated. The personnel was very helpful in anything we asked. The rooms were very clean, comfortable and economical when we traveled. The continental brkfst was more than sufficient and there was always more than enough for everyone. Great Place!

review.title: Convenient and clean.
review.reviewText: My husband and I stayed at the Bay Landing for a couple of nights in August before our long flight to South Korea. The free shuttle to and from the airport made it convenient to use the BART. That way we were able to tour San Francisco without a rental car. The breakfast offered a nice variety. And the room was comfortable with minimal airport noise and nice room-darkening drapes. The front-desk staff could have been more friendly and helpful. But that won't keep me from using the Bay Landing again and recommending to others.

review.title: Nice Hotel Chain
review.reviewText: The rooms are nice and clean, the staff are very helpful. You get a meal every morning however it is the same basic breakfast everyday so little change if you are there for a week. I would recommend this to anyone that is renting a car. If you do not have a car rental and want to see the sites in SF its about a 20 minute commute - not a big deal, at least wasn't for us we got to see alot. Overall I would recommend this hotel.

review.title: everything was good
review.reviewText: The only thing that could have been better is if the double beds were queen size rather that full size. It would have been more comfortable.

review.title: Wonderful experience for leisure and airport access
review.reviewText: We've traveled to Alaska and Europe to learn about the people and the places, but we didn't expect the SF area to be a comfort mecca. The Bay Landing Hotel was perfect for us. We watched airplanes land across the bay, and we took evening walks along the bay walkway adjacent to the hotel. Shuttle service starts at 4:08am... perfect for early flights. Wireless internet service worked perfectly, as did the other amenities. We're planning another trip to the west coast, and we'll definitely base our travels at Bay Landing.

review.title: Trip
review.reviewText: Comfortable and easy access to freeway and nice view of Bay and planes coming in and very quiet!!!

review.title: Best Hotel Ever!!
review.reviewText: We got a great deal on this hotel through Expedia.com compared to the hotel's web site which was much higher. We do a lot of traveling, and this was the first hotel that we have ever stayed in that everything was perfect to us. The property and rooms are so beautiful, clean and decorated very lovely. It was nice to have a mini frig, microwave and safe in our room. We had a bay view from our room which was a great way to watch the planes land at the airport. We had breakfast every morning on the lovely terrace that had a view to the bay. The continental breakfast buffet had a nice variety of food and beverages (no meat). We took awesome bay view walks along a path that was next to the hotel. If you don't want to bring your lap top computer, it's nice that they had a computer off of the lobby area for the guest to use next to the big screen TV. When we go back to San Francisco, we will always stay at this hotel!

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: Our family of 4 stayed 5 nights in the Bay Landing hotel. We really loved it, and was amazed to get that quality of hotel for its price. It's definitely the choice for people who want to visit San Francisco and have a car. We had a room with a view to the bay, and although near SFO, there was no noise from the planes. It was wonderful seeing the planes landing at night. We found the hotel very clean, modern, the room was excellent. Had free wireless and wired internet which worked perfectly. Bathroom is excellent, large and modern. The hotel also had a self service laundry which we found useful. One pitfall though - at one night we tried ordering an additional sheet for the kids, and were told there were no sheets... the hotel was far from being full - couldn't they have taken a sheet from a vacant room? Nevertheless - very recommended!

review.title: Great location next to sea
review.reviewText: Staff were in very short supply and could not attend to querries or requests. The hotal has no restaurent but plenty of places to eat nearby. the best part was the location right next to the cournich were it was great to walk and enjoy the sea

review.title: Great place to stay.
review.reviewText: I have no real complaints about this hotel. Room was very nice. Staff were great. Very clean and comfortable. Very happy.

review.title: Very nice Hotel... mostly
review.reviewText: My family and I had a very nice stay at the Bay Landing. The staff was courteous, the accomodations - warm and very clean. There were 4 nice restaurants within walking distance and easy access to the 101 Freeway. We only had two gripes. First, I recommend getting a room on the top floor as the noise from the doors and bathroom from the room above us actually woke us up (mostly from the doors). Secondly, if you are planning on utilizing the complimentary breakfast, don't expect much. The fruit was old, the only choice of bread (bagels included) was "White"... no wheat, rye, whole-grain etc. and the "eggs" advertised are ONLY hard-boiled .. and not very well, at that. Also, if you are planning on using the toasters, plan ahead. It took a total of 3 tries and 10 minutes to get the bread moderatly toasted. VERY old toasters. The hotel really is lovely though and we highly recommend it.

review.title: Wonderful Hotel!
review.reviewText: Extremely nice hotel at a very reasonable rate. Got a great deal through Expedia. Beautiful views, peaceful setting, very nice & clean room, great service, breakfast was extensive. Nice to be away from hustle & bustle of San Francisco. Staff very courteous & helpful. The nearby restaurants offered good food & service. Especially recommend the El Torro & Elephant Bar.

review.title: Can't wait to go back!
review.reviewText: The location was excellent! I enjoyed the walking path along the bay right outside the hotel. El Torito, Behihanas, and The Elephant Bar are walking distance if in the need for a quick meal. The exercise facility was great too with a treadmill and weight machines. There was a nice variety of foods and beverages at the continental breakfast. My family really enjoyed their stay!

review.title: Fabulous
review.reviewText: Great Hotel with Great location. I stayed here on business and it was so convenient to the airport. I did not rent a car and had to take the airport shuttle to and from the airport daily and it is was very prompt and free. The room was clean and very spacious and there are two great restaurants right outside the door. Also you are right on the Bay if you want to take a walk or just sit and unwind by the water. And free breakfast every morning. Will definitely stay here again!

review.title: wants to go back next week
review.reviewText: we love to walk by the bay in the night in the people that work there is very nice

review.title: A true gem in the SF area
review.reviewText: Let me start off with a laundry list - Pros: - free parking with in/out privilages [parking lot is quite big and each spot is really spacious] (one of the best thing about this hotel) - very spacious room (the room can definitely sleep four people comfortably) - free reliable in-room internet [wired and wireless] (very useful for business travelers) - hot coffee/tea/water in the lobby 24/7 plus in-room coffee maker - very quiet rooms (my room was facing the street and just outside of the elevator area yet it was so quiet that I had no problem sleeping) - safe neighborhood (it's mostly hotels catering to the business travellers, so there aren't any rowdy crowds and whatnots) Cons: - mediocre breakfast (muffins, bagels, waffles...same old same old) - distance from San Francisco (it's not far, but it's still a good 15 minutes away) - not much to do in the area (see "safe neighborhood" above) --- Overall, this place is probably the best in the area. Almost every hotel in San Francisco requires some sort of parking fees, and even in South SF/Burlingame there are still many hotels that charges parking fees. If you don't mind the 15 minutes drive to SF, this is the one. It sits on the shore of San Francisco Bay, so the view is spectacular in the day. At night you see planes landing in the distant. It's so nice to be able to have breakfast outside with the cool breeze looking at the calm water.

review.title: Exceeded our expectations
review.reviewText: Bay Landing was terrific - better than we expected. Hotel is lovely and the breakfast was really nice. Shuttle service to airport was helpful (to Bart) for trips into the City. Staff were polite and knowledgeable with tips about the area. The hotel was quiet and very convenient to airport and rental car drop-off (no Airplane noise). As we'd read on other traveler's reviews before the trip, the Elephant Bar restaurant next door was fun and food was good.

review.title: It was wonderful stay!
review.reviewText: Every thing was great,friendly, clean, and nice. I would recommend it to everybody.

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: This hotel is really great. Good location very near to the BART Station. It has a free parking, free high speed and wireless internet. The breakfast was the best part of this hotel. It is plentiful and just really a nice touch. Hotel room is spacious, housekeeping is excellent. Overall yes I would recommend this hotel again! PS: The people at the Front Desk were very very helpful as well, overall really friendly and knowlegeable staffs.

review.title: good hotel
review.reviewText: free breakfast, fast internet...

review.title: Nice place
review.reviewText: Rooms could be bigger, but good price.

review.title: Nice base
review.reviewText: We loved the hotel. It is very quiet- even though you could see the airport, you never heard the planes in the room. The breakfast was nice. (although no meat, it was nice.) The staff was very helpful. We would definitely stay there again.

review.title: great hotel
review.reviewText: only downside-no restaurant. everything else was great ! I was impressed

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: Location is great. Boardwalk behind hotel next to the ocean is a great way to spend the afternoon walking and watching all the air traffic at the airport. Rooms are a decent size. Several restaurants close by the hotel. Shuttle to airport was on time and very handy!

review.title: Great deal for the Price
review.reviewText: Everything about this hotel was very satisfactory from check in through breakfast to check out. I think that maybe because there is no spa or pool it's missing a star but the hotel is higher than the rating indicated, we will stay again...especially with the reduce rates!

review.title: Excellent Value
review.reviewText: Great value for the price.

review.title: Just like home
review.reviewText: Real nice deal, comfy room with view Stayed for 5 nights. Good service and decent breakfast for family of four. Will go back again.

review.title: Pleasant Stay
review.reviewText: This hotel lived up to our expectations. It was quiet, clean and the desk clerks were very helpful. It was particularly easy to locate. We will definitely stay there again.

review.title: Comfortable stay
review.reviewText: A clean hotel. Friendly staff and excellent breakfast.

review.title: Love Bayshore Landing
review.reviewText: When going up to the Bay area, we often use the Bayshore Landing as a base. It is conveniently located andcomfortable. We enjoy walks along the bay, watching planes land at SFO, eating a leisurely breakfast, and the fresh baked cookies last time were the best.

review.title: great views of the bay
review.reviewText: great hotel. excellent comp breakfast in the morning. comp coffee and cookies at night were a nice touch. nice clean rooms

review.title: Elegance and great comfort. This is my most favorite place to stay in SFO.
review.reviewText: Bay Landing is and will be my most favorite place to stay in SFO. The hotel has a distinct note of elegant design, it is sound-proof and it provides a great breakfast and complimentary full breakfast. Staff is very professional and location is great! Close to SFO airport, shopping and the magnificent walk path!

review.title: Great accomodations at a great price
review.reviewText: The complimentary breakfast was great. I found this to be a great hotel for the price and highly recommend. Room was clean and check in and check out process was smooth.

review.title: Bay Landing Never Disappoints!
review.reviewText: This was our fourth time to stay at the Bay Landing. We enjoy the hotel, the breakfast, the afternoon cookies, the internet access in the lobby and the back bay walking path. We also enjoy watching the jets take off and land from SFO across the bay. The windows are insulated; noise is not a problem. We love the Elephant Bar next door.

review.title: Great hotel!
review.reviewText: We had a very good time in this hotel. The hotel was very clean and everything was modern and in excellent condition. The hotel staff was extremely courteous and the breakfast was fantastic. We would stay there again if we are in SFO!

review.title: Great!
review.reviewText: Excellent hotel, comfortable beds. Although located near the airport, airplane noise was nonexistent. Terrific walking path along the water,

review.title: Front desk personnel is not very friendly
review.reviewText: Complimentary breakfast is great!

review.title: Convenient to airport
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel with good breakfast and cookies in the evening. Clean and nice views of the bay. Convenience store a plus.

review.title: Very pleased. Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Excellent food, wonderful service.. very good hotel.

review.title: Can't fault this one
review.reviewText: For an airport overnight stay this hotel is perfect. Newish with large rooms, ours had a view of the Bay. Located directly on the waterfront with a pleasant outdoor seating area, comfortable lounge and reading room with free internet. There are a number of restuarants within easy walking distance. Also free courtesy transport to the airport and breakfast. what more could we ask for. Thanks expedia

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: Hotel was a great location. Stayed two nights and visited the Maker Fair. Close to restaurants.

review.title: Convenient Location
review.reviewText: This hotel was perfect for our trip. Great breakfasts! We were visiting places both north and south of San Francisco - so this was centrally located to all of our activities. However, we did take a tour to Yosemite and this is NOT a hotel they will pick you up from. We had to drive to downtown to get the tour van and rise very early to do it! Otherwise - it was perfect for our needs!

review.title: very impressed
review.reviewText: Had a wonderful stay. clean. complimentary breakfast every morning. free parking. within walking distance to a mix of restaurants. a walking trail by the Bay. would not hesitate to return or recommend.

review.title: Good location, can't wait to go back
review.reviewText: Enjoyed are stay. Very good experience. Free breakfast and newspaper was a bonus. View of the bay was awesome.

review.title: Quiet with great free breakfast
review.reviewText: We love this place because of the quiet location. Just south of SFO, you can watch the planes land and not hear a thing. They also have a great continental breakfast that I haven't seen anywhere else. You can really fill up before heading out for your destination.

review.title: Will Go Back
review.reviewText: This hotel was better than expected. It was clean, elegant and within walking distance of El Torito Restaurant and the Elephant Bar. It was also close to the major 101 Highway and right by the water which was a great view. The double paned windows made it a very quiet room so that you didn't hear the planes landing at the nearby airport or the outside traffic. Continental breakfast included make it yourself waffles, pastries, fruit, bagles and cereal. Will be back there next year.

review.title: Great hotel for overnight stays near airport
review.reviewText: Stayed one night while waiting for a flight. The hotel had my expedia reservation and checked me right in. The airport shuttle was convenient, the breakfast buffet was nicer than I've experienced with most other "breakfast buffet included" hotels, and the room was large and clean. There are some restaurants nearby (walkable) for dinner, and the location on the bay was pleasant. I walked to the elephant bar restaurant for a fish and a beer, and it was a popular place. The shuttle seems to make a loop around several hotels, so be prepared to wait a few minutes for pickup. There is a phone in the airport hotel bus pickup stop where you can call to be picked up, but the bus seems to check all the stops anyway. The bus stop is on the arrival level, rather than baggage level, at least at the united terminal that I used. There are several different hotel buses that stop there, each of which goes to several hotels, and the one you need is "JNJ", if I recall correctly. The bay landing hotel is listed on the side of the bus.

review.title: very good!
review.reviewText: free internet computer in the lobby, nice Japaness restaurant across parking lot.

review.title: Great base camp.
review.reviewText: Not only was the hotel/breakfast perfect in every way, the free airport shuttle allowed us to go to and from the airport every day (5 minute trip) to catch the BART to San Francisco (30 minute trip). And to rent a car for Big Sur and Yosemite. Rates and more convenient location made our choice for us over city hotels. Computer w/printer in the lobby was a great perk for printing last minute tickets and boarding passes. Several restaurants within walking distance.

review.title: great place
review.reviewText: the best breakfast of any that offer within the price of room. very clean. amazing that i never heard one airplane the whole night.

review.title: Very convenient and pleasant airport hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel is very conveniently situated near SFO - far enough away that the aircraft are fascinating to watch, but not near enough to disturb. The room was spacious and very clean. The breakfast buffet was much better than most, with a good choice - and real plates! This hotel was very good value for money.

review.title: We didn't want to leave
review.reviewText: We stayed 4 very comfortable nights (too short a visit). We had no trouble with the shuttle...at most a 5 min. wait. The room was spacious, clean... and what a view! Our room offered a bay view. We could watch - but barely hear the planes coming and going over the bay. The only issue we had was with the reception staff; although very friendly and business-like they were not all that helpful with directions. When we arrived back at the hotel in the evenings it was nice to be offered cookies and coffee. We are always a little sceptical when we haven't previously stayed at a hotel. The Bay Landing far exceded our expectations. We have not used Expedia before either; so we really had not idea what to expect. Both the Bay Landing and Expedia have Wowed!! us. We will return...and book through Expedia.

review.title: Great place to stay
review.reviewText: We went on a short family vacation - 5 days - and spent most of our time in San Francisco. This was a great place to stay outside of the city - an easy 20 - 25 minute drive. Very close to the airport. Rooms were comfortable and included microwave and refrigerator

review.title: Fair for the Price
review.reviewText: Staff wasn't very polite or friendly, and I was disappointed there was no pool or jacuzzi. But the hotel was clean and comfortable, in a convenient location, and near decent restaurants. So, for the price, it was fine and I would stay there again.

review.title: Reliable and comfortable for break in trip from Australia
review.reviewText: Our second time gave us confidence in what to expect which is an excellent hotel convenient to SFO airport. The wait for the airport shuttle is a bit onerous after a 14 hour flight but the driver was courteous and apolgetic. We would choose Bay Landing again. It continues to earn high ratings.

review.title: Hidden gem
review.reviewText: Probably the best choice on our U.S. trip. Rooms cleaned every day, clean towels as well (even though we did not ask for them), breakfast was very good (breakfast 'room' a bit smaller that it should be), location few minutes by free shuttle (runs every 30 mins from the hotel) from the airport. Very easy to get to SF by shuttle+bart so don't worry about the distance. Windows (partially) overlooking the bay were virtually soundproof so don't worry about the airport noise either. Very good hotel overall!

review.title: Unbelievable Value
review.reviewText: My wife and I decided to stay here for two nights on a recent California tour. Our intent was to save some dollars vs. the high cost of hotels in the city. Based on reviews, we had high hopes but were still worried the hotel wouldn't meet our expectations. Ultimately, I couldn't have been happier. The rooms were clean, comfortable with very nice bathrooms. The shuttle to the BART into San Francisco came frequently, both at the hotel and at the airport. It took us less time to get to the wharf area than it would to drive and find parking, at a fraction of the cost. Breakfast was simple but plentiful, with a nice outdoor patio overlooking the bay. Staff were all very courteous, we had no issues with our stay whatsover. This hotel is an absolute steal for the price, I plan on returning for all future S.F. trips!

review.title: Good quality airport hotel
review.reviewText: Good quality airport hotel. Excellent continental breakfast & only a few miles from San Francisco Airport. A good hotel to stop at overnight either on way in or out.

review.title: Enjoyed our stay
review.reviewText: We stayed here in May after attending a wedding in the redwoods. We needed a place to stay near the airport. This was perfect. The room was clean and comfy. We left too early for breakfast but they had coffee and juice in the lobby. Was right on the water and the Mexican restaurant next door was wonderful!

review.title: Convenient airport hotel
review.reviewText: We spent one night at the Bay Landing and were pleasantly surprised by the accommodations. Our room was large and comfortable and the airport shuttle was quick and on time. Also, a very nice continental breakfast. We were even allowed to check in early by the very pleasant young lady at the check in desk.

review.title: It works
review.reviewText: Close to the airport, convenient bus service to hotel.

review.title: , If we go to San Francisco again Bay Landing will be our choice.
review.reviewText: We found Bay Landing convenient, quiet and a nice view of the bay. They could have had a few more tables avaiable for their wonderful breakfast. However, it was never a long wait. All of the staff were friendly and accomodating. We would stay there again and recommend it highly.

review.title: What a nice surprise!
review.reviewText: The hotel offer free parking, very nice breakfest and broadband internet. The room is big, the bed and pillows were very comfortable. The hotel staff was very friendly and gave us a number of directions. What else could we ask for? One advice: from the airport, take a taxi to the hotel. It's cheap (less than 10usd) The shuttle is fine, but can take too long (20min+ to arrive), as it happen to me. The hotel is only 5~10min away.

review.title: Best deal I ever got.
review.reviewText: Very nice accomodations with excellent breakfast.

review.title: Excellent hotel
review.reviewText: We had a nice 6 days stay at the Bayview Hotel and were impressed by the quietness, although many young children were visiting this hotel with their parents. I would definitely visit this hotel again, when we go back to San Francisco.

review.title: great location. great value. would gladly go back.
review.reviewText: convenient to sfo. Just 15 minute drive from the city. Very generous continental breakfast.Exceeded all our expectations. Loved it.

review.title: Iwill go back
review.reviewText: Great location near 101 freeway & airport. great nearby restaurant (Elephant Bar). They even give you cookies at check in.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: Really nice hotel right across from the airport (but without the noise) could watch the planes land and take off. We were in the very first room off the lobby and it was very noisy first thing in the morning with the maids all laughing and chatting but other than that it was good. They were friendly and the room was quite big and clean. Had a coffee maker, microwave and fridge in the room. Id happily stay there again, and have already recommended it to friends.

review.title: Would Go Back
review.reviewText: Good location and easy freeway access. Many restaurants are within walking distance. Full kitchen for cooking and plates and utensils were provided. Just wish there was a fan in the bathroom. Other than that everything was great.

review.title: Great
review.reviewText: Every thing was great. Will use again.

review.title: Little gem
review.reviewText: We found the services, cleanliness and style of the hotel to be wonderful. It is a gem near the airport.

review.title: Hotel was very nice, but the front desk people weren't.
review.reviewText: Everything about the hotel was amazing except for the people at the front desk. Everythime we asked them a question they would act snotty towards us. Other than them I thought the hotel was very well taken care of. The room was spacious and very clean. It would have been a better experience if the front desk people were a little nicer and acted like they liked their jobs.

review.title: Beautiful view
review.reviewText: Beautifil hotel, spacious rooms. Right on the bay with a walking trail along the bay. Easy access to freeways, but not so close that they are a bother. Excellent restaurants right next door.

review.title: Overall good job.
review.reviewText: Front dest personnel could have been a little more friendly/professional.

review.title: Great hotel for the price!
review.reviewText: Planned a trip to S.F. for a month researching hotels. This one popped up with special rates I couldn't pass up. I was nervous until we drove up. Nice view of Bay, good continental breakfast, big rooms (not huge), and staff was nice. For us it was great. Two families with adjoining rooms and kids. It saved us quite a bit and wasn't far from the city. Rooms were quiet too. Thanks Expedia!

review.title: For long stopovers.
review.reviewText: This is a good quiet hotel close to the airport with a couple great restaurants just nextdoor. Downtown San Fran is a $70 cab ride each way so don't use this hotel as a base to see the city. As far as serving its purpose as a airport hotel though it does a good job.

review.title: Wonderfully quiet
review.reviewText: My main criteria was a quiet place to stay overnight near SF airport between a trans-Pacific flight and an ongoing flight to Canada. I made a great choice. I was worried that my corner room on the road would be noisy but I couldn't hear a thing - planes, cars or people. The bathroom was enormous and everything was spotless. There was a good choice for the included breakfast and the staff were friendly. They don't do in-house room service but use an outside caterer which was a bit expensive but you don't go hungry if you don't want to go out. There is a nice walking path along the bay that lets you get some needed fresh air.

review.title: will be back
review.reviewText: good breakfast, bedsheets cleanliness need improvement.

review.title: Will return again!
review.reviewText: Room was very comfortable and internet access was great. Breakfast select was exceptional! No complaints whatsoever!

review.title: convenient
review.reviewText: Great spot for early plane departures. Free shuttle. Very convenient.

review.title: Great for a 1 nighter, very close to airport, great breakfast too!
review.reviewText: I stayed at the Bay Landing after 2 nights in downtown San Fran since I was going to be alone for my last night before flying out. I knew after reading the reviews I would be satisfied, and I really was. It was convenient to get to and from SFO, since there was a shuttle. The room was extremely large (too large for just me, but a good thing.)The bathroom had both a standup shower and a bathtub, very spacious. The other reason why I booked this hotel was because someone mentioned about the waffles for breakfast. So much fun to make yourself!!! Definitely a great value for being close to the airport, if you only need to stay near there.

review.title: We will GO back to the Bay Landing Inn: Best kept Secret
review.reviewText: We had a wonderful time at the hotel --convenient, great front desk attention from a young guy named Sean --we sat in those comfy chairs by the elevator and had coffee and a cookie which the hotel provided free of charge. ---Will be back again. I have told all my Sacramento friends to book their rooms there :) CArol

review.title: Very impressed with this 3 star hotel
review.reviewText: I can't believe they only have 3 star. I mean good location, free guest parking, and complimentary breakfast. How more can you ask?

review.title: Now I know why it was so highly recommended
review.reviewText: best value in sfo area. much better than 4 star national chain i stayed at one week later. great breakfast,free parking, and larger room versus 18.00 parking fee, no continential, no paper, and broom closet size room. will stay there when i need sfo airport room. very friendly staff.

review.title: exceeded expectations loved it
review.reviewText: Was so pleasantly suprised by all aspects of this hotels. It represents amazing value in a safe area. We stayed here instead of the city as we had a hire car and wanted to be in a quiet area. everything was accessible via thr nearby freeways. Complimentary b'fast was great... Book with comfidence.

review.title: Good Buy
review.reviewText: Great hotel and location for the price.

review.title: A Great Stay for A Great Price
review.reviewText: Our family of four stayed for 3 nights and really enjoyed our stay at Bay Landing, especially with the great rate that we paid through Expedia. The room is relatively spacious and clean. It would be great if the beds were queen instead of double, and the cotton blankets were duvet. Although the hotel is near the airport, we didn't really hear much noise from the flights. However, sound proof between the rooms and floors was not too good and one could easily hear noises from other guests turning on the faucets or flushing the toilets. Also, the hotel can really improve on the quality of their shower head! The complimentary breakfast is great though. We will definitely stay there again, especially with the great rate that we had.

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: Excellent value and great location near SFO. Close to Elephant Bar and In-N-Out Burger. Also took a pleasant walk next to the Bay. Couldn't beat it for the price!

review.title: Great Hotel for Great Price
