review.reviewText: The hotel is one exit South of SFO International Airport. The room was comfortable and clean - I was on the third floor and faced the street. I heard very little street traffic nor airplane noise. I even opened the window versus using the AC and the noise wasn't too bad. A few "problems" I had with the hotel were that parking was a bit limited given the size of the hotel; the receptionists were not very friendly; a cleaning towel was left in my sink; and I had a disturbing prank phone call at 3AM the last night of my stay. However, my overall stay was comfortable. The wireless internet was very reliable, too.

review.title: Would stay at this hotel again.
review.reviewText: This is one of the best hotels we've stayed in. Everyone in our party was impressed with the service and the condition of our room.

review.title: Will stay again
review.reviewText: Everything about this hotel exceeded my expectations. It was very clean which is the highest priority for me. Would stay again and have recommended it to others.

review.title: cute hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel is very close to the airport and in a very good condition. It has free wireless internet access and breakfast in the mornings. I certainly recommend this hotel, you won't regret!

review.title: Very good hotel ...
review.reviewText: ... with a very good price/performance ratio.

review.title: great hotel
review.reviewText: good location- close to airport, free parking, a real plus. Clean, safe, good free breakfast

review.title: Impressed
review.reviewText: Nice Hotel. Great Bay view. Will stay next time. Close to the BART station.

review.title: SFO and South San Francisco Convenience at a very good price.
review.reviewText: Convenient airport and freeway access at a very reasonable price for its location. Rooms are well insulated from noise either by location or design. Has good access to the Bay access path. Convenient and well-presented breakfast setup. Would do well to provide a more private business center. It's location ion the Lobby makes privacy an issue. It is a good buy ofr the money and particularly so in these challenging economic times.

review.title: Traveler w/children would definitely stay again
review.reviewText: Good place to stay for families. There is no on-site restaurant but the complimentary breakfast was excellent as there was so much more than just muffins. There was something for everyone, even my 2 picky kids. The in-rm microwave & mini-fridge was very convenient.

review.title: Burlingame's best on hotel row
review.reviewText: My wife and I travel to the San Francisco bay area once a year and this is still the best hotel by far. It's clean, free breakfast, and hey, FREE parking. Not like the other well known hotels in town that charges up to $15.00 a day. The front desk crew are very courteous along with the maid service which takes care of the rooms. Try it, you won't be disappointed.

review.title: Great for a short trip if you're staying near SFO
review.reviewText: Nice little hotel VERY near SFO. Very new, clean and well kept. I would definately return. The price was RIGHT!!

review.title: Very nice
review.reviewText: clean, big, spacious bathroom, no roll away, which would have been helpful with 2 teens, but lots of space on the floor.

review.title: Good for Business Travel
review.reviewText: This hotel is good for business travel.

review.title: Great place to stay.
review.reviewText: The hotel was very accomadating and the staff was very friendly. The room was very clean and comfortable.

review.title: Very nice place for the price!
review.reviewText: I got my room at half of what a coworker paid thanks to Expedia! The room is very nice and the people at the counter treated me very professionally. Usually I get odd looks since I usually dress down and I have a beard. Not often, but it happens. This hotel will be my pick next week when I go to San Francisco in a month. It's about a good 20 to 30 minutes from downtown, but well worth the drive once you see the rooms! *****'s!

review.title: Quick Business Trip
review.reviewText: Clean, updated, can't hear airplanes. Best thing, no fee for parking, free breakfast, within walking to conference center.

review.title: Left my glasses,,, never to be found again.
review.reviewText: I had a wonderful stay at the Bay Landing hotel. The staff were friendly, the room was nice, and the continental breakfast was great. However, I realized after I left that their service may not be so great after all. After I had left the Bay Area I realized that I had forgotten my glasses in the hotel room. I called the front desk (and have continued to call for days) but can get no help in recovering them. I left my glasses in a hotel room once before and had no trouble... the hotel sent them to me and I had them within a week. My warning: don't leave anything in your room... because it will be GONE FOREVER!!!

review.title: Outstanding experience
review.reviewText: Thoroughly enjoyable stay. One of the best complimentary breakfast buffets I've seen. Very nice location overlooking the SF bay and near SF Airport. Outstanding decor and amenities for a reasonable price.

review.title: Great place
review.reviewText: Good breakfast, nice location, great overall. Enjoyed especially the airport shuttle for the convenience.

review.title: Very Restful
review.reviewText: This was a great location....close to the ocean and walking path. The area is quiet. The room was very nice and a there was a wonderful breakfast.

review.title: Comfortable stay
review.reviewText: I enjoyed my stay and would recommend to others. Convenient to airport, boardwalk along water, and not far from SF.

review.title: very very nice
review.reviewText: very convenient to air port, 20 min to bay area, free parking, very clean and quiet no airport noise, good food near by, very good breakfast at hotel rented a car for less that parking would be at bay area hotels.

review.title: Great hotel for the price
review.reviewText: I stay here whenever I have to fly out of SFO. The shuttle is convenient and you can leave your car at the hotel for a small fee and take the shuttle back when you return. The free breakfast in the morning is great.

review.title: geat location...great value
review.reviewText: if you need a place to stay in the south bay, you'd be wse to consider this hotel. super location (near fwy and walking distance to several rest...)...also a ood value for the sf bay region. two thumbs up!!

review.title: Bed Linens Need Upgrading
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing has a great location if you have time to get out and watch planes coming in and walk the path along the bay. I was there for the convenience of being close to the airport for a 6 a.m. departure. The decor is nice but the main time spent is mostly sleeping and the sheets were hard and comforter thin. Also the check-in parking area in front has a curved curbing. After checking in, I forgot about the curved curb and took off straight, thus hitting the curved curb as had many other drivers based on the tire marks observed.

review.title: Great airport hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel was terrific with great bay view and walking path. Great price, about 1/2 of the rate of the comparable hotels I've stayed in at SFO before. It was just as nice with no wait or hassle, airport transportation was easy, every 20 minutes shuttle. However, I was surpised because when checked in I was tired and hungry and wanted to go to dinner, get back and relax someplace close. The young man at the desk told me there were only two resturants, and I knew I didn't care for either. I went back to the room and there was no dining info at all, so I took a walk and found a couple of nice resturants right next to the hotel?? Also, didn't notice until I checked out that there was a small list with coupons tucked in with my room key. didn't care. I loved the all marble bathroom and room was appointed beautifully. Quiet and very comfortable.

review.title: great for business
review.reviewText: this hotel is located right by the airport and has a terrific conference room if you need meeting space. It does not have a restaurant, but their breakfast is very good and there is a great bar/restaurant one block away.

review.title: The best Hotel
review.reviewText: I am very impressed with this hotel.They have great interiors and the room was very clean. They offered great breakfast with a variety of choices. They are located right next to SFO. I love this place.

review.title: pleasant trip!!
review.reviewText: I read these reviews (I don't know where, though) and decided to stay this hotel. And it is a wonderful choice!! Clean, comfortable, and kind. Yes..I recommend on this hotel.. But you'd better have a car to shop around

review.title: A lesser-known jewel
review.reviewText: Lovely hotel in a lovely location on San Francisco Bay. Rooms very well appointed. Better than usual breakfast. Nice dining room and beautiful ocean-view patio (for warmer weather). Will definitely stay here again!

review.title: Great Stay
review.reviewText: very clean, friendly, quiet and close to everything. I definately go back. only complaint, if you have a lot of luggage there is no bell boy, but not an issue for me.

review.title: Great deal and only minutes from downtown SF and Candlestick Park
review.reviewText: Though this hotel is right by the airport, in fact you can watch planes land and take off, it is extremely quiet. Double windows insulate the noise from the planes. The hotel is on the water and there is a walking path. You can sit out on the patio and watch the planes while having breakfast. Within a short walking distance there are several good restaurants.

review.title: Great Place to Stay!!!
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel! Clean, comfortable, quiet, convenient, and elegant. What I enjoy most about the hotel is the view overlooking the bay. Although you can hear the occasional airplane taking off from the airport when you are outside, the rooms remain silent and unaware of the chaos over at the airport. This has been my second stay at this hotel and is becoming a yearly tradition. Overall, very satisfied and highly recommended.

review.title: Good clean hotel, great location and supportive staff
review.reviewText: Great location, nice open shared balcony, clean room and supportive staff.

review.title: What a bargain!
review.reviewText: I attended a business seminar in the neighboring hotel but couldn't get a room at the special rate, so tried the Bay Landing, for less than half of the price offered by the "other" big chain. It worked out absolutely great! I saved money on parking at "the other hotel" because it was free at Bay Landing. I was able to take a short 5 minute walk along the waterfront trail in the evening and morning. It was probably faster than driving because of the crowds trying to exit the seminar and it was definitely refreshing. My breakfast was nice and the cookies and coffee and tea available in the lobby at all times was a great addition. The room seemed to have been redone recently with granite counters, coffee maker, and microwave. All-in-all, a great experience!

review.title: Clean, quiet, close to activities.
review.reviewText: Highly recommend and will return.

review.title: Excellent New Hotel
review.reviewText: Nice place next to the airport SFO. Clean, new and well appointed. I spent three nights there and was very comfortable. Resturants close, BART trains close also.

review.title: Front desk staff
review.reviewText: The woman who checked me in the day I arrived was less than cordial. She was efficient, but COLD and UNWELCOMING!!! and she neglected to mention anything about the hotel ammenties - breakfast, paper, fitness center, parking... Terrible greeting to a wonderful hotel.

review.title: I'd certainly stay again.
review.reviewText: Easy to find, good (free) parking, modern, clean, polite helpfull staff, very comfortable bed, good sized room, substantial breakfast. It does all a hotel should do, and does it very well. I'd most certainly stay there again, with one slight reservation.....(there has to be one)....i'd try not to be located on the ground floor......as we came back in late night we found there had been a meeting/party and the noise (more a loud buzz than a hubbub) COULD have been distracting. Other than that i'm very happy with the experience.

review.title: Excellent stay
review.reviewText: I was in S.F. on a business trip, and this was an enjoyable stay. From the breakfast (better than most) to the service, to proximity to the airport, this hotel is on my "return to" list.

review.title: Very impressed
review.reviewText: WE only stayed overnight before our flight home to UK but the hotel was excellent. Very large and comfortable room. Shuttle service to airport was very efficient and convebient.

review.title: Thank You
review.reviewText: Thank you for exceeding my expectations!

review.title: Nice place
review.reviewText: This was a nice place to stay-- we stayed during a home renovation. Great location and good service. Would recommend to out of towners.

review.title: Not Impressed
review.reviewText: Never again.

review.title: Good hotel
review.reviewText: This is very good hotel with relatively cheap price. Clean room, nice service, and breakfast. I really want to recommend this hotel.

review.title: Great Location, Safe and comfortable
review.reviewText: We were very impressed with this hotel. It was in a nice, clean and quiet area of the city. The hotel is right on the bay, which has a boardwalk-style side walk along the water. When we arrived, the front desk said it would be an hour before we could check in. We came back almost 2 hours later and the room was still not ready so we had to wait about 15 mintues longer. This was somewhat discerning, however the front desk staff made up for it by providing us with a bay front hotel room. It was absolutely beautiful! Parking is very convenient and there was no additional charge unlike some other hotels, and it was conveniently located in between two great restaurants. The hotel is very modern and clean. I highly recommend the Bay Landing hotel.

review.title: CHARMING
review.reviewText: Charming Hotel located on the Bay..try the waffles and breakfast on the fantastic outside patio or inside eating area. Yummy cookies after 4 and coffe and tea in the lobby area.restaurants within walking distance.close to the airport and city. Accomodating service at front desk and on the phone. will definitely stay again as I am a frequent traveller to the area

review.title: Excellent Hotel
review.reviewText: Great hotel with reasonable prices for the Bay Area. Great breakfast. Located right on the water, just south of San Francisco airport. Several nice restaurants next door. We used the shuttle to go back and forth to SFO and then caught BART to other destinations downtown. Shuttle runs every 30 minutes most of the day. Only problem were that internet was down for about 24 hours.

review.title: Comfortable stay at a convenient location
review.reviewText: While in the area to move our daughter into school, we also planned a couple side trips into San Francisco and nearby parks and beaches. Bay Landing was a perfect location for us...convenient to the airport (free shuttle)and public transportation for trips to San Francisco,free parking for the car we'd rented to go south to Palo Alto and the coast. Rooms were comfortable and well kept and the public spaces welcomingly pleasant. The breakfast buffet offered a good variety of choices. We found having the breakfast at the hotel really useful in our busy stay. Our only negative comment - the front desk staff was not particularly knowledgable of the immediate area - though they were very courteous.

review.title: Good hotel near SFO
review.reviewText: The hotel is in nice condition and near SFO. There is an exercise room and also a walking/jogging path along the bay directly off the property. The Expedia rate made it a very reasonable business hotel.

review.title: Comfortable and Affordable!
review.reviewText: Clean and comfortable...we even got free cookies upon check-in!

review.title: Clean and convinient
review.reviewText: Great airport hotel. Rooms were clean with good beds. Great location on the waterfront for running also.

review.title: thumbs up
review.reviewText: nice place to stay...staffs are very friendly, hekpful & courteous. place is clean plus a bonus bayview...or you can stay by the bay at night, just right behind the hotel. perfect place for me!

review.title: Can be recommended
review.reviewText: Excellent hotel, good restaurants nearby reachable by foot. Best hotel by far that I have experienced in this area.

review.title: Bay Landing
review.reviewText: excellent hotel

review.title: Excelent choice... !!!
review.reviewText: Excelent choice... !!!

review.title: Good location for walk on esplanade
review.reviewText: Good clean rooms with excellent bathroom. We only had overnight stay but with location close to airport it is ideal for travellers.

review.title: Impressed
review.reviewText: Nice location, clean room, helpful workers

review.title: Terrific airport stay
review.reviewText: Great location, beautiful accommodations, friendly family service, very quiet, good continental breakfast, near restaurants and lengthy walkway along bay in view of airport planes leaving and landing. Can't park and fly, but between destinations good shuttle service from and to airport. Would do it again.

review.title: Great Deal
review.reviewText: This is a nice hotel for the price very clean and new. It is only 10 minutes drive to San Francisico. Free parking a nice bonus.

review.title: great hotel...bad internet connection
review.reviewText: i was extremely happy with the hotel, the value was amazing...however the internet connection was horribly slow

review.title: BEST DEAL IN TOWN!
review.reviewText: great place (free wi-fi, a gym, and a yummy breakfast). nice hotel (very clean). cool staff. but a lousy shuttle service. i think they outsource. when we'd get back to SFO from the bart, we'd call for a shuttle and wait, and wait, and wait. we hopped on a nearby hotel's shuttle three times, we waited so long! we got this place through expedia and it was well-priced.

review.title: convenient
review.reviewText: If you flying in or out of SFO and need a nice room..this great. Quiet,clean and reasonable.

review.title: Great Place to stay
review.reviewText: Bay Landing is a really upscale hotel for the money. It is very close to SFO so you can watch the planes land. But it is far enough away that there is no noise from them. The hotel is in a good location for pretty much whatever you plan to do. Most of San Fransisco is within 15 to 25 minutes driving time. Well except for rush hour. The breakfast was very good with lots of choices. I will stay here again.

review.title: If I go back to SF...Ill stay again in this hotel
review.reviewText: Every thing was perfect in this hotel....good price and good quality

review.title: Surprisingly Good!
review.reviewText: A very nice hotel for an excellent price. Near San Francisco without the chaos. Nice continental breakfast. Free and easy parking. Free internet connection. Clean and comfortable rooms. Could use bigger beds though; two doubles, not queens. Would definitely stay there again. Highly recommended.

review.title: Would definitely stay again!
review.reviewText: The morning breakfast is fantastic! My son LOVED the eggs, and hubby loved the waffles. I personally loved all the exovtic fresh fruits! Very friendly and accomodating staff. Thanks!!

review.title: Cant wait to go back
review.reviewText: I was impressed with the hotel. It was clean and the people at the front counter were always helpful and friendly.

review.title: best breakfast ever
review.reviewText: The hotel and room were clean,comfortable and quiet. The complimentary breakfast was the best ever with fresh fruit, waffles, and all the rest of a typical continental breakfast and we could choose a table on the terrace with a view toward the water side with a nice breeze. A convenient couple of miles from the airport after our late long flight.

review.title: nice hotel
review.reviewText: Nice clean hotel, close to the airport and convenient for a layover! I would stay again there, if there will be an opportunity.

review.title: Thought it was great!
review.reviewText: We were a little nervous booking a hotel that wasn't mainstream. But when we pulled up to the hotel we were very surprised and pleased. We were very happy with our room and the amenities. We also enjoyed the breakfast. We also thought the view was fantastic.

review.title: Pleasant, clean , roomy, close to attactions must have car
review.reviewText: Nice size rooms , only minor issue if beds where queens instead of double , I would Give it a 5 . Staff is friendly , nice board walk in front of hotel facing bay San Fran . Very nice place to stay out side of SF .

review.title: A perfect fit for our needs
review.reviewText: We requested and got adjoining rooms. It worked out great. The rooms (and the entire hotel) were extremely clean although the maid service during the week was a little lacking. The breakfast was good but they need to work on how it is set up as it did get quite congested. The location of the hotel was extremely convenient to both the airport and the city. The laundry services were a life saver. We would definitely stay there again.

review.title: Excellent for stopovers
review.reviewText: Good location with shuttle to airport making this an ideal stopover when transiting through San Francisco. Service and breakfast (included) were very good. It would even be worth considering for a couple of days stay to check out San Francisco provided you had transport. I would stay again

review.title: Great, affordable hotel close to SFO
review.reviewText: Nice little independent hotel, very close to SFO, and very affordable rates. Great for overnight stop-off. Good shuttle service to BART and airport, though some confusion over details to get picked up from SFO when arriving. Overall very good and would definitely stay there again.

review.title: Very Impressed
review.reviewText: Nice staff, very clean rooms, nice continental breakfast and close to the airport.

review.title: South San Francisco favorite
review.reviewText: Our favorite place to stay for business or pleasure in SF area.

review.title: Not One Complaint
review.reviewText: We were traveling with fussy people and not one of them had any complaint. We will definitely go back and look forward to our stay.

review.title: Would stay again
review.reviewText: Staff was polite, hotel was clean, beds were comfortable. Beautiful walking path, great restaurants within walking distance. Close to the freeway-easy on/off.

review.title: Very Nice!
review.reviewText: Very comfortable, very clean. I enjoyed walking by the water.

review.title: Great Place to Stay
review.reviewText: We chose the Bay Landing to afford the outrageous prices and parking issues in the city. We were able to use the free hotel shuttle to connect to the BART system and access San Francisco easily. The property, staff, and atmosphere at Bay Landing were exceptional. One of our best vacation stays!

review.title: nice place
review.reviewText: fairly new clean,nice sevice,buffet very good

review.title: Great value, terrific hotel
review.reviewText: Our room was large with a view over the bay. The room was very clean and modern; the staff helpful; and breakfast was excellent. Easy access to the airport, and the jogging path right out the back door of the hotel was a bonus. While near the airport, the room was very quiet(double pane glass in the windows). I'd stay here again and recommend it highly to anyone who wants to be near the airport. We had an early morning flight, so Bay Landing was perfect. Bay Landing was a bargain!

review.title: Bay Landing....very good experience
review.reviewText: Stayed for a week with my family and had two rooms...reserved after finding on internet....hotel was as presented and family was very pleased....good breakfast, very clean, good workout room, and hotel was near airport but there is no airport noise...within walking distance of some good restaurants as well....would come back again.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: I like the location and they have nice gym and a wondrous display for breakfast.

review.title: Would definetly stay there again.
review.reviewText: Hotel staff friendly and helpful; rooms clean; hotel quiet in very pleasent location esp when eating breakfast. Breakfast a little disappointing no real substance to food. Convenient to local BART and hotel shuttle bus ran a good service. Local resturant lovely; foor excellant within walking distance of hotel. Would definetly stay there again

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: Super, clean, comfortable and spacious room. Staff were excellent, breakfast good and location good for airport or city. Would definitely return next trip.

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: Excellent! Especially the breakfast.

review.title: Excellent value!
review.reviewText: Rooms were very comfortable, spacious and quiet, despite being near the airport. Included breakfast buffet was excellent, with a choice of indoor or outdoor seating (patio with view of water, airport). Shuttle to airport and BART ran every 1/2 hour dependably. Hotel staff was courteous and efficient. One of our best hotel experiences in California.

review.title: Very Good Value
review.reviewText: Excellent location by the bay, large new rooms, very good service. Overall, a great deal.

review.title: Great place
review.reviewText: Very nice and relatively close to San Francisco. Great breakfast with large selection. Would definitely stay again.

review.title: Nice airport hotel
review.reviewText: Nice place. Nothing in particular special. Room was quiet, comfortable, and clean. Overall given the low rate I paid, the Bay Landing was a very good value. My only knock on the place was that check-in seemed a bit more involved then necessary - and the staff had some sort of mini-crisis that was a bit more than I really wanted to listen to at 10:30 PM. As near as I could tell the manager was part of the crisis - a little more training would help.

review.title: Luxury at an acceptable price.
review.reviewText: As expected this hotel was friendly,clean, and within a few feet of the bay. Very attracive appointments,nice clientele, and reliable shuttle service to the airport. Excellent breakfast bar every morning. Nice paved walkway along the bay for watching birds and airplanes.

review.title: very impressed
review.reviewText: it was way beyond my expectations, very clean and updated rooms, very nice view of the bay in the back of the hotel. Hotel just needs a restaurant.

review.title: Great Value
review.reviewText: Very comfortable stay and close to the airport. Great breakfast. We will stay again.

review.title: Comfortable
review.reviewText: A very comfortable and conveniently located hotel. Clean and modern. Will definitely return.

review.title: What a nice experience!
review.reviewText: This hotel garnered so many favorable reviews I decided to try it instead of the national brands at SF airport. I was very pleased that I did - it offers amazing value and a very nice experience in every way, much better than you would ever expect at a "no name" airport hotel. Comfy bed, very quiet and controllable AC, perfect soundproofing, nice granite bath, free internet, and a very filling breakfast. Kudos to management. Stay here, pay less, like it more.

review.title: Great hotel on the water.
review.reviewText: Very upscale hotel at a reasonable price. Close to dining, airport, public transportation, and all with a great view. The only negative is a lack of pool/spa.

review.title: Great place to stay!!!
review.reviewText: My wife and I greatly enjoyed this hotel. We stayed 3 nights 7/1 - 7/3 2008. The staff was always helpful and very friendly. The view from the rear or the hotel (bayside) of jets landing at SFO was enjoyable to watch, and we walked the trail along the bay every evening. Two good restaurants are next door. The free breakfast was as good as we've ever had. Our room was clean and comfortable. I don't like traveling with my laptop, so I really enjoyed the free use of a computer/printer with internet.

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: Comfortable introduction to San Francisco following a long flight from Hwathrow

review.title: Can't wait to go back
review.reviewText: This was one of the best hotels we stayed in at san francisco. If you can request a bay room.we went there on the 4th of july weekend and were still able to get a bay view room.The continental breakfast is just awesome.The room was extremely clean and had a microwave and refrigerator as an added bonus for no charge at all.Perfect for families with kids.The staff was extremely courteous and well informed and the charge was lot less than most san francisco hotels. There are 2 or 3 restaurants within walking distance of the hotel and even though it is close to the airport it is amazingly quiet. We will definately stay here the next time we are in the city.

review.title: great hotel
review.reviewText: very quiet for being 2-3 miles from airport, good breadfast, would come back for the price

review.title: Great Place To Stay!
review.reviewText: For the price the Bay Landing Airport Hotel was great. We were able to walk along the shore and watch the planes arrive and depart from the airport, relax and enjoy numerous resteraunts all close to the hotel. We loved how close the hotel was to BART. We parked our car there and took it into the City.

review.title: Loved this Hotel
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing was a great hotel. The staff was very helpful and pleasant. The room was very clean. The breakfast was very nice with a huge selection of items to choose from. Would definitely go back again.

review.title: Wonderful place to stay
review.reviewText: Rooms are large and handicap accessible. There is a nice variety of things offered for breakfast. This hotel doesn't have a restaurant, but there are soups and frozen items offered for sale that can be microwaved in the rooms. There are also restaurants within walking distance.

review.title: good location, excellent bathroom condition
review.reviewText: good location,good access to Fw, quiet expect upgrade of the breakfast menu.

review.title: Very nice hotel!
review.reviewText: My family and I were pleasantly surprised when we checked in at the Bay Landing Airport Hotel. I extensively reviewed San Francisco area hotels on Expedia and other sites before booking, and this was one that was a bit lower in price than others, while still maintaining at least three stars. The overall appearance and presentation from the moment you walk in, to the time you open your room door is very warm, friendly and upscale! Very, very clean and neat place to stay. The Continental Breakfast is also better than many, with a wide variety of items from which to choose--even freshly cooked waffles! One drawback, though, is that there was no pool. Not the least of our worries, at least on this trip. The walk-in shower is really nice, but the tiles can become slippery when wet...how about changing to tiles with a rougher surface, or at least putting in some anti-slip treatment? All in all, a great stay!!

review.title: Recommend
review.reviewText: clean, comfortable, good service and good envirement.

review.title: Simple done well
review.reviewText: New, clean, well run without a lot of the useless frills. Reasonable price. Access the place by getting off 101 at Millbrae and going south along Bayshore. The Broadway exit at Burlingame is very confusing.

review.title: hidden gem
review.reviewText: Very pleased with this hotel. Very good value for the money. Free breakfast buffet had many choices. Eat inside or on the beautiful terrace outside, where you can look at the bay and watch the airplanes landing.

review.title: Strongly recommend
review.reviewText: The breakfast is much better than usual continental breakfast other hotels offer. It's a quiet and beautiful newly built hotel. We stay at the bay view room which is awesome. We could see Bay and airplanes landing from our window. WE enjoy the stay.

review.title: OK
review.reviewText: Better parking

review.title: Definately go there again.
review.reviewText: We just stayed there and it was a great place to stay. The continental breakfasts were more than we expected - great selection. The weather was so nice we sat on the patio each morning and enjoyed our breakfast. This hotel was only a mile from the BART and CalTrain station - this was a definate plus. Highly recommend taking advantage of this. We were able to ride the train and BART for less than what it would cost us for gas and parking. Parking at the train station is free.

review.title: Very Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: It was a very nice hotel with a lot to offer. Easy to get to, no parking fee, free breakfast. I'd absolutely stay again! I wished I was here for pleasure and I would have stayed longer

review.title: Great Service
review.reviewText: Great service. The breakfast buffet was wonderful. The hotel shuttle to the airport made it very easy to use San Francisco's mass transport system for travel downtown.

review.title: Terrific hotel and location
review.reviewText: An excellent hotel for the business or family traveler. Terrific location with easy highway access and nearby restaurants. Beautiful views of bay from terrace and running path. Will definitely stay there again.

review.title: just very good
review.reviewText: food is not so good

review.title: Good choice by the airport
review.reviewText: We were very pleased with the room and the overall experience at this hotel. SHuttle service was right on time.

review.title: would go back
review.reviewText: great internet access in room, lovely free breakfast. Lovely location -- right on the bay. While near the airport, did not hear planes from room.

review.title: Nice view of the bay
review.reviewText: We really enjoyed our stay at the Bay Landing. There are two restaurants within walking distance. Our continental breakfast was healthy and fresh. We loved being fairly close to downtown SF, Oakland, and shopping.

review.title: Nicest hotel I have ever stayed at for a price like this.
review.reviewText: We were only in San Francisco for two days. I wish I could have stayed in this hotel longer. The sunset over the bay was amazing!

review.title: Nice place to stay
review.reviewText: Reasonably priced, clean hotel

review.title: Location
review.reviewText: Very nice, comfortable. Great restaurants right next door and the bay with Airport runway view. Easy access to the highway but feels like a great part of town.

review.title: High quality at reasonable price
review.reviewText: Our room was spacious, clean and quiet. Great price, especially considering so many extras are included: full breakfast starting at 6 a.m., exercise room, internet, parking, refrigerator, large safe, coffee maker. I just could not get the internet to work on my computer. I visit my family once a year and definitely plan to stay here again.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: Good location, quiet, good breakfast, newspaper outside my door, good service. Walk to restaurants

review.title: THANK GOD!
review.reviewText: We finally found a clean, upscale hotel close to the airport that didn't cost an arm and a leg. We were very comfortable, it was quiet and we will definitely stay there again! Close to everything.

review.title: Great value and good location
review.reviewText: Good quality relatively young hotel with basic luxury features, minus a pool or restaurant, that offers a good location for excellent value. Good free breakfast and free internet access. Excellent value for a little more than some grungy hotels in the same area.

review.title: They could do better
review.reviewText: A pretty characterless hotel which would have been acceptable for a one night business stay if the bathroom had not been in need of a clean with disinfectant (it did not smell good)!

review.title: A Very Good Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel was a wonderful surprise. No restaurant, but a few refrigerator cases of food and a microwave in each room more than made up for that. And a great complimentary continental breakfast in the morning.

review.title: Great deal
review.reviewText: A great room, free internet, free (large and full) breakfast. A really good deal for the area.

review.title: Excellent deal for the money
review.reviewText: I did a lot of research into hotels prior to booking this one. All the reviews I read about the Bay Landing turned out to be true. Great free breakfast, free parking, and free internet service...convenient to SFO and all for a really good price. Rooms were good sized, clean, and comfortable. Would definitely recommend.

review.title: excellent hotel
review.reviewText: clean, helpful staff, perfect location, free parking - a wonderful package

review.title: Front Desk's C/S Training
review.reviewText: Very convenient to the airport and shuttle service is a benefit. Front desk check in needs additional customer service training.

review.title: Hotel great but --
review.reviewText: This was our third visit to this hotel. Good location. Clean rooms. Quiet. Great complimentary breakfast. Courteous staff. But we had to wait at the airport in the freezing rain far too long for the courtesy shuttle.On ourlast two stays the room was cold and the thermostat didn't work. Too bad because we really liked the place but won't go back.

review.title: Convenient to airport and highway
review.reviewText: The location for airport rental cars & returns is very convenient. All of the amenities we expected, including a bountiful breakfast. However, the hotel, and consequently the breakfast area, were very busy, and there was a shortage of tables. The staff did a good job of making sure food was refilled promptly. Fresh coffee & hot water available 24 hours is a plus.

review.title: Everything I hoped it would be
review.reviewText: I had researched commentary from other travelers about the hotel and chose it based on so much positive feedback. It was all I had hoped for. We spent several days in SFO for the Christmas holiday. We enjoyed the peaceful and comfortable environment, the quality breakfast and clean rooms.

review.title: impressed
review.reviewText: Very reasonable price. Very clean and new. The staff was very friendly. We will go back!

review.title: Best hotel for the money
review.reviewText: This is the second time that I have stayed at this hotel and I will stay there whenever I go to San Francisco. The free breakfast is wonderful. The bay is right behind the hotel. We stayed in a room on the street side and we heard very little noise. It's just a great place to stay for the money.

review.title: Nice place to stay
review.reviewText: We were very pleased with our room and the location of the hotel. We will definitely consider staying here again.

review.title: Very nice setting
review.reviewText: Right on the bay with a fine biking path. The view of Benihana just to the south is a postcard of Japan. I reckon we saved $160 in parking fees for our two stays there...add free internet & the generous breakfasts. Over $200 saved.

review.title: I am very happy with what I had chosen
review.reviewText: Conveniently located, near airport, high way, good resturant and golf course. Is especially nice when the package come with good complimentary breakfast, parking and wireless internet access. The family enjoyed the stay there.

review.title: Business
review.reviewText: the hotel was inadequate in only one regard: no business center and only one computer and printer to work from.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: Overall experience was good. Hotel is close to airport, so you can hear airplanes a little when they are taking off. Would also recommend not getting a room near the stairwell. I could hear the door close when people were coming and going and you might be surprised at the hours when people are coming and going. Hotel room was very nice, clean and the bed was comfortable. Hotel is about 15 minutes away from Fisherman's Wharf. I would stay at this hotel again.

review.title: Definitely would stay there again
review.reviewText: I would definitely stay at the Bay Landing Hotel, again. Staff was friendly and couretous. Room and bathroom was cleaned up daily. Loved being able to sit on the patio in the morning and eat the continental breakfast looking out onto the Bay. I liked the European decor of the Hotel and Rooms.

review.title: We'd stay there again
review.reviewText: Clean room, helpful staff, good breakfast, great value!

review.title: Excellent hotel; very impressed
review.reviewText: Very comfortable hotel; very clean and the staff were extremely helpful. Easy to find from the airport and lovely position on the edge of the bay. No noise from aircraft and very good substantial breakfast. We would definitely recommend and will stay there again if we go back.

review.title: A great find near the airport
review.reviewText: After staying at two down hotels near the airport, this was a pleasant find. The price is great, servide is good, and the hotel is comfortable. I recommend it.

review.title: Awesome Stay!
review.reviewText: Beautiful hotel, fantastic rooms, wonderful walking paths, great accommodations, friendly staff, terrific breakfast, easy (and free) access to BART, near many delicious restaurants. We can't wait to go back.

review.title: Would definitely use again.
review.reviewText: Perfect for lodging near airport. Good restuarants within 5 minute walk and reliable shuttle service to airport.

review.title: Great SFO airport hotel
review.reviewText: Fantastic SFO airport hotel oasis among so-so hotels there!

review.title: Very good value for our stay
review.reviewText: We stayed at the hotel for 4 nights and like the services and amenity we had received -- fridge, microwave and complimentary internet. The only knock is that the breakfast doesn't have any meat -- no bacons, no sausages, no hams, only hard boiled eggs. I know that may mean paying more for the hotel but I would think it will be worth it for many guests there.

review.title: Wow, wow, wow!!!
review.reviewText: Great hotel with quiet atmosphere. Great for vacation, nice people.

review.title: Nice place to stay
review.reviewText: Clean amenities, friendly staff, the breakfast area could be a little larger, but overall a very nice experience. I definitively recommend it.

review.title: Would stay next time
review.reviewText: We were only their one night. From our room, we could watch the jets roll in over the bay, however they did not disturb our sleep. Used the path right outside the back door to take a relaxing walk in the morning after breakfast. Ate dinner the night before right next door at "The Elephant" restaurant and very good...

review.title: Worst nights sleep ever
review.reviewText: we stayed here on our honeymoon thinking that iwth expedias 1% rating that it would be a great hotel.WRONG! the staff was rude and not helpful at all and then beds were the worst ever ive never slept that bad ever.

review.title: great continental breakfast
review.reviewText: they actually serve waffles, granted u have to make it urselof but it comes out piping hot. & great breakfast selection considering.

review.title: Good hotel & a good price
review.reviewText: I stayed here for 2 nights after flying in from UK. Good proximity to the airport and on a nice location by the bay. Very quiet for an airport hotel, and with free breakfast and free internet, this hotel is great value for money.

review.title: Excellent airport hotel
review.reviewText: New, quality furniture, fridge and microwave, excellent continental breakfast. 2 good restaurants next door.

review.title: A great week!
review.reviewText: Having just spent a week at this hotel, I can recommend it wholeheartedly. This is a well maintained spotlessly clean, modern hotel, offering well equipped bedrooms.It includes a large gym suite, complimentary computer access in lobby and adequate parking spaces. The staff were friendly and helpful. The hotel lacks a bar or restaurant, although there are 5 or 6 restaurants within 5 minutes walk. The buffet breakfast was very comprehensive, and constantly replenished; although the space allocated for tables was limited at busy times. Very conveniently located for the airport (5 mins drive) with a shuttle bus service if required. The double glazing was most effective at keeping plane noise out,whilst allowing you to watch planes landing. Views over the Bay, and the bayside walk, added to the ambience. The hotel is located approximately 30-45 minutes drive from Fishermans Wharf, which gave the opportunity to escape the tourist centre for a more tranquil setting. Overall, at Expedia rates, this hotel offers excellent value for money, and should be seriously considered by anyone looking for a modern hotel in the South San Francisco area.

review.title: Good Value
review.reviewText: Great hotel for the price. You'll find the breakfasts are better than most continental's.

review.title: good for a stayover
review.reviewText: the staff were friendly and helpful when we were there. the rooms were clean and average. the freeway creates a lot of noise, but i was able to blank that out by turning on the room fan a/c control. there are some good local restaurants a few minutes away driving.

review.title: Great hotel to stay
review.reviewText: The best hotel in Burlingame. Very comfortable, the breakfast is fantastic, and while all the other hotels in Burlingame charges for parking, this one doesn't. Keep up the great work.

review.title: Bay Landing Hotel Is a Plus
review.reviewText: I was very pleased with the hotel, it's location and my room. Except for some of the radio and TV service (which was limited), I found it a very comfortable, up-to-date hotel and very comfortable. Also, the Millbrea BART station is only about 1 and 1/2 miles from it so it was easy to use free parking there and get on BART for my excursions into SF and Berkely, without paying parking expenses in those cities and not having to drive to/through them.

review.title: Extremely Comfortable
review.reviewText: We would not hesitate to stay here on our next visit to the Bay area. The room was very comfortable, clean and very well equipped (cable, ironing board and iron, hairdryer, safe, sufficent closet and drawers) and the shower was great. The USA Today was outside our door everyday by 5:00am! The breakfast was super! Everything except prepared eggs and omelets (although there was hard-boiled eggs). The food was fresh and the staff was great. Had nice little things also, like fresh jumbo cookies at the front desk each day, coffee in the sitting area, a computer and printer available, etc. Great place to stay and well located. Just 5 minutes from aiport, 20 minutes from Fisherman's Wharf and about 25 minutes to US Hwy 1.

review.title: Great hotel and location.
review.reviewText: Bay Landing will most likely be my regular hotel when I frequent the Bay Area. The only negative was the front desk staff. Upon checking in, questions during my stay, and upon checking out I found the staff not very warm & friendly, nor accommodating, nor even extending a "thank you for staying with us" comment. All these were times when I was the only one or one of 2 or 3 at the desk-no busy times.

review.title: great visit to san francisco
review.reviewText: my husband and I stayed here during a recent visit. The free shuttle to and from the airport/BART station was awesome. We never had to worry about our way home or to the city. The service was awesome and so was the breakfast. The elephant bar was awesome, and so was the prime rib at gulliver's. It was a little pricey(60 for two of us) but the service and the atmosphere made up for it. The waiter even gave us a free dessert. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone. It was really quiet even though it was across from the bay from the airport. Definitely choose this place if you dont want to have to drive in the san fran area.

review.title: The housekeepers forgot the supply shampoo and linse.
review.reviewText: The housekeepers forgot the supply shampoo and linse.

review.title: Great Hotel Close To The Airport
review.reviewText: Great place for a stay close to the airport, with a couple of good eateries within walking distance of the hotel. Great complimentary breakfast with plenty of choice and free internet computer in the lobby. They also had a chess set in the lobby where my husband taught my daugher how to play chess to which she now loves! Only critism is if you decided to book a city tour from one of the lobby leaflets, they added an additional hefty booking fee which annoyed us, also when they called a cab for us to go to the pier for our cruise again it probably costed more than necessary as we saw the reception staff give the cabbie a backhander when he arrived. But apart from that, the rest of the hotel was great and the shuttle service to the airport where you could get the BART service to downtown SF, was a great help.This is quite along trip in(about 40 mins)but worth a trip.

review.title: Wonderful time!
review.reviewText: We had such a wonderful time at Bay Landing. The hotel was lovely with a great view. We were most impressed with the wonderful staff. They were so accommodating and really went to extra mile. We loved the shuttle service to the airport. It really simplified our travel plans. The nightly cookies were a nice touch.

review.title: Wife loved it, definitely will book again
review.reviewText: This hotel was totally awesome. It was our honeymoon, so I wanted everything to be perfect, and it was!! Originally was stuck with a double bed occupancy, but when I requested for a king size bedroom, it was no problem and cost nothing. The staff was great. We hardly heard or saw anyone there except for the staff in the morning or other occupants during the continental breakfast. Would recommend to anyone visiting San Fran for the first time or for anyone tired of the hustle and bustle of downtown San Fran hotels.

review.title: Can't wait to go back!!!
review.reviewText: The overall experience was great. The hotel is brand new, the room is extremely comfortable, with both minibar and microwave available in it. Breakfast (complementary, nonetheless) was superb!!! My husband and I talked about coming all the way back from Brazil with the kids. We definetely recommend it!!!

review.title: Highly recommended
review.reviewText: This was our first time at this hotel and it did not disappoint. The room was clean and ready when we arrived early. The accommodations were excellent with a work out gym overlooking San Francisco Bay. The continental breakfast had a good selection and the fruit was fresh. I would go back again.

review.title: CLOSE TO SF AIRPORT
review.reviewText: Good pricing for hotel close to airport.

review.title: Lots of little luxuries!
review.reviewText: This hotel had many little luxuries that made it a great place to stay! From sitting on the patio watching the sunrise while eating a complimentary breakfast to having free internet access in the hotel lobby and having free coffe and tea all day long - it was the little pleasantries that impressed me. It was clean, affordable and staff were all very friendly and helpful. The courtesy shuttle from the hotel to the airport made taking public transportation quick and easy.

review.title: Great Hotel!
review.reviewText: We had a very enjoyable stay at Bay Landing hotel. It is a very clean and nicely decorated hotel. The housekeeping service was great. Our room always looked so neat and inviting each evening when we returned from sight seeing. The front desk staff was very helpful with providing answers to questions regarding the local area. Delicous cookies were available at the front desk every evening. The computer in the library area was very handy for looking up driving directions and checking e-mails. The morning breakfast was great. My husband mastered the Belgian waffle making--they were delicous. There was a nice selection of fruits and juices along with many other choices. The shuttle service to and from the airport was a nice convenience. I will stay here again when I have the opportunity and highly recommend it.

review.title: excellent spot
review.reviewText: very satisfied with accommodations; had Bay view room and access to great walking trail along Bay. Good shuttle service to airport and BART

review.title: One of the nicest hotels we've stayed in.
review.reviewText: We stayed three nights Oct 11-14. The room was great, wifi in the room without extra charge, right by the SF Bay with a great jogging trail. The staff were helpful, the breakfast was very nice. Would definitely return on my next trip to SF.

review.title: A vacation within a vacation
review.reviewText: My husband and I traveled to San Francisco for a belated honeymoon to celebrate our anniversary. We had a wonderful view of the bay and enjoyed having our breakfast on the veranda. The hotel staff was very polite and welcoming. We felt immediately comfortable and plan to return at our first opportunity.

review.title: Had a great time!
review.reviewText: The hotel was quiet and clean.

review.title: Enjoyed the place and it's a good location to the city
review.reviewText: Peaceful and relaxing!

review.title: What a pleasure!
review.reviewText: This is a wonderful hotel, in a great location, right next to the bay (between the san mateo bridge and the san francisco airport), 15-20 minutes from downtown san francisco. The staff is nice and helpful, but they also know how to stay out of the way, they provide a nice atmosphere, and allow you enjoy your stay. They have a free breakfast also, much better that a continental breakfast with waffles and pancakes etc. and a very nice patio area with a view of the bay and the airport landing strip. Although it seems close the airport, not once were we disturbed by airplane noise, or any other noise. In fact, even though there were families with children in the hotel, it was extremely quite and the cleanest place i've ever seen! The only reason this is not rated a 5 star hotel is because they don't have the pool, spa and those type of things. I havent stayed at all the hotels in the area, but I have checked the prices, and this place has to be the best deal in the area.

review.title: I would most definitely stay at this hotel again.
review.reviewText: I would most definitely stay at this hotel again and cannot praise it enough. We`d requested a higher floor room which we were given and the room had the wow factor on opening the door! It was gorgeous and the beds were so comfortable. The hotel is situated right on the bay so the views were lovely. You could sit on the patio and take in the view or watch the planes coming and going as the runway was visible from the bay. Unfortunately, we had to leave early in the morning for our flight back to the UK so were unable to have breakfast. Complimentary tea and coffee is served all day and internet access is free. There is no restaurant in or attached to the hotel but there are several eating places within walking distance covering a variety of cuisine. A free shuttle service is provided and it came exactly on time. A superb hotel.

review.title: Nice, clean room with a bay view. I'll definitely go back!
review.reviewText: I totally recommend this hotel for anybody who is traveling to SF area. The room I stayed was spacious, clean and had a nice view of the bay. People on the front desk were extremly friendly. I couldn't believe how good (affordable) the price was for such a great hotel.

review.title: Amazing Location
review.reviewText: Loved the location! very close to the airport, convenient complimentary parking, walking distance to good restaurants, quiet at night & fresh air from the bay that is just right behind the hotel.

review.title: breakfast to die for!!!
review.reviewText: I have never in my life had such a wonderful continental breakfast (complimentary, no less!) at any hotel anywhere!!! It was wonderful!!! That alone made this hotel worth staying at!! They also have delicious cookies that you can help yourself to 24 hours a day. The fitness room was small and didn't offer much variety, but it helped get rid of some of the many calories the breakfast and cookies helped me put on. The room was clean and quiet. The bed was perfect. I can't wait to go back to the San Francisco Airport area just so I can have another chance to stay there again!!! (NO, I'm NOT exaggerating!!!)

review.title: I will go back again.
review.reviewText: This hotel is excellent. Spacious room with good view, courteous staff. Quiet. The only drawback was that it had no restaurant. The Elephant Bar that is recommended was noisy, crowded and seemed like a singles bar, so we ate at the Mexican restaurant next door to the hotel. It was also noisy and the food was just average.

review.title: A lot more for a little
review.reviewText: We stayed here having read other very positive reviews. We decided a long time ago to pay a little extra to stay in a hotel where you're not worrying about cleanliness of the bath and beds. The Bay Landing hotel exceeded expectations with it's clean bathroom, shower, and bedding. The granite counters and newer fixtures added to our comfort. It's a bit more than the other chain hotels by maybe 20%, but we enjoyed the short stay. We highly recommend this hotel and would stay again.

review.title: Nice Accommodations, Would Go Back
review.reviewText: A pleasant stay, nice room, and good location. Only complaints are that the front desk staff were cordial but not overly helpful and the maids constantly slammed doors preventing any afternoon rest.

review.title: Nice New Hotel! Right on the SF Bay! Next door to several restaurants...
review.reviewText: Nice new hotel. Located right on the SF Bay. Watch the planes landing at SF Airport (don't worry, not noisy, as the planes are way out over the water, not overhead...). Staff is friendly & helpful. The Bay Acces walking path is adjacent if you desire a little exercise. And there's even a shuttle to/from the SF airport if you odn't want to rent a car. Highly recommended! :-) -Bear-

review.title: Nice very pleasant
review.reviewText: I like the hotel...very quiet and nice location for fine dining.

review.title: Very Nice
review.reviewText: This was our 2nd stay at Bay Landing Hotel. After our 1st stay when deciding to go back to Bay Area there was no question as to which hotel we would book. The hotel is located 15 minutes from San Francisco but far enough away to not be in a high traffic area. The hotel is quiet with great views of planes coming into airport. Good restaurants within walking distance. Just a great hotel all the way around

review.title: Great Stay!
review.reviewText: The hotel was very nice, convenient access to airport and freeway, a nice view.

review.title: Great Place
review.reviewText: Beautiful hotel on the bay, friendly service, great location. Can't wait to return.

review.title: Amazing hotel for the price.
review.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by the high caliber of this hotel. I received a complimentary upgrade to a room with a bay view; the amenities were first class, the decor tasteful; and the bed was very comfortable--always the most important feature with me. I've stayed at hotels that cost twice the price that weren't nearly as nice. The complimentary breakfast was terrific, too. Other South Bay hotels had better watch out--this one is a real winner!

review.title: a terriffic hotel
review.reviewText: excellent in view, room, service and especially the wonderful breakfast.

review.title: Very Impressed!
review.reviewText: This hotel was definitely a great find. We booked this hotel based on it's ratings and it didn't disappoint us. It is away form the hustle and bustle of downtown but it is easy to get to downtown via a rented car or the Bart. We used the Bart 4 times in our week stay and it was very easy to use and wasn't that bad of a ride. The front desk staff was very helpful and friendly when we had questions and amswered them to the best of their knowledge! The breakfast was awesome and had a good variety! Another reason we chose this hotel as we didn;t need to spend money on another meal!

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: This hotel was very nice, and clean. The people at the front desk were nice. Proximity to the airport was excellent. It is especially good for plane spotters. We enjoyed watching planes land, but the sound proofing wes very good.

review.title: Best deal for Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: Best deal for Airport Hotel - very clean with all amenities. Would highly recommend.

review.title: Can't wait to go back
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel with free parking and the best continental breakfast. It has a nice view of the bay. Very close to SFO airport. Free wireless internet with printer. Very reasonable price. Also has shuttle to airport. Need rental car to go around

review.title: would definately come back
review.reviewText: This hotel was close to so many nice restaurants, gas stations, grocery stores, and only a 20 minute drive into the heart of SF. I got 2 rooms for my family, and they like the place very much. It was convenient to have free buffet breakfast at the hotel before heading out to the city. The hotel was completed in 2004 so everything in it is very up to date. My family and I would definitely come back. I also thought it was a great value hotel.

review.title: Loved the terrace and bay trail...beautiful (and convenient) location.
review.reviewText: Hotel stay was wonderful. The only areas of improvement would be in shuttle pick-up from airport to hotel. We waited close to an hour. Also, I was not able to get wireless connection nor ethernet connection in the room. The public computer downstairs worked most of the time, but froze occasionally.

review.title: Excellent for a Bay Area Stay
review.reviewText: Excellent hotel, great value for money. Clean and comfortable with friendly and helpful staff. Free parking is a great benefit.

review.title: Spacious room, great breakfast.
review.reviewText: We enjoyed free breakfast at a sunny dining section overlooking the bay. Wide variety of baked goods, and you can even make waffle with fresh strawberries on top.

review.title: GREAT hotel! Super clean - great breakfast, clean, highly recommend!
review.reviewText: Really great hotel. Everyone was very, very nice. They stored our bikes every day (3) and were very friendly about taking them out of storage. The breakfast was really tasty - lots of choices, and great tasting coffee. Clean guest laundry room, clean rooms, free computer and printer, beautiful lobby area - HIGHLY recommend!

review.title: Very Impressive Hotel
review.reviewText: I was very impressed with this hotel. There were many extra touches in this hotel that made it look and feel like a more expensive hotel. For the most part, it was a very quite hotel even though it is extremely convenient to the airport. The free continental breakfast was a nice touch and eating at their outside dining area made it even more special. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel.

review.title: Good Hotel for Long Stays
review.reviewText: While on vacation we wanted a hotel that had a small kitchenette so that we would not end up eating out as much. This was true with the Bay Landing hotel. The continental breakfast was absolutely more than we expected, with boiled eggs, waffles, cereal, oatmeal, and lots of fruit like Kiwi and Mango. The fitness facitly was clean with good equipment. The location of the hotel lead to many walks along the bay, and was nice to watch the tides coming in. Even though it was very near to the airport, it was not loud at all, as the bay blocked a lot of the sound of the airplanes. Also, there is free parking. Marble in the bathroom was also a nice touch. The things I did not like was that, even though there is a kitchenette, there is not adequate garbage cans in the room. There were 2-2 gallon cans, and if you make a meal in your room they fill up quickly. It got to the point later on in our stay that we had ants coming in the room. This was absolutely due to us generating more trash than was able to be handled at this facility. Overall, this was a good place to stay, and I would stay there again. I would suggest buying your own trash bags though and bringing them with you.

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: We had a bayview room and it was wonderful. The breakfast is great and the cookies in the afternoon make this place smell like home.

review.title: A great non-chain hotel
review.reviewText: This family owned hotel exceeded our expectations. The continental breakfast had a great selection and was well maintained by two staff members. The decor was well done. Staff was pleasant and promptly answered any question that we had. Shuttle service to the airport was prompt. We would definitely use this facility again.

review.title: This hotel definately deserves its great reviews!
review.reviewText: We very much enjoyed our stay here. The staff is friendly and helpful. It's a beautiful place to stay. Nicely decorated and clean. This hotel is a comfortable and quiet place to stay. My family was here on vacation and found it to be very restful. Loved eating breakfast on the terrace overlooking the water.

review.title: Ideal place to stay in SFO, shuttle to airport 7 mins,
review.reviewText: We found this ideal for us, 3 days in SFO. Enjoyed the Elephant bar/restaurant just thru' the car park. Previous reviews influenced us to stay here & were not disappointed.Airport to City on rapid rail approx 20 mins.Shuttle to hotel met when requested. Lovely to do the boardwalk without the hustle/bustle of the city. Breakfast excellent.Coffee/cookies an added bonus. We'd stay again when visiting SFO

review.title: A bit atypical for business travelers
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel on hotel row in Milbrae / Burlingame. I was pleasantly surprised with the breakfast buffet. Was well laid out and worked good. Be aware there is no full time restaurant... so no room service. I wouldn't classify this primarily as a business hotel... probably more families and passing through travelers. I did order Domino's pizza and it arrived very timely. There is a El Torito and Elephant Bar Restaurant "next door". Hotel is a bit "soul-less" with no real gathering place. It was quiet; could only just barely hear planes at SFO. Ask for bay side if you don't mind full morning sun.

review.title: Bay Landing Hotel SF
review.reviewText: This hotel is adealy situated for a first night stay (or Longer) after arriving at San Francisco Airport. It is very comfortable with large clean rooms and friendly staff. Although the aitport landing strip is visible across the Bay there was no aircraft noise in the room. The continental breakfast buffet was excellent and well presented.

review.title: Out of the way but great
review.reviewText: If you are looking for a hotel with lots to do around it...this is not the hotel for you. But we chose it b/c it was close to the airport and highway and we had plans to travel outside the area during our stay anyway. Free breakfast was great (we took full advantage of the make your own waffles), room was comfortable, very clean, and well appointed. If you don't need to be in the heart of the city I would recommend this hotel as a base from which you can explore the area. I would definitely stay here again. Also, the view from the back terrace was great! Only complaint was the walls were a bit thin and we had a family check in late next door on the night before our early morning flight.

review.title: A hotel close to SFO with decent quality
review.reviewText: I used this hotel to have my parents stay a night before coming back to home. Even though this is not a cheap one, I was satisfied with the quality of this hotel, which is close to the San Francisco International Airport. It is quite new and has all the features typical travelers need.

review.title: Would certainly stay here again when visiting San Francisco
review.reviewText: Convenient (a few minutes)to the San Francisco International Airport in a beautiful setting overlooking the Bay. Excellent Continental breakfast provided. Some airport noise was a minor irritant but was to be expected.

review.title: Great Value
review.reviewText: Great Hotel. But be sure not to get a room near the elevators

review.title: great location and quiet, pleasant room
review.reviewText: Room was very comfortable & clean, with quiet and airy atmosphere and free internet access in lobby. Breakfast buffet with hot and cold items including self-cook waffles. Great restaurant, Elephant House, very close for lunch or dinner.

review.title: Impressed
review.reviewText: Falls somewhere between a full hotel and a motel in that it offers many services of a good hotel but does not have a restaurant. But offers a good breakfast, and is within 10 minutes of downtown Burlingame where there are lots of good restaurants and good shopping. Very pleasant service. Clean. Free parking and internet services. Quiet. Good size rooms. Would certainly stay there again.

review.title: Very convenient for SFO travellers
review.reviewText: Clean, smart Bayside hotel with bar/restaurants within 2 minutes walk.

review.title: A lovely place to stay!
review.reviewText: Best hotel breakfast I have seen in a long time.

review.title: Too good to be true
review.reviewText: I stayed 5 nights with my wife. First of all, the view over the SF bay was really fantastic, and the walking trails along the bay shore was very clean and beautiful. Hotel room was very spacious and clean. I am quite sensitive to noise and smell, but I could not feel any discomfort from these issues. even at a touching distance from the landing runway of the airport the hotel was not noisy at all. Complimentary breakfast was also satisfactory. Maids worked very hard, so every table was kept cleaned all the time. Famous restaurants are just nextdoors, too. I will definitely come back in my next trip to SF.

review.title: Terrific Place to Stay - No ka oi
review.reviewText: What can I say? The Bay Landing Hotel is a terrific place to stay. I would recommend this hotel to all of my family and friends in HAWAII. The rooms were spacious and clean, and best of all it included a refrigerator and microwave. The hotel is conveniently located to the airport and it was a short drive to the city. I definitely would stay here again on my next visit to the Bay Area. Mahalo & Aloha.

review.title: Very nice, if you don't mind a short commute
review.reviewText: This hotel was an outstanding value. Very clean with all of the amenities. The breakfast was better than your usual continental. My only complaint was with the shuttle service. The hotel does not have their own shuttle, and the wait for the company they contract with can be long. There is a BART station within an easy taxi ride however, if you don't mind the extra expense. And the BART service to downtown was very reasonable.

review.title: Great airport hotel
review.reviewText: Much better than the average airport hotel. Clean, comfortable, free parking.Free internet, free good breakfast.

review.title: This Boston Boy gives the Bay landing a thumbs up!
review.reviewText: I have to say this is one of the best "airport" hotels i have stayed in, just minutes from the airport and only 20 minutes from downtown San Francisco, was well worth the price of it, the staff was always helpful and polite. I do suggest renting a car to get around since the hotel isnt right near the city or public transports. I would go back there in a heart beat, FABOULOUS!

review.title: Great place near SFO
review.reviewText: This was one of the cleanest hotels I've ever stayed. I forgot to bring my slippers for this trip, but I didn't have to worry about the carpet. It looks like brand-new carpet. The bathroom was huge and clean. We had the microwave, small refrigerator, and coffee maker in our room. The beds were comfortable and clean. This hotel is really close to SFO, but didn't hear noise from it. If you want to walk outside, there is a great walking sidewalk next to the hotel along to the bay. From the sidewalk, you can see the airplanes landing and taking off from SFO in the bay. And, free shuttle to SFO! I definately recommend this hotel.

review.title: Nice place
review.reviewText: We wanted to get out of downtown for a couple of nights to save on money and we found this place a great deal. It is new and clean with comfortable rooms and easy access to the airport. There are some nice restaurants next door and a path along the bay.

review.title: Nice
review.reviewText: Nice basic place. Clean. No smells. Nice breakfast. Close to airport.

review.title: Fabulous!
review.reviewText: If you want a very comfortable hotel for a great price go here. They have shuttles that run you to the airport/to BART, amazing breakfast, and gorgeous view right on the Bay. A definite 10 as far as hotels go.

review.title: Perfect Hotel near Airport
review.reviewText: My wife and I travelled to San Francisco in April/07 and chose this hotel because of great reviews. We wanted to rent a car for the trip so we decided to stay near the airport instead of paying a fortune to park downtown. This hotel was everything we could have asked for...clean, comfortable, and convenient. The complimentary breakfast was a great way to start the day and the computer in the lobby also came in handy. No complaints at all with this hotel. I would definitely recommend it for anybody wanting to stay near the airport.

review.title: great place to relax after flight
review.reviewText: We stayed here after flight from UK - comfortable hotel and easy to find from car rental site at airport

review.title: I would recommend anyone to stay at Bay Landing
review.reviewText: If I had any complaint it was that I was not able to establish a vpn to connect into my network from my laptop in the room. I had some work to do while I was in San Francisco but was unable to. Other than that....I have NOTHING bad to say....GREAT PLACE!

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: It was a pleasant, clean and comfortable hotel, we had chosen for its closeness to the airport and car hire return at San Francisco,therefore it is a little out of the way, The continental breakfast was adequate,but i would only use at as a one night stop for the airport.

review.title: Great airport hotel, although it's easy to forget you're near the airport!
review.reviewText: We stayed one night at this hotel on our last night in San Francisco. My favorite part was the (free) hot breakfast out on the outdoor patio! A great end to our vacation.

review.title: Great place, shame no pool
review.reviewText: From the frequency of the shuttle to room size and breakfast choice, this proved to be a great choice for our value stay! Easy to get to the BART for trips to SF centre, handy for the airport and car hire too. Pretty basic but a nice place. Did get a bit of a bad neck - could have been the bed. Bath is standard American hotel tiny - but shower hot and powerful.

review.title: Will return for business. Excellent price, great service
review.reviewText: Everything about our stay was great. The staff is very customer orientated. Thank for making our trip enjoyable. The breakfast was nice, fruit, ceral, waffles, pastries, hardboiled eggs, toast with four choice of bread, yourgt, pudding, three type of juices. Hot coffee, tea, hot chocolate. Hot cookies in the afternoon. Nice view of the bay. Thank you for the great job.

review.title: San Francisco Airport Convenient
review.reviewText: Booking the Bay Landing Hotel through Expedia is efficient. Upon arrival, our room is always ready, staff are prepared with all paperwork. Check-in takes only seconds! Breakfast in the morning is ample with a variety of beverages and foods from all food groups, what else could one ask for? Plus, coffee and tea are always available in the dining room. Hotel is on the bay, the view is so relaxing. It is freeway convenient, yet quiet. Take a walk on the path along the bay for morning exercise, or use the exercise room. We stay at Bay Landing Hotel whenever we're in the bay area, which is frequently for business and visiting family. It is truly the place to stay, giving you comfort, cleanliness, privacy, and a great buy for your money. You won't be disappointed.

review.title: This was truly a great place to stay !!
review.reviewText: When we first arrived I thought "this can't be the right place...its too nice". After checking in, we went to our room and it was just beautiful. Marble from floor to ceiling in the bathrooms and the rooms were nicely decorated and looked virtually brand new. The complimentary breakfast was out of this world!! Waffles,pancakes,croissants,muffins,toast fruit !!! This would be the kind of breakfast you would expect to have at a nice restaurant. I would absolutely come back !!

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: Front desk help was superb and fast. Rooms were well appointed and clean. A real feeling of staying at more than just a regular hotel. Quality furnishings, sheets, towels and temperature control. Good location near airport.

review.title: Excellent Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: Stayed one night after arriving in San Francisco. Airport hotel can often be pretty awful but we were quite impressed with this one. It is well situated right on the bay with a regular shuttle service to/from the airport. Breakfast was very good. Our room was spacious and double glazed which meant that even if it did not have a view of the bay, we were not troubled by noise from the road. Tea and coffee were readily available in the lounge throughout the day. Would go back.

review.title: Nice for the Price
review.reviewText: This is a nice hotel, minutes from Down Town SF. Easy to hop on the Bart in Milbrae, free parking there. The Elephant Bar next door is a nice place to eat, along with the El Toro if you like Mexican. Breakfast in the AM was more than adequate with Waffels, Pancakes, fresh fruits, pastries, cerial, coffee, juices, yogurt, cheese... and more. Internet access was great. Strong wireless signal in my room, and there's the option of wired as well. The room was clean and comfortable. Very near the Airport, but from the room I couldn't hear the traffic. Right on the Bay. The view wasn't that great, but next time I'm in SF area, I'll certainly consider staying here.

review.title: A Clean, Well-Lighted Place.
review.reviewText: The hotel is new, so it is clean, with up-to-date electronic/entertainment features. Internet access is simple and quick. TV/Movies/Video games are fully featured and easy to use. Rooms are larger than an overnight business traveler needs, but no one will complain. Views of the lower SF Bay are nice. The breakfast bar is drenched in sunlight and has tables on an outside terrace for al fresco munching.
