The banquet style food bar is fully stocked, with normal breakfast fare and a bit of European hotel breakfast items. Location is great-right on the main hotel row near SFO. There is a walking / jogging path just beyond the parking lot which follows the waterfront. A few good to very good restaurants are within walking distance, and you could hoof it to the BART station if you are so inclined. The hotel is said to be family-owned, and you can see that the staff and owners care for the hotel.

review.title: Quite Impressed
review.reviewText: One of the better price/value hotels I have stayed at. Comfortable rooms. Excellent free breakfast and free internet. Something larger, more expensive hotels should take a lead from. On/off entrance to the highway was also convenient. Highly recommend.

review.title: I will recommend and will stay there again
review.reviewText: I loved the facility. Location was adequate due to being only 15 minutes from downtown. I certainly would recommend it and will stay in this hotel again. Room service was superior. Room was clean every day. Loved their breakfast every morning and the hours it was available. Free parking is an added bonus.

review.title: Will be back
review.reviewText: I enjoyed the hotel, its amenities and lovely location. There was only one suggestion I would offer the hotel - the exercise room needs a way to clean hands; hand gel would be sufficient.

review.title: An excellent hotel
review.reviewText: Bay Landing is a beautiful hotel only 20 minutes from San Francisco. I was delighted by the beautiful lobby, the generous breakfasts, and very clean, comfortable and wonderfully decorated rooms. The TV in the room had an extensive selection of movies for rent. In the lobby is a small store with snacks, drinks and popcorn and the hotel offers free cookies in the evening and coffee and tea all day. The hotel gym has an excellent selection of workout equipment.

review.title: will book there again
review.reviewText: very quiet. staff is friendly and helpful. rooms are comfortable. nice view of bay and airplanes coming in. did not hear any noise from airport or street travel. a nice place.

review.title: Convenience for Airport
review.reviewText: This hotel was comfortable, quiet and fit my needs for a hotel close to SFO for travel.

review.title: Clean and spacious
review.reviewText: Stay was very pleasant. The breakfast buffet was great. Rooms are clean and spacious. We were able to jog along the bay and use the workout room, which is more spacious than many other small hotel gyms.

review.title: Good clean hotel
review.reviewText: Very clean hotel,close to bart and hwy 101.Only thing I found lacking was the hotel having no pool and the shuttle was bit slow.Breakfast was very good.I would recomend this hotel to anyone.

review.title: Wonderful for business travel
review.reviewText: If I were in the SF area for business, this is where I'd stay. Very comfy, nice and new, lovely amenities! Free shuttle to BART/airport. It's a little far from town for tourism, though.

review.title: Very pleasant stay
review.reviewText: I had a very nice stay at the hotel. Breakfast was wonderful.

review.title: Worthwhile place, but they bungled my reservation
review.reviewText: The hotel is comfortable, attractive, clean and quiet. It is easy to find from Hwy 101 and the airport, but the location is not convenient to evening shops or restaurants (there's a Mexican chain restaurant next door, though). The only problem I encountered was that I had a confirmed reservation for a room with a king bed, and when I arrived they said all the king bed rooms were taken. When I showed my reservation, clearly indicating that I had reserved/paid for a king room, the clerk said, somewhat dismissively, that he didn't assign the rooms, and that there were no kings left, so what did I want to do? This left a bad taste in my mouth. You may want to call a day in advance and insist they honor your reservation.

review.title: Friendly staff Great atmosphere
review.reviewText: This is my favorite place to stay when traveling to Burlingame. The shuttle to and from the airport is on time and convenient. The continental breakfast and high-speed internet is complimentary and the work out room is the perfect size for this hotel. Close to many restaurants (the refrigerator in the room is great for leftovers). This is the only place that I intend to stay at from now on. Hats off to you Bay Landing!

review.title: Clean, convenient location, free parking/breakfast/internet, quiet......what more could you ask for?
review.reviewText: After living in the San Jose for many years, I've grown to love the area. Now that I've moved to Hawaii, I try to visit the Bay Area once a year. I've tried many 3 and 4-star hotels but this by far is one of the best I've stayed at. The hotel and rooms were clean and up-to-date. Quiet area right on the Bay's edge. Internet access was available via ethernet in your room or you can use the PC that the hotel provides in the lobby. Complimentary continental breakfast buffet was decent but the price couldn't be beat, FREE! One of the reasons why this hotel is so great is the convenient location to access all points of the Bay Area. Hwy 101 is less than a mile. The best reason that makes this hotel a winner is the FREE PARKING!!! Believe me, I've paid $30+/night for parking in the Wharf area. Highly recommended. A+!

review.title: A nice place to stay
review.reviewText: Whilst a little out of the way this hotel was better than I thought it might be. The staff at the check in desk were all so friendly and really knew their stuff. When we wanted to go out to eat they had a whole sheet of local restaurants. Our favorites were the Elephant Bar (right next door to the hotel) and Stacks. The breakfast at the hotel was great - lots of choice and as much as you wanted. The only thing I would change about this place would be the bathroom - the tub was way too small

review.title: Good when traveling with young kids
review.reviewText: Good when traveling with young kids

review.title: Impressive hotel!!! A great place for family vacations!!!
review.reviewText: The hotel has delivered what we expected!!!My family had a great time! My 10-yr old daughter loved the room, nothing but good words from her especially the breakfast! She had fun making her waffles. The whole ambiance was so relaxing and everyone was so helpful and friendly. Bed was comfortable and clean. Bathroom was spacious. Good cookies and coffees! We will definitely stay with them again!

review.title: Nice place to stay in SF
review.reviewText: The hotel was clean and the people there were very helpful. It is close to the airport, but we could not hear the planes. The breakfast is the best hotel breakfast we have had. It isn't too far from downtown.

review.title: Loved my stay
review.reviewText: This hotel is wonderful! I will most definitely return here on our return trip to San Francisco. It's about 15 minutes away from the city but it's location is perfect. The hotel has a computer for guest usage and a delicious breakfast for free. The rooms are clean and spacious and the bathrooms are devine! I definitely recommend you stay here :)

review.title: Great place, great location!
review.reviewText: This hotel is spic and span with elegance. Nice staff, free breakfast in the morning was fantastic with a great view of the bay. You can't even hear the planes from the airport. Great insulation. There is an Elephant Bar and El Torito in the same parking lot. Would definately go back without a doubt.

review.title: Love this place
review.reviewText: Hotel is quiet, clean and right on the bay. Beautiful views.

review.title: Can't wait to go back!!!
review.reviewText: The hotel met all our expectations. The hotel was not close to downtown but the hotel provided a free ride to their BART system. Hotel was very clean, breakfast was great, and everyone was very helpful. The free internet was a big plus. We would definitely stay their again.

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: Very clean, very helpful staff (all hours), easy access to airport. Better than expected!

review.title: Excellent hotel at a good price
review.reviewText: The hotel was right on the bay. The view was great. The room was big and spacious, and the beds were very comfortable. It is relatively far from Downtown SF, but they have a free shuttle to the airport and back to the hotel that runs every 30 min. You can take the BART from the airport to downtown. Highly recommend the hotel.

review.title: Very impressed with this smaller hotel
review.reviewText: Very attractive comfortable room,very clean and spacious. Excellent continental breakfast with lots of variety. Only drawback was not enough seating,so get there early or very late. Hotel did not have a restaurant but there were two good restaurants next door. Snacks could be bought in the lobby area. Less than a mile to the Bart station. Next time we go to San Francisco we will stay there again with pleasure.

review.title: Best Kept Secret in the San Francisco area
review.reviewText: This is an outstanding hotel, a little pricy but worth the extra $$. You can park free, no smoking throughout the hotel, no parties in the rooms, friendly staff, maid service is excellent and friendly, excellent resturants nearby, close to airport and Hwy 101, wonderful walkway along the bay, good mattresses on the beds, roomy rooms, a continental breakfast that is free. I wish they served eggs and sauage on the weekends though.

review.title: Will stay there again if in the area.
review.reviewText: The hotel has easy access to the air port and freeway. Our room had a beautiful view of the bay. The breakfast bar was more then we expected in quanity and quality. The staff was frindly and helpful. They need more computer access though as the only computer was always occupied. All the extras made it a great stay in the bay area. There are two restaurant close by. The Mexican restaurant was okay and the other one was very good.

review.title: Nice room, new hotel with some details to work out
review.reviewText: Hotel is nicely appointed in the foyer and breakfast room (great terrace overlooking the bay). Staff was friendly and immediately available at reception. The room was large, with tall ceilings and nice furnishings. Free in-room internet access worked immediately and without problem. Bed was very comfortable. TV was nice and fully featured with cable, movies, games, etc. Coffee maker was fine, but a bit hard to see as it is black and the shelf is black marble. Bathroom was clean and spacious. The toilet handle, sink stopper, and hair dryer all had to be repaired though--the hotel is new and they have a few touch-ups to complete. One complaint about the room--no master light switch, so you had to turn each lamp/light on.

review.title: Depends on who is at the reception
review.reviewText: I booked this hotel, because the previous reviews were all 5. However, when I got there, a receptionist girl was not frinedly at all. Her face was very grumpy. There was no smile and no-welcome attitiude. However, the next next day, another girl was there. She provided absolutely great service. I appreciated her efforts. Aprt from this point, this hotel is very nice. Just pay attention to the time table for the shuttle.Otherwise, you killed your time.

review.title: Met Expectations
review.reviewText: Chose the Bay Landing on the basis of Expedia reviews, and met all expectations. Minor drawback is the longer wait for the JNJ courtesy shuttle which the Bay Landing and some other smaller hotels use. (But if you have no luggage and are in a hurry, one might take a shuttle to one of the large nearby hotels and take a short pleasant stroll on the bayside walk way to the Bay Landing. Very convednient).

review.title: Great Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: I am a frequent business traveler and I have stayed at various San Francisco airport hotels and this is the nicest hotel, better than the more expensive hotels at the airport. The parking is free, the rooms are very high end, with a very comfortable bed and a great shower - it is separate from the tub and marble. This must be a very new hotel, as everything is up to date and the carpeting very clean. Also, nice workout room with a view of the bay.

review.title: Great find, great price, don't take the shuttle
review.reviewText: Beautiful hotel. Walking distance to Elephant Bar and El Torito was great for dinner and cocktails before taking a walk along the waterfront. Airplanes are seen but not heard making for a nice evening view. The only problem I had was with the shuttle service to BART. I called downstairs to see when the shuttle ran and was told it runs "every half hour, on the half hour" until noon, then you need to call and schedule a pickup time after that. I had Raider tickets for 1pm in Oakland so I went downstairs at 11:15 to catch the 11:30 shuttle then was told it needed to be called in and he would not make it back by 11:30 but she would have him come at noon. The shuttle didn't arrive until 12:40 so I missed the first quarter of the game and the girl at the front desk couldn't have cared less. Other than that I would definately go back again but Id take a cab to the SFO BART station.

review.title: Excellent Choice!
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing worked out great for my group (I brought several business associates w/me)! We do a great deal of business-related travel, and I definitely rate it higher than those other "standard business travel" hotels! We had everything we needed @ the hotel, and the staff took excellent care of us.

review.title: Best value in the Bay Area
review.reviewText: Comfortable, view excellent,

review.title: What Airport?
review.reviewText: I wasn't even aware I was sleeping right by the airport until I walked out of the hotel! No on-site restaurant, but great options within walking distance...

review.title: Excellent Quality at Reasonable Rates
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing is a wonderful place to stay, convenient to the airport and car rental. The service was exceptional, and the staff friendly. Free morning breakfasts were very tasty with a wide variety of food available. I would definitely return.

review.title: The Best Hotel of my entire West Coast Visit
review.reviewText: This hotel is AWESOME! the service is excellent and the condition is immaculate!! Worth every penny!!

review.title: very nice
review.reviewText: very high quality . very good price. you will not be disappointed.

review.title: Good hotel for the price
review.reviewText: This hotel is located close to SFO, but you cannot hear the airplane noise. A shuttle is available to/from the airport. Great views of the bay and the planes coming in for landing. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast in the morning and coffee & tea 24 hours. The room was spacious with a microwave and refrigerator. There were also food and items you may have forgotten to pack available for purchase. The staff was always friendly and helpful.

review.title: Great Place to stay
review.reviewText: This hotel is a great place to stay. The staff is friendly and helpful. The breakfast is included and excellent. Evening cookies were a nice surprise. The view was nice. We would definitely stay here again.

review.title: Highly recommended
review.reviewText: This hotel was exceptional. From the size of the rooms, to the most amazing breakfast ever. We were so impressed! Clean, comfortable, affordable. Would and have recommended this hotel to anyone traveling to San Francisco and surrounding areas.

review.title: Loved it.
review.reviewText: Outstanding hotel. Located close to restaurants and airport. Will definitely stay here next time in S.F.

review.title: Bay Landing,
review.reviewText: Clean & new hotel,great location,spacious rooms,very good breakfast,just a bit noisy plumbing.Excellent choice near airport,easy ride to the city& Fishermans warf&at&t ballpark&monster park.Right off of freeway rt.101

review.title: Just perfect.
review.reviewText: A superbly situated hotel if you want to visit San Francisco and don't want to stay in the main center. Easy to take the free hotel shuttle to the airport and catch the BART train into the heart of San Francisco. Very friendly hotel staff and excellent continental breakfast included.

review.title: Excellent overnight stay
review.reviewText: I had an overnight stay enroute to Atlanta. The hotel runs a free shuttle to and from the airport which is great. On the day I used it, however, one driver was sick so they only had a small van running. When it turned up at the airport it was full and the driver told us we had to wait another 15 minutes before he came back. He did come back as promised and picked us all up. Unfortunately, by the time we got to the domestic terminal (at SFO) he was saying the same thing to the people waiting there. I'm sure this was an effect of the sick driver and my return trip to the airport the next day was fine. When I arrived at the hotel the check-in was fast and efficient but not overly friendly. However, the room was pretty big and very clean and the bed was comfortable. Breakfast was good with great waffles. I had a room facing the road but could not hear any traffic noise day or night. The hotel is on the Bay Trail which is great if you want to get some air before or after your flight. Overall, a good experience and I will definitely use them again.

review.title: Very good value for money
review.reviewText: Very good value for money, especially for the visitors that travel with a car. The hotel is near to the city center, where a garage is always easy to find at reasonable price. The availability of internet accessing PC at the lounge is a very good idea. Decent breakfast.

review.title: Very good hotel
review.reviewText: Very clean hotel. Continental breakfast impressive in diversity and quality, and free. Free high-speed internet jack in rooms + wifi in lobby + one computer accessible in lobby. I highly recommend it. Only negative points: toilet got clogged in the morning but was fixed during the day. Not enough personel at night, so relatively long to check in if late arrival. Breakfast ladies not very smily with customers, but efficient at work.

review.title: Great Place To Stay
review.reviewText: We would most certainly return to Bay Landing. It is a very nice and comfortable hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was like a buffet and we stayed for 4 nights and enjoyed breakfast each day. It was nice to be out of the busy downtown area and we drove down to the fishermans wharf 2 days. Next time I'm in San Francisco we will stay at Bay Landing Hotel. Thank You!

review.title: Beautiful and comfortable
review.reviewText: The shuttle service was great. The breakfast was the best. We enjoyed our stay and the beautiful views of the bay.

review.title: Convenient location
review.reviewText: Convenient location, close to the airport, without having the impression of being close to an airport. Nice terrace. Nice view on the bay. Generous breakfast. However, the lack of a swimming pool may be a drawback for kids.

review.title: A Great Find
review.reviewText: We stayed here for 3 nights at the beginning of August. The hotel is meticulously maintained and the staff was extraordinarily friendly. Parking is free, unlike many of the nearby hotels. It is located on the San Francisco bay about two miles from SFO airport. There is a long walking path along the bay right outside the back of the hotel. Guests frequently sit on the back patio of the hotel sipping coffee or wine and enjoying the bay breeze. There is a computer with internet access in the lobby, available free to guests, which comes in handy for getting directions or making reservations. The manager often wanders among guests at breakfast (breakfast is included in room price) to make sure everything is fine. We found this hotel to be a real gem and a great alternative to staying in the crowded city.

review.title: Hidden Treasure
review.reviewText: The hotel was immaculate and the rooms were large and well kept. There was a complimentary large warm and cold continental breakfast each morning. The staff was friendly and helpful--they helped navigate the BART, MUNI and all public transport. It was a convenient location to the airport and BART stations--we didn't even need a rental care. In short, it was home away from home--I look forward to staying again.

review.title: Excellent Hotel
review.reviewText: My husband and I were more than impressed with this hotel. It was perfect! The continental breakfast was great, it included eggs, fruits, toast, waffles, juices, etc, etc, we saved a lot of money in breakfast! It was really clean, ALL THE TIME and the rooms smell good after the housekeeping. We did not hear any plains fly by, even though the hotel was about 10-15 minutes from the hotel. Two great restaurants with good food are next to the hotel and HWY 101 is near. I would definitely reccomend this hotel and we would definitely will stay there again. By the way, the hotel looks much better than what is shown in the pictures from this site.

review.title: Will stay there again!
review.reviewText: The accommodations were very clean and very comfortable. We were hesitant about the potential noise from the airport, but we never heard a plane once! We traveled by the Airport shuttle service to SFO to catch BART into SF every day from the Hotel. It was easy with no issues (never waited more than 15 minutes); however in spite of the posted times that the shuttle is scheduled to stop at the Hotel, always check with the front desk, because there are times that they need to call the shuttle to pick you up. We did have an issue the first evening with that fact. After asking the front desk person about the next shuttle time and then waiting 10 minutes in the lobby past the scheduled pick-up time, we asked the front desk again and discovered that they should have called the pick-up in for us and didn't. The shuttle then came within 5 minutes afer they called.

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: Stayed here to attend a wedding. The hotel itself is beautiful, with nice spacious rooms and ammenities. One downside is that there is only 1 public Internet computer station in the lobby so you will likely have to wait if you didn't bring your own laptop with you.

review.title: Very Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: I was very happy with this hotel. Even though it is close to the airport, it is not a problem. Plane noise is not a factor. The free breakfast is good. They have yogurt, fruit, broil eggs and you can make your own waffles. To get to downtown San Francisco you can take the BART or the CalTrain, the station is like two miles away. If you prefer driving, just take 101 north and you will be in San Francisco like in 15 minutes.

review.title: Very impressed.
review.reviewText: the people work in the front desk should know more about San Francisco to help traveler.

review.title: Wonderful, clean, new hotel near SFO airport
review.reviewText: We stayed here for a couple of nights while on vacation...needed a place near the airport for convenience around the time of the arrival and departure flights. Hotel is quite close to the SFO rental car facility, and very easy to get to on highway 101. This is a new hotel, 2-ish years old as of summer 2006. It is very clean. The lobby has a library (!) with a curious selection of books, a widescreen plasma television, and a free Internet access terminal. There is an area where you can purchase snacks and toiletry items 24-hours a day. There is a large exercise room, with a good variety of modern, high-quality machines. The continental breakfast is nice, with a good assortment of fruit, yogurt, pastries, juices, and belgian waffles. The rooms themselves are comfortable. The beds are particularly nice. Some of the rooms have super-sized bathrooms. My only complaint....a minor one....is that the bathroom door will not stay open---it closes automatically as if on a spring. I like to leave the door open, personally, but perhaps most people do not. The price we paid was inline with the quality of the hotel and services, for the San Francisco area. All in all, highly recommended.

review.title: Best Airport Hotel Around
review.reviewText: The hotel is clean, convenient to restaurants, on the water, has a great shuttle to the airport and is a great value. I would stay here again.

review.title: Very impressed
review.reviewText: This hotel was comfortable. The view of the Bay was great and watching the airplanes taking off and landing was exciting. You couldn't here the airplanes when the windows were closed. My husband and I felt right at home.

review.title: Eugene's Best Kept Secret
review.reviewText: This hotel is one of the best! It has awesome view of the river and we even saw a Racoon. It is walking distance from a shopping mall and resturants. It is close to the University of Oregon. The resturant has beutiful views and great food. All of the staff at the hotel and the resturant were very professional. I highly recommend this hotel!

review.title: simple super
review.reviewText: We are satisfate,

review.title: I will stay here everytime I come to SF
review.reviewText: Free internet, quiet, exceptional staff, this hotel is the best place for it's price and I wouldn't care about staying anywhere else even if it cost more because everything I need or want is there. There are two restaurants near by so you don't have to worry about the lack of room service.

review.title: Good choice
review.reviewText: This is a clean affordable hotel with free high speed internet service and rooms that lean toward luxurious. South of the city, it has views of the bay and easy access to the airport and Hwy 101 into the city.

review.title: Nice Location
review.reviewText: The hotel is located right on the bay with a good view. There is a concrete path along the bay that you can walk on for miles if you choose. there are many shops and resturants close by.

review.title: Airport - What Airport
review.reviewText: I really wasn't sure when I booked this hotel how much we would hear the airport, and although our ground floor room looked over the Airport, you really did struggle to hear it. There are a couple of restuarants close by, a TexMex and a family restuarant. The shuttle to the airport is great, and you can take the Bart from the Airport into San Francisco. The staff were very firendly and helpful, the Shuttle arrives at the airport every 30 minutes, but it is worth going from International (near the Bart) where you can call the Shuttle operator to let them know you are there. Over all the hotel was really good, amazing choice at breakfast, very clean and very firendly staff - would recommend to anyone.

review.title: Beautifl Landing
review.reviewText: Quite impressed at first sight. Easy access to the freeway which was great. Breakfast was very good especially the make your own waffles. Beautiful view of the planes landing. Everything was great, we really enjoyed out stay.

review.title: Fantastic Hotel / Great Value
review.reviewText: The Bay Landing Hotel was a fantastic place.I will stay there again, when I return to the area. The feel of the hotel overall, was very up-scale. Rich woods & beautiful decorum throughout. The continental breakfast had a wide variety of foods and fresh fruits. You could eat in the large inside area, or sit on the back patio overlooking the bay. The rooms were very spacious with lots of floor space. The bathroom was also ample in size. Only regret - no queen size beds..., doubles only. The rooms had a microwave & refridgerator and downstairs you could purchase sundries, drinks, snacks & micowaveable meals. The hotel provided access to a single computer, so it was nice to be able to get e-mail. Overall - a wonderful hotel. Clean, upscale, nice staff, and a great price-value.

review.title: Nice place, easy to get to, great breakfast
review.reviewText: This is a very nice hotel, very easy to find, one exit, three easy turns and you are there. It was VERY quiet. Breakfast was very good, coffee was super. Free internet access, microwave and fridge. Free airport shuttle. FYI: $10.30 round trip on BART to down town, about 30 min.

review.title: Best kept San Francisco secret
review.reviewText: This hotel provided unbelievable quality for the price. The employees were friendly, the hotel was always spotless, and the manager spent over an hour with us one morning at breakfast just talking about what to see in San Francisco, as we were tourists and our first time there. The hotel should be rated at least a four star, we would have paid more. The breakfast buffet was listed as continental but included boiled eggs, a make your own waffle station, fresh fruit, yogurts, puddings, bagels, pancakes, and much more. Coffee and tea were available 24 hours. Having breakfast on the terrace while watching the planes take off over the San Francisco bay was another plus. Also, the rooms were always spotless and freshly made when we returned each evening. The staff made our vacation more enjoyable. Can't wait to go back!!

review.title: A Keeper
review.reviewText: Our first stay at the Landing and a great one! our room was very clean. fabulous decor.. Through our travels over the years, we would rate this #1..Hotel family friendly and the breakfast was bar none the best! There is a lovely walk trail off the Hotel that is super with great Restaurants within walking distance.. Bay Landing, you got it going on!!!Thanks for your great hospitality..

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: Hotel appears new and situated next to 2 great resturants. Behind the hotel is a great walking/jogging path that goes along the bay, which must be over 2 miles long. If you don't feel like walking or jogging, there are benches along the path to sit and watch the airplanes land at SFO airport. Rooms were very clean, but bed and pillow were not as comfortable as some of the other chains. For the price, compared to other hotels, this was more than reasonable. I would stay here again.

review.title: Would love to visit again
review.reviewText: If I visit San Francisco again, I would definitely consider staying at the Bay Landing Hotel. The area was relatively quiet, yet close enough to area attractions (we had a rental car). They was a pleasant bay view and we could watch airplanes take off and land. The hotel staff was friendly, rooms were clean and comfortable. Very nice complimentary breakfast each morning.

review.title: Watch Airplanes Soar
review.reviewText: Was worried about airport noise till I noticed the windows were double paned. Noise wasn't an issue at all. We were on the second floor. Noted safety-wise that the windows weren't screened and could actually open (Okay, so I'm a paranoid parent). Had a view of the bay which was perfect for our toddler. And us. We got to be kids again and watched airplanes take off and land from either the comfort of our room, or along that nice little pathway right by the bay. Liked their breakfast. Enjoyed flipping the waffle machine--never done that before! And the coffee pots/hot water were refilled by evening when you needed a little heat to keep you warm and get you going. Just wish they had a pool. Otherwise, a place we'd definitely stay again.

review.title: Nice, quiet, relaxing in Style
review.reviewText: This is one of the most comfortable and accomodating hotels ever. Very clean and nicely decorated and air conditioning. I was able to get on the internet for free, coffee and herbal teas all day, nice complimentary breakfasts, and a great work out room.

review.title: Confortable
review.reviewText: Hotel was clean and rooms were nice. Continental breakfast was a exceptional. Only draw back was that it did not have a pool or recreation area

review.title: Great choice.
review.reviewText: This is a brand new hotel, well located, close to the airport and restaurants. Movie theater close by.

review.title: very nice
review.reviewText: This was a very nice hotel...it had a shuttle to the airport which is why we were there. We would definitely stay there again if in the area.

review.title: Perfect Stay
review.reviewText: Since I had to do business in both San Francisco and the Silicon Valley I was looking for a hotel near SFO anyway. I found this great place and can fully recommend it for business or pleasure, single or family travellers. Spacious and clean rooms, neat utilities (fridge & microwave), free HiSpeed network access and a terrific breakfast buffet. I would rate the bay landing as a superior motor inn to anybody and will definitely reserve my place whenever I'll return to the bay Area.

review.title: Just Like Home -- Totally Impressed!
review.reviewText: This was my wife's and my first getaway without the kids, and this property was impeccable. The property was spotless, near the interstate to get to the city, with the greatest ammenity: complimentary continental breakfast! The waffles every morning helped us start the day on a high note and helped save us money for our first meal of the day. The property was near the water, near reputable restaurants (Benihana of Tokyo), and interestingly located across from the San Francisco Airport (but without any of the noise). Every morning when we awoke, we were able to plan our day and check for directions through my laptop due to the complimentary internet connectivity. If we needed to print out items, we were able to access the property's computer in the lobby, connected to an inkjet printer (also at NO charge!).

review.title: Comfortable and roomy
review.reviewText: We enjoyed our 2 night stay - computer access in room and also computer for guest use in the lobby. Free breakfast was delicious and free newspaper outside room door every morning. Quiet and clean. Would definetly stay here again.

review.title: Excellent Airport Hotel for SFO
review.reviewText: Check in was a bit poor as they had given me a room with double beds instead of my King sized bed room. After a few minutes this was resolved and the room was perfect. The heating/cooling system was perfectly quiet and had a remote control. The bed was excellent and the bathroom was well appointed. TV was good with cable and inputs for a camera that automatically set the input to view the pictures. Wireless and hard wired internet were free. The free breakfast was very well appointed, even had fresh waffels. There is no pool or hot tub. There are several restauants nearby, the Elephant Bar and Grill being very good.

review.title: Great Place to Stay
review.reviewText: I was impressed with the quality of the hotel for the price. Comfortable, clean room. Free internet access in the lobby plus a very nice breakfast included in the room price. Close to the airport with shuttle service. Walking distance from 2 restaraunts

review.title: Impressed
review.reviewText: Very good value

review.title: Convenient location/Value priced
review.reviewText: I have stayed in this hotel twice now. It is new, clean and very comfortable. It also provides airport transportation and an excellent complimentary buffet breakfast!

review.title: very impressed. will be going back next month
review.reviewText: very clean rooms. friendly staff

review.title: A very pleasant surprise
review.reviewText: I was extremely pleased with my stay. The "continental" breakfast was far more than coffee and danish. The room was spacious and well kept. Overall, a really nice hotel. Will definitely stay there for all trips.

review.title: Best Hotel for Price
review.reviewText: We went to San Francisco on vacation, and if we were ever back in the area, we would definitely stay at the Bay Landing Airport Hotel. Everything you see in the pictures online, are exactly what you see when you get there. The complimentary breakfast had many options. We also enjoyed the free high speed internet. I felt like we got more for our money at this hotel, than at any other we have ever been to.

review.title: Great hotel within 5 minutes of San Fran airport
review.reviewText: I had business matters to deal with south of San Fran. and did not want to deal with the traffic issues of staying in the city, but I wanted to stay at a very nice hotel. Bay Landing was perfect. Less than 5 minutes from the airport. New hotel, Very well maintained. rooms were large and clean. Mini fridge and microwave in room. Great restaurants within walking and short driving distance. Very reasonable rates, especially for San Fran area. I will stay here for future trips to San Fran.

review.title: Top Notch Hotel - Highly Recommended!!
review.reviewText: This hotel was one of the best hotels I've ever stayed at. The facility was extremely clean and kept well. The staff was very helpful. The continental breakfast was very elaborate and had many many varieties to choose from. We stayed for several nights and every time we returned to our room, it was in pristine condition. The surrounding scenery was beautiful. The drive to Downtown San Francisco was a breeze from this location. I highly highly recommend it. Will definitely stay here again.

review.title: Very nice and comfortable
review.reviewText: Excellent hotel at a good location, with a great price !!!

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: Modern hotel. Well recommended.

review.title: This hotel was what I would call south San Francisco Best Kept Little Secret.
review.reviewText: The room was very clean and I'm quite pleased at just how quiet it was even though the location was just a few minutes south of the airport. It was also within walking distance to a few outstanding eating establishments. I only wished it had a pool (which I'm sure would be very nice for the summer months), but I was there during the early spring. The morning continental breakfast was also good. For the price, you can't go wrong by choosing this hotel!!!

review.title: Great Value
review.reviewText: For the modest price, this was a very clean, modern facility. Continental breakfast was as good as I have seen at this type of hotel. Lots of choices and continually re-stocked. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality for the low price we paid.

review.title: Very nice
review.reviewText: Thought I would have a view of the Bay but did not. However, it was raining so a view really didn't matter. Hotel was very nice, clean, and updated.

review.title: Great surprise
review.reviewText: Great value, and on top of that, the little extra "surprises" were great: free breakfast, free parking, free internet.

review.title: Great Value
review.reviewText: Hotel is relatively new and therefore clean and modern. A more business man type hotel IMO, it leaves out the fringes (pool, gift shop, etc) to give good value to the traveler; more than adequate deluxe contintental breakfast and a friendly staff round out the deal. One complaint is that the bathroom door is spring loaded and will not stay open and keeps slamming shut everytime you go in or out; rather irritating, so we put a small bag in the hall to keep it open while going back and forth. I would definitely go back again and recommend this hotel to other travelers

review.title: Already booked our next vacation
review.reviewText: I was here for business in March and booked our summer vacation already. The price we booked through Expedia could not be beat, even the hotel's rate was extremely reasonable compared to other area hotels. From the moment you drive up it is impressive, marble front, on the bay, fireplace in large lobby, seating areas and the free breakfast was first class. Our room was like brand new, spacious, two double poster beds, fridge, microwave, coffee, tea, internet access, cable, large tub, desk with 2 chairs, easy chair, marble window sills and great view of the bay. Took pictures to show family and friends. Free parking and is on Bay with a nice park and walking path. Staff was friendly and helpful especially to my parents who traveled with me.

review.title: excellent basic hotel
review.reviewText: Has all of the basics for a self sufficient traveller with none of the over priced extravagence. Quiet with "thick walls". Very close to airport and easy on/off the 101 freeway. New, clean, large rooms. Nice view of bay on one side.

review.title: Escellent
review.reviewText: We would recommend this hotel without hesitation. It was clean, quiet, well maintained. In short, an excellent choice.

review.title: Can't wait to stay there again
review.reviewText: The front desk staff was extremely helpful when I asked about riding BART to my particular destination in downtown San Francisco. Very polite and wonderful customer service from everyone I encountered during my stay. The continental breakfast is great, especially the waffles! I highly recommend this hotel; very clean, comfortable beds and nicely appointed rooms.

review.title: Elegant Not Pompous
review.reviewText: Safe, clean & business friendly. Close to the airport but you'd never know it because it's so quiet. Ample parking is a plus too.

review.title: Awesome Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel was very close to airport and BART. If you are going to do a lot of traveling on BART might need to go further north for hotels. Great breakfast bar and service was very nice!!! If I was to rent a car next time I would definitely stay here. The Elephant Resturant next door is great food for reasonable prices.

review.title: Good Value
review.reviewText: We were very impressed from the moment we walked into the lobby when we arrived. The lobby is beautiful, and our room was beautiful and quiet. The breakfast was plentiful, and well presented. The only improvement I would make would be to have a second easy chair in the room.

review.title: Impressed
review.reviewText: This Hotel was apparently just refurbished and renamed. The hotel is located on the western shore of SF bay about 2 miles south of SFO airport. Everything appears virtually brand new. Current prices at the Bay Landing are comparatively cheap with respect to its neighbors, for absolutely comparable rooms. The only downside I saw is that the hotel does not appear to have room service or a true restaurant. There are several restaurants up and down the street outside. There is a dining area in the hotel that provides a free continental breakfast. If you want to stay near the airport in San Francisco and are only concerned with a quality room at a good price, for now at least, this is the place.

review.title: Great 3 star hotel
review.reviewText: Love the free parking and internet access

review.title: Great location near the airport
review.reviewText: This hotel is conveniently located near the airport and within driving distance to most activities. Great continental breakfast and lots of free parking make this hotel very desirable. Hotel staff could be a little more friendly and helpful, however, still a good place to stay.

review.title: Planning another stay..
review.reviewText: This hotel should be given a higher rating for quality, location, comfort, and elegance. The hotel staff helped us with directions to nearby attractions. The complimentary breakfast was great, and the hotel was easy to find from the airport, and right next to the water! We will be planning another stay :)

review.title: Nice hotel for the price you pay!
review.reviewText: I'm surprised Expedia rates this as a two and a half-star hotel, it deserves higher! I was very satisfied with my stay at this hotel. I stayed in a room with a (comfortable) king size bed along the street, but you couldn't hear any of the street noise! The bathroom is huge (at least a 15'x10') with a bathtub and separate shower. I've conversed with other guests who found this hotel through Expedia and are also satisfied. We all tried to get a room with a view of the bay, but it's hard to get one. You get so much for the rate you pay: excellent hotel service, spacious room, nice dining area with a view of the bay. There's also a path in the back of the hotel where you can walk, jog, or just sit and watch the airplanes come and go. The only thing my 6 yr. old daughter wished they had was Disney and Nickelodoen (on cable TV). Other than that, I would stay at this hotel again! :D

review.title: This is the best deal so far
review.reviewText: We stayed overnight to catch a flight to Honolulu and by chance picked this hotel - well what a find!! Terrific service - terrific breakfast -great price - and a fast shuttle to the airport. What more could we expect. We would highly recommend this hotel to anyone needing a place to stay close to the airport.

review.title: Pleasant Stay
review.reviewText: I only stayed here for one night in January 2006, but it was a pleasant one. I had a king room, which was spacious and clean, and included a nice big desk, microwave and mini-fridge. The bathroom was very big. Continental breakfast was served in the morning, which included fresh fruit and make-your-own waffles. This hotel seems new so it's not worn down at all. I think it's a pretty good value.

review.title: Best hotel in the Bay Area
review.reviewText: I was very impressed with this hotel. The staff was very friendly, the rooms were large and clean, and it was very quiet.

review.title: Fabulous!
review.reviewText: I thought we were in the wrong hotel at first for what we paid. The hotel itself is amazing, the rooms are spacious the the free breakfast is superb! Everything is within driving range (and we have 2 small kids). I would definately recommend this place.

review.title: Great modestly priced hotel
review.reviewText: For a moderately priced hotel near the airport, this hotel would be hard to beat. Overall impression is that they put a lot of effort into the details and service, and it shows. This hotel would have been nice at twice the price. At the price we paid, it was fantastic.

review.title: fabulous deal
review.reviewText: 2nd stay at this hotel and I would stay there again if the opportunity arises.

review.title: Great Experience at a Great Rate
review.reviewText: Good location near airport, easy access to freeway, next to many good restaurants and microwave in the room. As a runner, enjoyed the running path behind the hotel along the bay. Room was nice too.

review.title: Best accommodations for a very reasonable price! :-)
review.reviewText: While on a business trip from Washington DC to San Francisco and Tokyo, I stayed at this hotel. It was charming in its decor and was very clean and comfortable. The staff members were incredibly helpful, the complimentary breakfast delicious, and the free shuttle to/from the airport and BART station a great help. I made it a point to stay at the hotel upon my return from Japan and had another room of equally good quality and very quiet even though it faced the bay where the flights came in and went out. All amenities were provided for the business traveler and families on vacation. I'll definitely stay at this hotel again when I go back to the Bay area! :-)

review.title: great san fran deal!
review.reviewText: We stayed overnight with our baby on our way back from Hawaii. Wonderful! We've recommended it to everyone we know.

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: Excellent choice to stay. Fabulous breakfast. I'd definitely go back again.

review.title: Excellent value
review.reviewText: Location excellent (close to airport, city of SF, peninsula). Extremely well kept/clean. Staff very friendly and accomodating. Lived in the bay area for most of the last 8 years (recent move to NC) and travel to SF area often now. This is one of the best hotel values in the bay area that I have come across.

review.title: The best decision I ever made!
review.reviewText: I had a wedding this past July and I needed to find the best hotel for my family and guests. I researched and checked out various hotels in the area and Bay Landing turned out to be the best choice! It was quaint, clean (like new!), and the staff were very helpful and friendly. All of our guests had wonderful things to say about their stay.I had a special suite to get ready for the wedding in the morning, and the light from the bay view was perfect for doing all of our make-up. The complimentary deluxe breakfast, parking and space to sit outside to enjoy the view made it all worthwhile for everyone. I highly recommend this place!

review.title: Very good value.
review.reviewText: Nice hotel. The room and bathroom are large and well layed out. Wonderful complimentary breakfast with waffle bar. Free internet in lobby. Free parking. They seem to have done everything right here. Be sure to get a bay view room.

review.title: Great hotel!
review.reviewText: I stayed here twice in September 2005 (for one night each, prior to leaving on an early morning SFO flight). The previous reviewer pretty much said it all -- the room and decor, including the public areas, make the place seem more like a luxury hotel, and I really don't have anything negative to say about the place. The price was reasonable and the free breakfast was great! I highly recommend staying here for those with flights out of SFO or even those visiting San Francisco and don't mind driving into the city.

review.title: Best Hotel We've Stayed In!
review.reviewText: We really loved this hotel for the following reasons: - It is good value for money - Had huge, very clean rooms - Had ammenities such as mini-fridge, tea and coffee maker, microwave, free high-speed internet connection in rooms - It is a non-smoking hotel - It is right on the Bay and you can watch the planes landing - You do not hear the airport at all - It's only about twenty minutes by car to downtown San Francisco from this hotel - There are several restaurants near-by - The complimentary breakfast was awesome! Served from 6:30 - 9:30am daily it included things like, toast, muffins, bagels, fresh fruit, yoghurt, muesli, cereal, waffles, tea, coffee, three different juices. Really delicious! - San Fran. airport and car rental facilities are really close by - Hotel has plenty of free parking - If you like wine you should check out the Napa Valley - which you can do in a day from this hotel. We stopped by the tourist information place in Napa and they were really helpful and recommended some excellent vineyards to check-out.

review.title: totally impressed
review.reviewText: from amenities to service, it was all great. our microwave was not working and within 10 minutes it was replaced!

review.title: Would stay there again in a second
review.reviewText: Great hotel at a reasonable price.

review.title: Great place!
review.reviewText: This is pretty much the only place I will stay on the Peninsula when I am in town on business. Huge value for the money, clean, quiet and awesome fitness center!

review.title: Best hotel in SF area
review.reviewText: Location: waterfront with views of the bay and airport. Remarkably it was quiet, since hotel is not in the path of any runway; several good restaurants within walking distance; pathway along the bay for jogging; not too noisy street. Hotel: Even though it is supposed to be a cheap imitation, hotel looks kind of like a European castle outside; inside, expensive wallpaper and wooden bars give it a French country look. Very pleasant veranda with tables and bay views. Room: One of the nicest rooms I have been in this country. Clean, light, functional. Again wallpaper, expensive carpet, European feel. Amenities: TV, safe, fridge, window that opens, curtains with no leaking light, microwave, 2 phones with speakerphone, AC with remote control, laundry ($1.50 + $1 for dryer), free wired internet (with data cable already in the room). Service: Great service. Mainly because I saw staff twice during my stay: at check in and check out time. Everything worked, was well though out, and with you in mind (kind of like when you stay at friends house).

review.title: A Real Treasure
review.reviewText: This is one of the nicest hotels I've ever stayed in. It is beautifully appointed, immaculate, and the staff is extremely helpful. Unlike the big chain hotels, you feel like you're in an exclusive boutique property. The view is gorgeous, the rooms are spacious, and the buffet breakfast is outstanding with juices, fruit, yogurt, waffles, hard boiled eggs, cereals, and an assortment of breads and pastries; all included in the price of the room. There is a shuttle service from the airport that runs every half hour. You couldn't ask for a nicer place to stay in the Bay Area.
